name: MMC Redirect Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability MS06-044
description: There is a remote code execution vulnerability in Windows Management Console that could allow an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability to take complete control of the affected system.

name: McAfee HTTP Server Remote Buffer Overflow
description:
There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in the HTTP server component used by several McAfee system security management products. The flaw is due to improper boundary checks when parsing HTTP
request header fields. An unauthenticated remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with System level privileges.

name: Novell eDirectory evtFilteredMonitorEventsRequest Function Heap Overflow
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Novell eDirectory product line. The flaw is created by improper buffer size calculations performed during the processing of client LDAP messages. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit the vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition on the target host or possibly inject and execute arbitrary code.

name: Acer LunchApp.APlunch ActiveX Control Remote Command Execution
description: A vulnerability has been identified in LunchApp.APlunch ActiveX Control, which could be exploited by remote attackers to take complete control of an affected system. This flaw is due to a design error when using the insecure "Run()" method, which could be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary binaries on a vulnerable system by tricking a user into visiting a specially crafted Web page.

name: Solaris in.rwhod(1m) Daemon Code Execution
description:
A vulnerability exists within the in.rwhod daemon component of Sun Solaris. The daemon can potentially be exploited from a remote host to be compromised for code injection and execution. This vulnerability may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable host within
the security context of the root user.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_SNAPSHOT Package
description: Boundary error in the Database Server within the DBMS_SNAPSHOT

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In TO_TIMESTAMP_TZ Function
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the TO_TIMESTAMP_TZ  may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In MDSYS.SDO_CS package
description: There exists a Buffer Overflow vulnerability in the MDSYS.SDO_CS package

name: Novell Distributed Print Services Integer Overflow
description:
There exists an integer overflow vulnerability in Novell Distributed Print Services module in multiple Novell products. The vulnerability is caused due to lack of proper boundary checks prior to the calculation of the size of a memory buffer. An unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability
to inject and execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application, Super User in the Netware systems.

name: Oracle Database Server Intermedia Denial of Service
description:
Denial of Service via Oracle Intermedia in Oracle 9i / 10g (D.o.S)
http://www.red-database-security.com/exploits/oracle_dos_oracle_intermedia.html

name: Oracle Database Server Login Access Control Bypass Vulnerability
description: There exists a security bypass vulnerability in Oracle Database Server. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of the AUTH_ALTER_SESSION option in the login process. A remote attacker with authentication credentials may use this vulnerability to bypass access controls and execute SQL statements with the database administrator privileges.

name: Oracle Database Server SQL Injection In CONVERT_TO_LRS_LAYER Procedure Of MDSYS.SDO_LRS Package
description: SQL Injection is possible in procedure CONVERT_TO_LRS_LAYER of MDSYS.SDO_LRS package which can be exploited to steal data from a database or gain access to the host computers running the database.

name: Oracle Database Server XML Database Component Buffer Overflow (create file)
description: Oracle Database has a buffer overflow vulnerability in public procedure DBMS_XMLSCHEMA.GENERATESCHEMA that can be exploited to run arbitrary code.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In INIT Procedure Of PBSDE Package
description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in Security component (PBSDE.INIT)

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In CREATE_SNAPSHOT Procedure Of WK_SNAPSHOT Package
description: A parameter passed to the WK_SNAPSHOT.CREATE_SNAPSHOT may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure DIFFERENCES Of DBMS_RECTIFIER_DIFF Package
description: A parameter passed to the DIFFERENCES procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Microsoft Visual Studio WMI Object Broker Unspecified Code Execution
description:
There exists a vulnerability in the WMI Object Broker ActiveX control in Microsoft Visual Studio 2005.The flaw is due to improper access control in the CreateObject function of the ActiveX control. By persuading the target user to visit a malicious web site, an attacker may possibly execute arbitrary code
with privileges of the currently logged on user.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player Bitmap Handling Buffer Overflow
description: When processing bitmap images, Media Player 9 and 10 create a buffer in heap memory for bitmap data based on information that is contained in the bitmap file.  As a result an attacker can craft a bitmap file that will cause Windows Media Player to overrun a heap buffer in whatever process is hosting the vulnerable WMP.DLL (i.e. wmplayer.exe, iexplore.exe etc.).

name: Symantec Veritas NetBackup CONNECT_OPTIONS Request Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Symantec VERITAS NetBackup Server, Backup Client Service (BPCD). The flaw is caused by incorrect processing of specially crafted BPCD messages. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected service, normally System.

name: Samba Arbitrary File Access
description: There is a vulnerability in the way Samba validates file paths presented by an SMB client. A specially crafted file path can allow a user to bypass Samba access restrictions when accessing files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to retrieve files which are outside a valid share path.

name: Citrix Presentation Server Client ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: A vulnerability has been identified in Citrix Presentation Server Client for Windows, which could be exploited by remote attackers to take complete control of an affected system. This flaw is due to a buffer overflow error in the ICA Client ActiveX control (Wfica.ocx) when processing specially crafted arguments passed to the "SendChannelData()" method, which could be exploited by attackers to execute arbitrary commands by tricking a user into visiting a malicious web page.

name: Novell NetMail NMAP STOR Command Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Novell NetMail before 3.52e FTF2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted arguments to the STOR command to the Network Messaging Application Protocol (NMAP) daemon, resulting in a stack overflow.

name: OpenLDAP LDAP Server BIND Request DoS
description: There exists a vulnerability in the OpenLDAP Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service. The flaw is due to improper handling of specially crafted BIND requests sent to the server. This can be exploited by an  authenticated remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition in the affected service.

name: SNMP Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows SNMP service. The flaw is caused by incorrect processing of specially crafted SNMP messages. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected service, normally System.

name: Microsoft Windows Explorer WMF File Denial Of Service
description: Sign extension vulnerability in the createBrushIndirect function in the GDI library (gdi32.dll) in Microsoft Windows XP, Server 2003, and possibly other versions, allows user-assisted attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted WMF file.

name: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Long Request Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in ntdll.dll on Microsoft Windows NT 4.0, Windows NT 4.0 Terminal Server Edition, Windows 2000, and Windows XP allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, as demonstrated via a WebDAV request to IIS 5.0. CVE-2003-0109

name: Squid SNMP ASN.1 Parser Denial Of Service
description: There is a vulnerability in the way Squid web proxy parses SNMP messages. An SNMP message with specially crafted ASN.1 length fields can generate memory access violation errors. The exception generated by these errors can cause the product to restart, creating a denial of service condition for active transactions.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure ABORT_TABLE_INSTANTIATION Of DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL.ABORT_TABLE_INSTANTIATION procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure GET_OBJECT_NAME of DBMS_LOGREP_UTIL Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_LOGREP_UTIL.GET_OBJECT_NAME procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database Server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT of DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED.UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database Server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure ADD_LOGFILE Of DBMS_LOGMNR Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_LOGMNR.ADD_LOGFILE procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database Server

name: Unix Squid WCCP Message Parsing DoS
description: A vulnerability exists in the way the Squid web proxy/cache parses a Web Cache Communication Protocol (WCCP) message. A specially crafted WCCP I_SEE_YOU message can trigger a memory access exception. This flaw can be exploited to terminate the vulnerable product, creating a denial of service condition.

name: Serv-U FTPD MDTM Buffer Overflow
description: Serv-U FTP server, a popular Windows FTP server, is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. Serv-U FTP server, versions 5.0.0.4 and prior, do not correctly validate input when an FTP MDTM command is run. An attack using this vulnerability can give an attacker SYSTEM privileges on the remote server.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure CREATE_CAPTURE Of DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL.CREATE_CAPTURE procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server.

name: Symantec Veritas NetBackup bpcd.exe Command Chaining Vulnerability
description: There exists a logic error in Symantec Veritas  NetBackup products. The flaw is due to improper data validation of remotely received network messages. A remote authenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability by appending malicious commands to a valid command, which could be executed on the target system with the SYSTEM level privileges.

name: Squid FTP Server Response Handling DoS
description: squid/src/ftp.c in Squid before 2.6.STABLE7 allows remote FTP servers to cause a denial of service (core dump) via crafted FTP directory listing responses.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Message Engine Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve Backup 9.01 through 11.5, Enterprise Backup 10.5, and CA Server/Business Protection Suite r2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via RPC requests with crafted data for opnums (1) 0x2F and (2) 0x75 in the (a) Message Engine RPC service

name: NFS-Utils xlog Off-By-One Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
description: A remote exploitable buffer overrun vulnerability has been reported in the xlog component of nfs-utils. It is possible to exploit this issue via mountd. It has been reported that exploitation of this issue will most likely result in a denial of service. There is a possibility that this issue could be exploited to run arbitrary code in the context of mountd, which runs as root.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 Popup Window Address Bar Spoofing Weakness
description: Visual truncation vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar and possibly conduct phishing attacks via a malicious URL containing non-breaking spaces (%A0), which causes the address bar to omit some characters from the URL.

name: Sun Java RunTime Environment Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) and Java Runtime Environment  allow attackers to develop Java applets that read, write, or execute local files

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Portmapper TADDR2UADDR DoS
description: CA RPC Server service (catirpc.exe) for BrightStor ARCserve Backup r11.5 SP2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted TADDR2UADDR that triggers a null pointer dereference, possibly related to null credentials or verifier fields.

name: Solaris Telnetd User Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
A vulnerability exists in Solaris 10 and 11 with the telnet and login combination. 
The telnet daemon passes switches directly to the login process which looks for a switch that allows root to login to any account without a password. If your telnet daemon is running as root it allows unauthenticated remote logins.

name: Microsoft Windows MDAC ActiveX Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the ADODB.Connection ActiveX control that is provided as part of the ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and that is distributed in MDAC. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Oracle Data Control ORADC ActiveX Control Code Execution
description: There exists a code execution vulnerability in the Oracle ORADC ActiveX control. The vulnerability is caused due to improper validation of the state before performing specific operations of the the vulnerable ActvieX control name ORADC.ORADCCtrl. A remote attacker may leverage the vulnerability to to inject and execute arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged user.

name: McAfee SecurityCenter Subscription Manager ActiveX Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in McSubMgr ActiveX control (mcsubmgr.dll) in McAfee Security Center 6.0.23 for Internet Security Suite 2006, Wireless Home Network Security, Personal Firewall Plus, VirusScan, Privacy Service, SpamKiller, AntiSpyware, and QuickClean allows remote user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary commands via long string parameters, which are later used in vsprintf.

name: MIT Kerberos V5 krb5_recvauth Double Free
description: There exists a double free vulnerability in the authentication function of the MIT Kerberos V5 implementation. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or to execute arbitrary code in the context of the program calling the krb5_recvauth function. Exploitation of this vulnerability on a Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC) host can result in the compromise of an entire Kerberos realm.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect Crafted RPC Call CMON_NetTestConnection Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend MicroÆs ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary check on a crafted RPC request within the SpntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC Call ENG_SendEMail Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend MicroÆs ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary checks on crafted RPC requests within the SpntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC ENG_SetRealTimeScanConfigInfo Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend MicroÆs ServerProtect. The flaw is due to improper boundary checks on crafted RPC requests within the SpntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Mozilla Firefox OnUnload + Document.write() Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Firefox is susceptible to a seemingly pretty nasty, and apparently easily exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. When a location transition occurs and the structure of a document is modified from within onUnload event handler, freed DOM-related memory structures are left in inconsistent state, possibly leading to a remote compromise.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC Call ActiveUpdate and ActiveRollback Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend MicroÆs ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary checks on crafted RPC requests within the SpntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer OnUnload + Document.write() Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer  is susceptible to a seemingly pretty nasty, and apparently easily exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. When a location transition occurs and the structure of a document is modified from within onUnload event handler, freed DOM-related memory structures are left in inconsistent state, possibly leading to a remote compromise.

name: Mozilla Firefox Focus Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability allows the attacker to silently redirect focus of selected key press events to an otherwise protected file upload form field. This is possible because of how onKeyDown / onKeyPress events are handled, allowing the focus to be moved between the two. If exploited, this enables the attacker to read arbitrary files on victim's system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Focus Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability allows the attacker to silently redirect focus of selected key press events to an otherwise protected file upload form field. This is possible because of how onKeyDown / onKeyPress events are handled, allowing the focus to be moved between the two. If exploited, this enables the attacker to read arbitrary files on victim's system

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer VML Buffer Overflow
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Vector Markup Language (VML) implementation in Microsoft Windows. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page or HTML e-mail that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited the Web page or viewed the message. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: IpSwitch WS_FTP Server FTP Commands Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in  the IPSwitch WS_FTP Server. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation checks in the processing of the FTP XCCR, XSHA1 or XMD5 Commands. An authenticated remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer NavCancel.htm Cross Site Scripting
description:
Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.
An attacker can exploit this issue to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and obtain sensitive information.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Onunload Event Spoofing Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is caused due to an error in Internet Explorer's handling of "onunload" events, enabling a malicious website to abort the loading of a new website. This can be exploited to spoof the address bar

name: Mozilla FireFox FTP PASV Port-Scanning Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to vulnerability that may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information.A successful exploit of this issue would cause the affected application to connect to arbitrary TCP ports and potentially reveal sensitive information about services that are running on the affected computer. Information obtained may aid attackers in further attacks.

name: Squid Proxy TRACE Request DoS
description: The vulnerability is caused due to an error within the processing of TRACE requests in squid/src/client_side.c. This can be exploited to crash the service via a specially crafted TRACE request.

name: Database MySQL Single-Row Subselect DoS
description: MySQL 5.x before 5.0.37 allows local users to cause a denial of service (database crash) by using a combination of certain string functions, information_schema table subselects, and ORDER BY result sorting, which prevents certain structure elements from being initialized and triggers a NULL dereference in the filesort function.

name: Microsoft CMS Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Content Management Server because of the way it handles a specially crafted HTTP request. An attacker can submit a specially crafted HTTP request to a Content Management Server, causing AEServerObject.DLL to attempt to allocate an excessive amount of memory, possibly leading to code execution but most likely resulting in a DoS causing the Internet Information Server service to be restarted automatically (IIS5) or the application pool to be recycled (IIS6).

name: Microsoft Windows Universal Plug and Play Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Universal Plug and Play service in the way that it handles specially formed HTTP requests.

name: Mozilla Firefox Location.Hostname DOM Property Cookie Theft
description: Mozilla based browsers allows remote attackers to bypass the same origin policy, steal cookies, and conduct other attacks by writing a URI with a null byte to the hostname (location.hostname) DOM property, due to interactions with DNS resolver code.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_SNAP_INTERNAL Package
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the DBMS_SNAP_INTERNAL  package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure CHGTAB_CACHE Of DBMS_CDC_IPUBLISH Package
description: The DBMS_CDC_IPUBLISH package owned by SYS contains a procedure called CHGTAB_CACHE.This procedure is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow and is triggered by passing an overly long CHANGE_TABLE_NAME parameter.

name: Oracle Database Server XML Database Component Buffer Overflow Exploit (shell)
description: Oracle Database Buffer overflow vulnerability in public procedure DBMS_XMLSCHEMA.GENERATESCHEMA

name: Microsoft Windows Media Server MDSAuth.DLL ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution
description: The Microsoft Windows Media Server ActiveX control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue by enticing victims into opening a maliciously crafted HTML document.

name: Database Mysql IF Query DoS
description: MySQL 5.x before 5.0.40 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted IF clause that results in a divide-by-zero error and a NULL pointer dereference.

name: Samba LSA RPC LsarAddPrivilegesToAccount Crafted Request Handling Heap Overflow
description:
A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Samba handles RPC messages. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while performing "LsarAddPrivilegesToAccount" operation.Remote authenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request
to the LSA RPC interface. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows attackers to create a denial of service condition or possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected process, commonly root.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Tag Memory Corruption
description:
The vulnerability is due to a design error in the way Microsoft Internet Explorer handles a certain CSS tag. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by persuading unsuspecting users to visit a specially crafted Web site.
Successful exploitation would corrupt system memory, allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the logged in user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Layout Engine pathSegList.getItem Memory Corruption
description: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Mozilla Foundation's family of browser products. The flaw is due to improper data processing when handling crafted SVG content. Successful exploitation of this issue can cause a denial of service condition and may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the target browser.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Tape Engine RPC Procedure Memory Corruption
description: The Tape Engine in CA (formerly Computer Associates) BrightStor ARCserve Backup 11.5 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via certain RPC procedure arguments, which results in memory corruption.

name: MIT Kerberos kadmind RPC Library Uninitialized Pointer Code Execution
description: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in the Kerberos Administration Server (kadmind). The vulnerability is due to insufficient validating of user-supplied data while processing RPC requests. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the kadmind daemon. Successful exploitation may lead to executing arbitrary code with root privileges on the target host.

name: CA Products Ingres Database uuid_from_char Stack Buffer Overflow
description:
There exists a buffer overflow flaw in the way the Ingres Database server handles uuid_from_char request.
This vulnerability can be exploited by mailicious users to execute arbitrary codes on the affected system and hence compromise it.

name: Microsoft Windows Active Directory Malformed LDAP Request DoS
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Active Directory validates a crafted LDAP request

name: IPSwitch WS_FTP Logging Server Daemon Denial of Service
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way WS_FTP Logging Server Daemon handles WS_FTP logging requests. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service on the affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows Schannel Security Package Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There exists a heap corruption vulnerability in the way Windows Schannel validates server-sent digital signatures on a client machine . The vulnerability is due to insufficient checks performed on server-sent digital signatures during SSL handshakes. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by persuading target users to visit a specially crafted web site. Successful exploitation would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target system with system level privileges.

name: Oracle SQL Compiler Access Control Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: There exists a privilege escalation vulnerability in Oracle SQL Compiler due to improper enforcement of user permissions on data access to tables through certain types of views. A remote authenticated attacker may use this vulnerability to perform UPDATE, DELETE and INSERT operations without having proper privileges.

name: CA Antivirus Console Server Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the inoweb Console Server in CA Anti-Virus for the Enterprise r8, Threat Manager r8, Anti-Spyware for the Enterprise r8, and Protection Suites r3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long (1) username or (2) password.

name: Multiple Vendor BSD ftpd glob() Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflows in BSD-based FTP servers allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a long pattern string containing a {} sequence, as seen in (1) g_opendir, (2) g_lstat, (3) g_stat, and (4) the glob0 buffer as used in the glob functions glob2 and glob3.

name: Mozilla Firefox _cairo_pen_init Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the _cairo_pen_init function in Mozilla Firefox 2.x before 2.0.0.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large stroke-width attribute in the clipPath element in an SVG file.

name: Mozilla Firefox "wyciwyg://" Handler Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox before 2.0.0.5 does not perform a security zone check when processing a wyciwyg URI, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information, poison the browser cache, and possibly enable further attack vectors via (1) HTTP 302 redirect controls, (2) XMLHttpRequest, or (3) view-source URIs.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer PDWizard ActiveX Object Memory Corruption
description: A race condition issue exists in the way PDWizard ActiveX object destroys itself when page is closed. It leads to memory corruption which might crash Internet Explorer or lead to a remote code execution.

name: Microsoft XML Core Services Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft XML Core Services that could allow an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability to take complete control of the affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows OLE Automation Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: There is a remote code execution vulnerability in Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) Automation that could allow an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability to take complete control of the affected system.

name: Mozilla JavaScript Handling Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox before 1.5.0.8, Thunderbird before 1.5.0.8, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript bytecode via unspecified vectors involving modification of a Script object while it is executing.

name: CA eTrust Intrusion Detection "caller.dll" ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
description: The CallCode ActiveX control in caller.dll 3.0 before 20070713, and 3.0 SP1 before 3.0.5.81, in CA (formerly Computer Associates) eTrust Intrusion Detection allows remote attackers to load arbitrary DLLs on a client system, and execute code from these DLLs, via unspecified "scriptable functions."

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC NTF_SetPagerNotifyConfig Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary check on a crafted RPC request within the spntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Mozilla Firefox URLBar Null Byte File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to bypass file type checks via a (1) file:/// or (2) resource: URI with a dangerous extension, followed by a null byte (%00) and a safer extension.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect SPNT Engine RPC Buffer Overflows
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary check on a crafted RPC request within the spntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC RPCFN_CMON_SetSvcImpersonateUser Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary check on a crafted RPC request within the spntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPCFN Engine RPC Buffer Overflows
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro ServerProtect. The flaw is due to the improper boundary check on a crafted RPC request within the spntSvc service. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

name: Microsoft Windows Explorer JPG File Denial of Service Vulnerability
description:
Microsoft Windows Explorer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.

An attacker could exploit this issue to cause Explorer to crash, effectively denying service. Arbitrary code execution may be possible, but this has not been confirmed.

This issue affects Windows Explorer on Microsoft Windows XP; other operating systems and versions may also be affected.

name: Mozilla Firefox SVG Scale Transform Integer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in parameters to SVG scale transform in the layout engine for Mozilla Firefox 2.x before 2.0.0.1, 1.5.x before 1.5.0.9, Thunderbird before 1.5.0.9, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.7 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Position:Relative DoS
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to handle certain HTML code. This issue is triggered when a remote attacker entices a victim user to visit a malicious website. Attackers may exploit this issue to crash Internet Explorer, effectively denying service to legitimate users. This issue affects Internet Explorer 6.

name: MIT Kerberos kadmind RPC Library RPCSEC_GSS Authentication Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in MIT Kerberos Administration Server (kadmind). The vulnerability is due to boundary error when processing RPC requests. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the kadmind daemon. Successful exploitation may lead to executing arbitrary code with root privileges on the target host.

name: MS05-044 FTP client vulnerability
description: This rule prevents MS FTP clients from downloading files that have embedded "\" characters in them, which might cause the files to over-write files in other directories.

name: Computer Associates iTechnology iGateway Service Content-Length Buffer Overflow
description: Remote exploitation of an input validation error in Computer Associates, Inc.'s iTechnology allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code. The vulnerability specifically exists in the iGateway service that listens on port 5250 for standard HTTP or SSL traffic. The iGateway service fails to properly handle negative HTTP Content-Length values. iGateway parses the negative content-length value from an HTTP request and uses the value directly in a malloc() heap allocation call. By supplying negative values, the heap allocation call will return a very small buffer. Subsequent to the malloc() call, a memcpy of the supplied URI into the allocated buffer can overflow into the heap. A remote attacker can send a request with a very large URI and a negative content-length to corrupt the heap and potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: EMC Dantz Retrospect Backup Agent Denial of Service
description: A Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability exists in the EMC Retrospect Backup agent. This vulnerability is a result of improper handling of specially crafted packets. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to terminate, preventing the backups from occurring on that system.

name: Veritas NetBackup vmd Shared Library Buffer Overflow
description:
A vulnerability has been reported in VERITAS NetBackup, which can be exploited by malicious people to cause a DoS (Denial of Service) and potentially to compromise a vulnerable system.
The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in a shared library used by the vmd (Volume Manager Daemon). This can be exploited to cause a DoS by disrupting the backup process and potentially to execute arbitrary code on an affected system via the vmd daemon.

name: Veritas NetBackup bpjava-msvc Remote Format String Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been identified in VERITAS NetBackup servers and clients, which could be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands. This flaw is due to a format string error in the Java authentication service "bpjava-msvc" that does not properly handle a specially crafted "COMMAND_LOGON_TO_MSERVER" command (port 13722), which could be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands with root/SYSTEM privileges.

name: Veritas NetBackup Volume Manager Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Symantec VERITAS NetBackup products. The flaw is due to insufficient boundary protection in the processing of volume manager communications. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

name: NAI ePolicy Orchestrator Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A new, privately reported vulnerability has been discovered in NAI ePolicy Orchestrator which can be exploited by attackers to compromise a vulnerable system. It may be noted that an exploit for this zero-day vulnerability has been released in Immunity CANVAS.

name: Veritas NetBackup vnetd Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Symantec VERITAS NetBackup product line. The vulnerability is a result of the lack of boundary checks during the processing of certain messages to the vnetd service. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with system level privileges.

name: UltraVNC VNCLog Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the UltraVNC server. The vulnerability is caused by improper validation of user supplied requests sent to the affected component. A successful attack can result in the termination of the UltraVNC service.

name: Microsoft Windows SMB Response Handling Buffer Overflow
description:
There exists a vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Server Message Block (SMB) client component. A specially crafted SMB server response of certain SMB commands can cause a buffer overflow condition in the affected product. A remote attacker exploiting the vulnerability can create a system
denial of service or inject and execute code with system level privileges.

name: Solaris sadmind AUTH_SYS Credential Remote Command Execution
description: Sun Microsystems Solaris contains a flaw that may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands. The issue is due to a flaw in the sadmind daemon's handling of AUTH_SYS requests. If an attacker sends a specially crafted Remote Procedure Call (RPC) packet, they may be able to forge the AUTH_SYS credentials. This would allow the execution of arbitrary commands with root privileges.

name: Security Vulnerabilities in the Oracle Diagnostics Web pages and Java Class
description: The most significant security change in this patch is the implementation of function security, which limits access to the diagnostics tests. Prior to this patch, some of the diagnostics tests could be accessed without even logging into Oracle Applications. Also, many implementations have enabled unrestricted access to the diagnostics by setting DIAGNOSTICS_SECURITY_SWITCH=OFF in the jserv.properties file.

name: Buffer Overflow in MySQL User Defined Functions
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the init_syms function in MySQL 4.0 before 4.0.25, 4.1 before 4.1.13, and 5.0 before 5.0.7-beta allows remote authenticated users who can create user-defined functions to execute arbitrary code via a long function_name field.

name: MySQL MaxDB Webtool GET Command Buffer Overflow
description:
There exists a vulnerability in MySQL MaxDB Webtool. The flaw is caused by insufficient boundary validation when the Webtool processes crafted HTTP requests. This vulnerability can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system with privileges of the wahttp service process. 
CVE-2005-0684

name: Oracle Application Server Reports desname Arbitrary File Overwriting
description: There exists a file overwriting vulnerability in Oracle Reports Services, a component of Oracle Application Server. The flaw is caused by invalid check of the of CGI parameter

name: Read parts of any XML-file via customize parameter in Oracle Reports
description:
The Oracle Reports parameter customize can read any file by using an absolute or relative file name.
Parts of the file content are displayed in the Reports error message

name: Read parts of any file via desformat in Oracle Reports
description:
The Oracle Reports parameter desformat can read any file by using an absolute or relative file name.
Parts of the file content are displayed in the Reports error message

name: IBM Lotus Domino Server Denial of Service Vulnerability
description:
Evgeny Legerov has discovered a vulnerability in Lotus Domino, which can be exploited by malicious people to cause a DoS (Denial of Service).

The vulnerability is caused due to an error in the LDAP server within the handling of certain requests. This can be exploited to crash the service via a specially-crafted request sent to port 389/tcp.

name: MS SQL Hello Overflow
description:
vulnerability exists in Microsoft SQL Server associated with user authentication.
Microsoft SQL Server listens for connections on TCP port 1433. Using the HELLO command, a remote attacker can send a specially malformed login request to an affected server on TCP port 1433. The SQL Server function that handles authentication requests may be subject to a buffer overflow because it fails to check the length of the login request.

name: Sun Directory Server LDAP Denial of Service
description:
There exists a vulnerability in the Sun Directory Server. The flaw is caused due to improper handling of certain overly large LDAP messages. An unauthenticated remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by
sending a crafted LDAP message to the target host which may terminate the affected LDAP server on the target system.

name: Solaris LPD Arbitrary File Delete
description: A vulnerability in the Solaris line printer daemon allows remote attackers  to delete arbitrary files on an affected system. This can be used to exploit the rpc.walld format string flaw, the missing krb5.conf authentication bypass, or simple delete system files.

name: Solaris LPD Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: The print protocol daemon, 'in.lpd' (or 'lpd'), shipped with Solaris may allow for remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands on target hosts with superuser privileges. It has been reported that it is possible to execute commands on target hosts through lpd by manipulating the use of sendmail by the daemon. If this vulnerability is successfully exploited, remote attackers can execute any command on the target host with superuser privileges.

name: MySQL mysqld Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description: MySQL 3.23.55 and earlier creates world-writeable files and allows mysql users to gain root privileges by using the "SELECT * INFO OUTFILE" operator to overwrite a configuration file and cause mysql to run as root upon restart, as demonstrated by modifying my.cnf.

name: Various Cross-Site-Scripting Vulnerabilities in Oracle Reports
description:
Oracle Reports is Oracle's award-winning, high-fidelity enterprise reporting tool.

It enables businesses to give immediate access to information to all levels within and outside of the
organization in an unrivaled scalable and secure environment. Oracle Reports, a component of the Oracle
Application Server, is used by Oracle itself for the E-Business Suite. Many large customers are using Oracle
Reports as reporting tool for their enterprise applications.

The Oracle Reports parameter customize can read any file by using an absolute or relative file name.
Parts of the file content are displayed in the Reports error message (see test case).

http://www.red-database-security.com/advisory/oracle_reports_various_css.html

name: Microsoft SQL Server Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description:
Reportedly Microsoft SQL Server is affected by a remote denial of service vulnerability. This issue is due to a failure of the application to handle irregular network communications.

http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/11265/discuss
http://downloads.securityfocus.com/vulnerabilities/exploits/MSsqlDenialOfServicePOC.c

name: Cisco IP Phone Denial of Service
description: This filter detects a known malformed SIP packet that causes the screen to stop responding on Cisco IP Phones running with vulnerable software.

name: Shutdown TNS Listener via Oracle Forms Servlet
description: The forms servlet can be used to stop the (unprotected) TNS Listener.

name: Cross-Site-Scripting Vulnerability in Oracle XMLDB
description:
Oracle XML DB is a feature of the Oracle Database.
It provides a high-performance, native XML retrieval and storage technology.
It fully absorbs the W3C XML data model into the Oracle Database, and provides new standard access methods for navigating and querying XML.

Oracle XML DB is vulnerable against cross site scripting.

name: Cross Site Scripting in iSQLPlus logon parameter
description:
The logon parameter of the iSQL*plus login mask is vulnerable against Cross Site Scripting.
http://www.red-database-security.com/exploits/oracle-isqlplus-css-logon-parameter.html

name: Cross Site Scripting in iSQLPlus action parameter
description:
Cross Site Scripting in iSQLPlus action parameter
The action parameter of the iSQL*plus login mask is vulnerable against Cross Site Scripting.
http://www.red-database-security.com/exploits/oracle-isqlplus-css-action-parameter.html

name: FreeFTPd/SSHd 1.0.9/10 Key Exchange Algorithm Buffer Overflow
description: This flaw is due to a buffer overflow error when handling a specially crafted key exchange algorithm string received from an FTP/SSH client.

name: MySQL MaxDB Webtool Remote 'If' Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Remote exploitation of a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in
MySQL MaxDB could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.

The vulnerabiltiy specifically exists because of a lack of bounds
checking in the WebDAV functionality of the web tool. When an attacker
issues an HTTP request with the unlock method, along with a long "If"
parameter string

name: Apache Web Server Linefeed Memory Allocation Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A memory leak in Apache 2.0 through 2.0.44 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via large chunks of linefeed characters, which causes Apache to allocate 80 bytes for each linefeed.

name: MS-SQL Slammer Worm
description: A problem in the SQL Server Resolution Service makes it possible for a remote user to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable host. An attacker could exploit a heap-based overflow in the resolution service by sending a maliciously crafted UDP packet to port 1434.

name: UltraVNC 1.0.1 Client Buffer Overflow
description:
UltraVNC is susceptible to multiple error-logging remote buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. These issues are due to the application's failure to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to insufficiently sized memory buffers.

A successful attack may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer to gain unauthorized access in the context of the application.

name: PuTTy <= v0.53 Buffer Overflow
description: This filter protects against  a buffer overflow in the PuTTY SSH client that is triggered through a validation error in SSH.c.

name: MySQL Server Date_Format Function Format String Vulnerability
description: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in the MySQL database server. The problem is caused by an incorrect handling of the arguments passed to the built-in SQL function

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HHCtrl.ocx Image Property Heap Corruption
description: There exists a heap memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer application. The flaw is caused by an improper check during processing a specially crafted "Image" property. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer "IsComponentInstalled()" Remote Stack Overflow
description:
A vulnerability has been identified in Internet Explorer allowing malicious attackers to execute remote code on affected systems.

The vulnerability exists due to stack based overflow in the isComponentInstalled function.

name: DirectAnimation.DATuple Nth Function crash
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer instantiates COM objects that are not intended to be instantiated in Internet Explorer. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited the specially crafted Web site.

A potentially exploitable issue exists in an ActiveX component.  DirectAnimation.DATuple in danim.dll is affected.

name: DirectAnimation.DATuple CLASSID Block
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer instantiates COM objects that are not intended to be instantiated in Internet Explorer. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited the specially crafted Web site.

A potentially exploitable issue exists in an ActiveX component.  DirectAnimation.DATuple in danim.dll is affected.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer MHTML URI Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Microsoft Internet Explorer product. The flaw is caused by an improper check of the MHTML URI string. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition. A code execution attack is not possible as a stack integrity feature is present in the affected application.

name: SQL Monitoring Service Hex08 Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple buffer overflows in SQL Server 2000 Resolution Service allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via UDP packets to port 1434 in which (1) a 0x04 byte causes the SQL Monitor thread to generate a long registry key name, or (2) a 0x08 byte with a long string causes heap corruption.

name: SQL Monitoring Service Registry Key Buffer Overflow
description:
Microsoft's database server SQL Server 2000 exhibits two buffer overrun
vulnerabilities that can be exploited by a remote attacker without ever
having to authenticate to the server. What further exacerbates these issues
is that the attack is channeled over UDP. Whether the SQL Server process
runs in the security context of a domain user or the local SYSTEM account,
successful exploitation of these security holes will mean a total compromise
of the target server and its data.

name: IBM Tivoli Directory Server LDAP Buffer Overflow
description:
A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the IBM Tivoli Directory Server. The vulnerability is caused by a failure to properly verify the length of an object in an LDAP message. An attacker may leverage this issue by sending a crafted LDAP message to terminate a vulnerable Tivoli Directory
Server, or to inject arbitrary code which will be executed in the security context of the Tivoli Directory Server process.

name: CSS Letter-Spacing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: Integer overflow in Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird 1.x before 1.5.0.2 and 1.0.x before 1.0.8, Mozilla Suite before 1.7.13, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large number in the CSS letter-spacing property that leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: MySQL MaxDB WebDBM Server Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in MySQL AB MaxDB. The vulnerability resides inside the WebDBM component and is due to insufficient boundary check on the database name provided by the remote user. An unauthenticated remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code under the privileges of the Database WebDBM server

name: Memory corruption via a particular sequence of HTML tags
description: A vulnerability in the way Mozilla products and derivative programs handle certain HTML tags could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system.

name: Privilege escalation via XBL.method.eval
description: A vulnerability in the way Mozilla products and derivative programs handle certain XBL methods could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system.

name: OuterHTML Redirection Handling Information Disclosure
description: Cross-domain vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 allows remote attackers to access restricted information from other domains via an object tag with a data parameter that references a link on the attacker's originating site that specifies a Location HTTP header that references the target site, which then makes that content available through the outerHTML attribute of the object, aka "Redirect Cross-Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability."

name: document.getElementByID Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by using the document.getElementByID Javascript function to access crafted Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) elements, and possibly other unspecified vectors involving certain layout positioning combinations in an HTML file.

name: MoBB #17: Gradient StartColorStr
MoBB #24: Forms.ListBox.1 ListWidth
MoBB #8: RDS.DataControl URL
description: RDS.DataControl object copies the URL parameter from javascript using the SysAllocStringLen routine in OLE32.dll. On Windows 2000, this can lead to an invalid length calculation that results in a memory read going beyond the end of the page

name: Microsoft Windows NNTP Component Buffer Overflow
description: A vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows Network News Transfer Protocol (NNTP) component. The vulnerability exists in the parsing and translating methods of the NNTP XPAT and SEARCH commands parameters. Leveraging this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

name: Sybase EAServer Remote Stack Overflow
description:
A vulnerability has been discovered in Sybase EAServer. If exploited, this can result in user-specified code being executed under the security context of the jagsrv.exe process. To complete this attack, attacker must be authenticated to /WebConsole/. By default, the jagadmin user password is set to blank so getting access might be trivial.
After authenticating to /WebConsole/ if an attacker sets the value of the JavaScript parameter in TreeAction.do to a large value a return address can be overwritten due to a stack-based buffer overflow.

name: CA Message Queuing Buffer Overflow
description:
Computer Associates Message Queuing (CAM) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. This issue is due to a failure in the application to perform proper bounds checking on user-supplied data.

A successful attack can cause the process's execution stack to overflow and may ultimately lead to the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. This may facilitate privilege escalation to SYSTEM level privileges.

name: Novell GroupWise Messenger Accept-Language Buffer Overflow
description: The specific flaw exists within the Novell Messaging Agent, a web server that listens by default on TCP port 8300. Insufficient length checks during the parsing of long parameters within the Accept-Language header results in an exploitable stack overflow under the context of the SYSTEM user.

name: Oracle iSQL*Plus Buffer Overflow
description: SQL*Plus is an interactive and batch query tool that is installed with every Oracle Database Server or Client installation. A heap overflow vulnerability exists in iSQL*Plus - a browser-based interface that uses the SQL*Plus processing engine.

name: Sendmail Signal Race Vulnerability
description: Sendmail contains a vulnerability which allows an attacker to remotely compromise the machine on which it is running. The vulnerability does not require authentication and can be attempted repeatedly without crashing the parent Sendmail process. The problem is due the unsafe implementation of a signal handler which does not safely synchronize access to important process variables.

name: MySQL CREATE FUNCTION Remote Code Execution
description: MySQL 4.0.23 and earlier, and 4.1.x up to 4.1.10, allows remote authenticated users with INSERT and DELETE privileges to execute arbitrary code by using CREATE FUNCTION to access libc calls.

name: MySQL CREATE FUNCTION mysql.func Table Library Injection
description: MySQL 4.0.23 and earlier, and 4.1.x up to 4.1.10,  has a vulnerability that allows remote authenticated users with INSERT and DELETE privileges to load arbitrary libraries and use the injected functions.

name: Mozilla Products Graphics And XML Features Integer Overflow
description: There exists an integer overflow in certain versions of Mozilla products. The vulnerability exists in the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) rendering engine. A remote attacker may leverage the vulnerability by enticing the victim to visit a malicious web page. Exploitation may lead to memory corruption which can result in denial of service or execution of arbitrary code under the security context of the currently logged in user.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In AQ_TABLE_DEFN_UPDATE
description: A parameter passed to the AQ_TABLE_DEFN_UPDATE procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In BFILENAME Function
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the BFILENAME may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In CREATE_POLICY
description: Buffer overflow in LBAC_SYSDBA.CREATE_POLICY, SA_SYSDBA.CREATE_POLICY

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_APPLY_ADM_INTERNAL, DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL Packages
description:
Parameters passed to the DBMS_APPLY_ADM_INTERNAL, DBMS_CAPTURE_ADM_INTERNAL
procedure greater than 30 characters may overflow a buffer in the Oracle database server.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_AQADM Package
description: A parameter passed to the functions VERIFY_QUEUE_TYPES_GET_NRP and VERIFY_QUEUE_TYPES_NO_QUEUE may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_AQADM_SYSCALLS,DBMS_AQADM_SYS Packages
description: Q_SCHEMA, OWNER, QUEUE_NAME parameters passed to the SYS.DBMS_AQADM_SYS, SYS.DBMS_AQADM_SYSCALLS packages greater than 30 characters may overflow a buffer in the Oracle Database Server.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of DBMS_REPCAT Package
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the DBMS_REPCAT package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Multiple Procedures Of MD2 Package
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the MDSYS.MD2 package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In String Conversion Functions
description: A parameter passed to some String conversion may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In TZ_OFFSET function
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the TZ_OFFSET package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In TNS Listener
description: Buffer overflow in Transparent Network Substrate (TNS) Listener in Oracle 8i 8.1.7 and earlier allows remote attackers to gain privileges via a long argument to the commands (1) STATUS, (2) PING, (3) SERVICES, (4) TRC_FILE, (5) SAVE_CONFIG, or (6) RELOAD.

name: Oracle Database Server Parent Directory Access Vulnerability
description: Parent directory access using CREATE LIBRARY

name: Oracle Database Server BFILENAME Parent directory access Vulnerability
description: Parent directory access using bfilename

name: Oracle Database Server Read-only User can Modify Data Via Views Vulnerability
description: A user with SELECT object privilege on base tables can delete rows from a view

name: Oracle Database Server Access Validation Vulnerability In DBMS_EXPORT_EXTENSION package
description: Oracle Database Server Access Validation Vulnerability In DBMS_EXPORT_EXTENSION package

name: Oracle Database Server Extproc File Path Environment overflow
description: Extproc file path environment overflow

name: Oracle Database Server UTL_FILE Parent directory access Vulnerability
description: Parent directory access using UTL_FILE package

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In VERIFY_LOG Procedure Of DBMS_SNAPSHOT_UTL Package
description:
A parameter passed to the DBMS_SNAPSHOT_UTL.VERIFY_LOG
procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In MAP_LOCALE_TO_ISO Procedure Of UTL_i18N Package
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the  SYS.UTL_I18N package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In CWM2_OLAP_AW_AWUTIL Procedure Of OLAPSYS Package
description: A parameter passed to some procedures in the OLAPSYS.CWM2_OLAP_AW_AWUTIL package may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In OPTION_NUMBER Procedure Of LBAC_CACHE Package
description: Oracle Database lbacsys.lbac_cache.OPTION_NUMBER overflow attack

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In SDO_CODE_SIZE Procedure Of SDO_ADMIN Package
description: A parameter passed to the function MDSYS.SDO_ADMIN.SDO_CODE_SIZE may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure KSDWRT Of DBMS_SYSTEM Package
description: A parameter passed to the DBMS_SYSTEM.KSDWRT function may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure VERIFY_QUEUE_TYPES Of DBMS_AQADM_SYS Package
description: A parameter passed to the VERIFY_QUEUE_TYPES procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure PUSHDEFERREDTXNS Of LTUTIL Package
description: A parameter passed to the PUSHDEFERREDTXNS procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In Procedure PARALLEL_PUSH_RECOVERY Of DBMS_DEFER_INTERNAL_SYS Package
description: A parameter passed to the PARALLEL_PUSH_RECOVERY procedure may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Oracle Database Server Memory Corruption In DBMS_REPUTIL.RAW_TO_VARCHAR2
description: Memory corruption vulnerability in DBMS_REPUTIL.RAW_TO_VARCHAR2

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer FTP Client Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer interprets certain responses from FTP servers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending specially crafted FTP responses in an FTP session to the FTP client included in Internet Explorer.

name: Database MySQL Crash Via A MATCH AGAINST Query
description: MySQL before 4.0.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a MATCH AGAINST query with an opening double quote but no closing double quote.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Urlmon COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by instantiating certain COM objects from Urlmon.dll, which triggers memory corruption.

name: Oracle Database Server DRILOAD Access Validation Vulnerability
description: Oracle Database Server 8.1.7.4 through 9.2.0.4 allows local users to execute commands with additional privileges via the ctxsys.driload package, which is publicly accessible.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In SDO_CODE_SIZE And VALIDATE_GEOM Procedures Of MD2 Package
description: Boundary errors within the "SDO_CODE_SIZE" and "VALIDATE_GEOM" procedures of the "MD2" package can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow by passing an overly long "LAYER" parameter.

name: Oracle 9i XDB FTP PASS Overflow
description: It can cause a stack based buffer to overflow by supplying it with an overly long password argument.

name: Oracle XDB FTP Service UNLOCK Buffer Overflow
description: An exploit for the XDB FTP Services component in Oracle9i was publicly released and appears to targeting arbitrary Internet hosts. The vulnerability being exploited is a buffer overflow which could result in giving a remote attacker the ability to execute arbitrary code that could result in a Denial of Service attack and/or give the attacker the ability to capture an active user(s) session.

name: Mozilla Firefox Encoded Status Bar Spoofing Weakness
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a weakness that may allow an attacker to obfuscate a malicious link. By obfuscating the true destination of a malicious link, the attacker may be able to launch further attacks. Mozilla Firefox 2.0.0.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

name: Microsoft DirectX Media SDK FlashPix ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the Live Picture Corporation DXSurface.LivePicture.FlashPix.1 (DirectTransform FlashPix) ActiveX control in DXTLIPI.DLL 6.0.2.827, as packaged in Microsoft DirectX Media 6.0 SDK, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long SourceUrl property value.

name: Microsoft SQL Server Distributed Management Objects Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Distributed Management Objects component of Microsoft SQL Server.The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while handling an overly large argument passed to a vulnerable method of the Distributed Management Objects library "sqldmo.dll". A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious web page. Successful exploitation would cause a buffer overflow condition which may lead to arbitrary code injection and execution in the security context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Microsoft Agent Crafted URL Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Agent application. The flaw is due to wrongfully copying an overly large string to a fixed size stack buffer within the code of agentdpv.dll Dynamic Link Library. By persuading the target user to open a malicious web page, an attacker may execute arbitrary code on the target system within the privileges of the currently logged on user.

name: Symantec Antivirus Remote Stack Buffer Overflow DNS Query
description: Blocking DNS Query for phatcamp.org. Without being able to connect to this site, the worm does not propagate and launch attacks to any other machines.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect TMregChange Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the TMregChange function in TMReg.dll in Trend Micro ServerProtect before 5.58 Security Patch 4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet to TCP port 5005.

name: MIT Kerberos kadmind RPC Library Unix Authentication Buffer Overflow
description:
There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in the Kerberos Administration Server (kadmind). The vulnerability is due to an integer conversion error in the RPC library. A remote unauthenticated attacker can
exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the kadmind daemon. Successful exploitation may lead to execution of arbitrary code with root privileges on the target host.

name: Ipswitch WS_FTP Server Script Insertion Vulnerability
description: Parameters passed to valid FTP commands are not properly sanitized before the command is logged. This can be exploited to insert arbitrary HTML and script code, which is executed in the administrator's browser session in context of the administrative web interface when the malicious logs are viewed.

name: Multiple Vendor Message Decompression DoS
description: A vulnerability exists within the DNS components used by multiple vendors. An attacker can craft a DNS message that can cause a vulnerable component to enter an infinite loop. An attacker can exploit this flaw to create a denial of service condition on products which use the vulnerable components.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer ActiveX bgColor Property DoS
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by improper handling of the bgColor, fgColor, linkColor, alinkColor, vlinkColor or defaultCharset properties in the ActiveX controls of MSHTML.DLL or TRIEDIT.DLL. By convincing a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could trigger a NULL pointer dereference and cause the victim's browser to crash.

name: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops rxrLogin Username Overflow
description: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops contains multiple vulnerabilities that can allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code.

name: Symantec Norton Internet Security and Personal Firewall ActiveX Control BoF
description: Buffer overflow in the ISAlertDataCOM ActiveX control in ISLALERT.DLL for Norton Personal Firewall 2004 and Internet Security 2004 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via long arguments to the (1) Get and (2) Set functions.

name: Mozilla Firefox createRange() Remote DoS
description: Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service by creating a range object using createRange, calling selectNode on a DocType node (DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE), then calling createContextualFragment on the range, which triggers a null dereference.

name: MIT Kerberos kadmind Rename Principal Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in the Kerberos Administration Server (kadmind). The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary check while handling requests to rename principals. A remote authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the kadmind daemon. Successful exploitation may lead to execution of arbitrary code with root privileges on the target host

name: Microsoft Agent Remote Code Execution
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Agent (msagent\agentsvr.exe) in Windows 2000 SP4, XP SP2, and Server 2003, 2003 SP1, and 2003 SP2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted URLs, which result in memory corruption.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Address Bar Spoofing Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 on Windows XP SP2 allows remote attackers to prevent users from leaving a site, spoof the address bar, and conduct phishing and other attacks via repeated document.open function calls after a user requests a new page, but before the onBeforeUnload function is called.

name: Microsoft Outlook Express and Windows Mail NNTP Response Command Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Outlook Express and Windows Mail for Microsoft Vista, due to an incorrectly handled malformed NNTP response.

name: Windows Shell User Logon ActiveX Control Create Method Vulnerability
description: The Windows Shell User Logon ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to create user accounts on victim computers. Exploiting this issue can aid in further attacks and may result in the compromise of affected computers.

name: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Arbitrary File Upload
description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability exists within unauthenticated communication with rxRPC.dll, accessible via TCP/1900. So, by using "..\" within the filename, an arbitrary file can be written to an arbitrary directory using SYSTEM-level privileges.

name: ClamAV Mail Filter Extension Crafted Recipient Command Execution
description: A shell command injection vulnerability exists in ClamAV AntiVirus product. The vulnerability can be triggered when the application processes malicious SMTP commands. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by delivering a crafted request to the target host, resulting in command injection and execution with privileges of the affected ClamAV application.

name: Symantec Antivirus Remote Stack Buffer Overflow
description: A stack overflow in Symantec Client Security and Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition could potentially allow a remote or local attacker to execute code on the affected machine.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect EarthAgent RPC RPCFN_CopyAUSrc Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Trend Micro ServerProtect handles DCE-RPC messages. The vulnerable component is the EarthAgent (EarthAgent.exe) daemon. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system with System level privileges.

name: Microsoft Word Smart Tag Object Pointer Vulnerability
description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in Word XP and Word 2003. An object pointer in the Smart Tag data structure is read while parsing a Word document. In certain error conditions, the pointer that was contained within
the document is used directly as a real object pointer to call a method on the object. This pointer can be manipulated to execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Excel Crafted URL Unicode Buffer Overflow
description: A perl script is publicly available that exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Excel by creating a workbook which contains a very long URL. Once the user clicks on the URL, Excel will crash.

name: Microsoft Excel URL Unicode Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Excel. The vulnerability is caused by improper sanitization of a Unicode string specifically hyperlinks. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted Excel file, which will enable the attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code within the security context of the target user.

name: Microsoft Word 2000 Unspecified Code Execution
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Word allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on Word 2000, and cause a denial of service (crash) on Word 2003, via unknown attack vectors, as exploited by Trojan.Mdropper.W.

name: Microsoft Word RTF Documents Parsing Remote Code Execution
description: A potentially exploitable remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Word parses certain rich text properties within a file.

name: Microsoft Excel Sheet Name Memory Corruption
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Excel 2003 SP2 allows remote attackers to have an unknown impact via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Word handles specially crafted Word files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Word file with a malformed string. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer Playlist Handling Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Database Component in MPAMedia.dll in RealNetworks RealPlayer 10.5 and 11 beta allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, as demonstrated via the import method to the IERPCtl ActiveX control in ierpplug.dll.

name: Microsoft Windows NT 4.0 DHCP Server Request Buffer Overflow
description: The DHCP Server service for Microsoft Windows NT 4.0 Server and Terminal Server Edition does not properly validate the length of certain messages, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed DHCP message.

name: CA Products Ingres Database Communications Server Component Heap Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the (1) Communications Server (iigcc.exe) and (2) Data Access Server (iigcd.exe) components for Ingres Database Server 3.0.3, as used in CA (Computer Associates) products including eTrust Secure Content Manager r8 on Windows, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Mozilla Firefox XBL Event Handler Tags Removal Memory Corruption
description: Multiple vulnerabilities in Mozilla Firefox before 2.0.0.8 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via crafted HTML that triggers memory corruption or assert errors.

name: Samba LSA RPC API_LSA_LOOKUP_SIDS Heap Overflow
description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Samba handles RPC messages. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while performing specific RPC operations. Remote authenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the LSA RPC interface. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected process

name: Database MySQL Connection Protocol Malformed Password Packet DoS
description: MySQL Community Server before 5.0.45 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a malformed password packet in the connection protocol.

name: Adobe Acrobat Mailto PDF File Command Execution Vulnerability
description: The URL handling in Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, with Windows Internet Explorer 7 installed, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary programs via invalid "%" sequences in a mailto: or other URI handler, as demonstrated using mIRC, Outlook, Firefox, Adobe, Skype, and other applications.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Message Engine Stack Overflow
