description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the demux_open_vqf function in libmpdemux/demux_vqf.c in MPlayer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed TwinVQ file.

name: Web On Windows ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution
description: Web on Windows (WOW) ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to overwrite arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code on the victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control.

name: RealNetworks Helix Server RTSP SETUP Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way RealNetworks Helix Server handles RTSP requests. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending malicious RTSP SETUP requests to the affected server. As a result of processing the malicious command, a stack-based buffer overflow can be triggered which may result in injection and execution of arbitrary code within the security privileges of the vulnerable service on the target system, normally System.

name: Microsoft Word 2007 WWLib.DLL Unspecified Document File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in wwlib.dll in Microsoft Word 2007 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted document.

name: Office Viewer ActiveX Control Remote File Vulnerability
description:
There exists an arbitrary program download and execution vulnerability in multiple Office OCX ActiveX controls. The vulnerability is due to insecure design of the OpenWebFile() method in the controls that allows
downloading and execution of arbitrary executables. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a target user to visit a specially crafted web page.

name: MSN MSNP2P Message Integer Overflow
description: Multiple integer overflows in the msn_slplink_process_msg functions in the MSN protocol handler in Pidgin before 2.4.3. This can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed SLP message.

name: Mozilla Firefox Location.Hash Denial Of Service
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to denial of Service when passed with very long value to a parameter which causes Mozilla Firefox to stop responding.

name: AXIS Communications Camera Control image_pan_tilt Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the CamImage.CamImage.1 ActiveX control in AxisCamControl.ocx in AXIS Camera Control allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long image_pan_tilt property value.

name: NCTVideoStudio ActiveX Remote Heap Overflow
description: NCTVideoStudio Server is prone to a remote Heap overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: Microsoft Word PROJECT Stream Module Key Overflow
description: There exists a stack overflow in the VBA scripting engine in the Module name of PROJECT OLE stream. Although it appears like only earlier versions of Word are at risk, the key indicator is the version of VBE6.dll (version 6.4.9972 is earliest safe version) that is resident on the host.

name: WinFTP LIST Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Win FTP Server is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.An
attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: OpenOffice '.doc' File Remote Denial Of Service
description: OpenOffice is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to open a specially crafted '.doc' file.Successfully exploiting this issue will cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Attackers may also be able to run arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

name: Literal Processing Vulnerability
description:
A denial of service vulnerability exists in the EMSMDB2 (Electronic Messaging System Microsoft Data Base, 32 bit build) provider because of the way it handles invalid MAPI commands. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a specially crafted MAPI command to the application using the EMSMDB32 provider. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the application to stop responding.
The denial of service vulnerability also affects the Microsoft Exchange System Attendant since it uses the EMSMDB32 provider. The Microsoft Exchange System Attendant is one of the core services in Microsoft Exchange and performs a variety of functions related to the on-going maintenance of the Exchange system.

name: Easy Grid ActiveX Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description: Easy Grid ActiveX is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that let attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content. Successful exploits will compromise affected computers and will aid in further attacks.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player ASX PlayList File Heap Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the WMCheckURLScheme function in WMVCORE.DLL in Microsoft Windows Media Player (WMP) 10.00.00.4036 on Windows XP SP2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a long HREF attribute, using an unrecognized protocol, in a REF element in an ASX PlayList file and possibly other Windows Media Metafiles including WAX, WVX, and WMX files.

name: Oracle Database SYS.OLAPIMPL_T Package ODCITABLESTART Buffer Overflow
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle OLAP component in Oracle Database allows remote authenticated users to affect availability, related to SYS.OLAPIMPL_T.

name: Free Download Manager .torrent File Parsing Multiple Buffer Overflows
description: Multiple buffer overflows in the torrent parsing implementation in Free Download Manager (FDM) allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via (1) a long file name within a torrent file, (2) a long tracker URL in a torrent file, or (3) a long comment in a torrent file.

name: JamDTA ActiveX Control 'SaveToFile()' Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description: JamDTA ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to corrupt and overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control .

name: IDAutomation Barcode ActiveX Controls Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description: An attacker can exploit these issues by enticing an unsuspecting victim to view a malicious HTML page. Successfully exploiting these issues will allow the attacker to corrupt and overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control.

name: LinkedIn Browser Toolbar ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the IEToolbar.IEContextMenu.1 ActiveX control in LinkedInIEToolbar.dll in the LinkedIn Toolbar allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long second argument (varBrowser argument) to the search method.

name: Toshiba Surveillance Surveillix DVR 'MeIpCamX.DLL' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Surveillix DVR 'MeIpCamX.DLL' ActiveX control is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Successfully exploiting these issues allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions

name: Nokia Phoenix Service Software ActiveX Controls Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Nokia Phoenix Service Software ActiveX controls are prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because they fail to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into insufficiently sized memory buffers.
An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application that invoked the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent RCPT Command Buffer Overflow
description: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, possibly with root or SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: McAfee Viruscan GetUserRegisteredForBackend McSubMgr.DLL ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: McAfee Viruscan McSubMgr.DLL ActiveX control is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform sufficient boundary checks on user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

name: Apple iTunes/QuickTime Malformed '.mov' File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Apple iTunes and QuickTime are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the applications fail to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Denial Of Service
description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Mozilla Firefox allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to the layout engine and destruction of arbitrary layout objects by the nsViewManager::Composite function.

name: Free Download Manager Remote Control Server HTTP Authorization Header Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Remote Control Server in Free Download Manager (FDM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long Authorization header in an HTTP request.

name: Microsoft WordPad '.doc' File Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: WordPad is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to open a specially crafted '.doc' file. Successfully exploiting this issue will cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Form Value Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to crash the browser, which will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: TightVNC VNCViewer Authenticate Buffer Overflow
description: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in TightVNC VNCViewer. The flaw is due to improper validation of length value in network message. A remote attacker might trigger this vulnerability by persuading the target user to connect to a malicious VNC server. In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. The code in such a case would execute within the security context of the logged in user. In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected application will terminate abnormally.

name: FFmpeg 4xm Processing Memory Corruption
description: Integer signedness error in the fourxm_read_header function in FFmpeg allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed 4X movie file with a large current_track value, which triggers a NULL pointer dereference.

name: GeoVision LiveX ActiveX Control 'SnapShotToFile()' Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description:
GeoVision LiveX ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content.
An attacker can exploit this issue to corrupt and overwrite arbitrary files on a victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer).

name: FathFTP ActiveX Control 'DeleteFile()' Method Arbitrary File Delete Vulnerability
description: FathFTP ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers delete arbitrary files on the affected computer in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Successful attacks can result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Engine Memory Corruption Denial Of Service
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to the JavaScript engine.

name: UltraVNC VNCViewer Authenticate Buffer Overflow
description: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in multiple Virtual Network Computing (VNC) based applications, including UltraVNC VNCViewer. The flaw is due to improper validation of length value in network message. A remote attacker might trigger this vulnerability by persuading the target user to connect to a malicious VNC server. In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. The code in such a case would execute within the security context of the logged in user. In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected application will terminate abnormally.

name: Synactis ALL In-The-Box ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description: Synactis ALL In-The-Box ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers overwrite arbitrary local files on the victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer).

name: McAfee Security Center McSubMgr.DLL ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The 'McSubMgr.DLL' ActiveX control shipped with McAfee Security Center is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. The software fails to perform sufficient boundary checks of user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

name: Adobe Acrobat PDF Font Processing Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat and earlier allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document that (1) performs unspecified actions on a Collab object that trigger memory corruption, related to a GetCosObj method; or (2) contains a malformed PDF object that triggers memory corruption during parsing.

name: Research In Motion BlackBerry Application Web Loader ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the Research in Motion RIM AxLoader ActiveX control in AxLoader.ocx and AxLoader.dll in BlackBerry Application Web Loader 1.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified use of the load or loadJad method.

name: MW6 Barcode ActiveX Barcode.dll Remote Heap Overflow
description: MW6 Technologies Barcode ActiveX control is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to adequately check boundaries on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control. Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox Nested 'window.print()' Denial Of Service
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Excel Unspecified Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Excel is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue by enticing victims into opening a maliciously crafted Excel file. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft SQL Server Hello Authentication Buffer Overflow
description: This detects the exploit included in the Metasploit Framework for a buffer overflow in the MS SQL server.

name: Microsoft DNS Server WPAD Registration Spoofing
description: A man-in-the-middle attack vulnerability exists in Windows DNS servers where dynamic update is used and ISATAP and WPAD are not already registered in DNS. This vulnerability could allow a remote authenticated attacker to spoof a web proxy thereby redirect Internet traffic to an address of the attacker's choice.

name: WINS Server Vulnerability In WPAD Registration
description: A man-in-the-middle attack vulnerability exists in Windows DNS servers where dynamic update is used and ISATAP and WPAD are not already registered in DNS. This vulnerability could allow a remote authenticated attacker to spoof a web proxy thereby redirect Internet traffic to an address of the attacker's choice.

name: Mozilla Firefox "cloned XUL DOM elements" Arbitrary Code Execution
description: Double free vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via "cloned XUL DOM elements which were linked as a parent and child," which are not properly handled during garbage collection.

name: Adobe Flash Player SWF File 'DeclareFunction2' Actionscript Tag Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability when handling certain embedded ActionScript objects. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Invalid Object Reference Remote Code Execution
description: Adobe Flash Player does not properly remove references to destroyed objects during Shockwave Flash file processing, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

name: Adobe Flash Player 'asfunction' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ActionScript in arbitrary Shockwave Flash (SWF) files created by Adobe Dreamweaver, when the Insert Flash Video feature is used, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an asfunction: URI in the skinName parameter.

name: Microsoft Windows CHM File Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because of an issue when processing CHM files.
Successfully exploiting this issue would allow attackers to corrupt memory and crash the application associated with these files. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to run arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

name: Mozilla Firefox Layout Engine Denial Of Service
description: The layout engine in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via certain vectors that trigger memory corruption and assertion failures.

name: Novell eDirectory Management Console Accept-Language Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Novell eDirectory. The flaw is due to a boundary error when processing HTTP requests. By supplying an overly large number of values for the Accept-Language header, a remote unauthenticated attacker can leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System or root level privileges.

name: Mozilla Firefox "HTML escaped low surrogates" XSS Attack
description: Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to bypass cross-site scripting (XSS) protection mechanisms and conduct XSS attacks via HTML-escaped low surrogate characters that are ignored by the HTML parser, as demonstrated by a "jav&#56325ascript" sequence, aka "HTML escaped low surrogates bug."

name: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Engine Denial Of Service
description: The JavaScript engine in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via (1) a splice of an array that contains "some non-set elements," which causes jsarray.cpp to pass an incorrect argument to the ResizeSlots function, which triggers memory corruption; (2) vectors related to js_DecompileValueGenerator, jsopcode.cpp, __defineSetter__, and watch, which triggers an assertion failure or a segmentation fault; and (3) vectors related to gczeal, __defineSetter__, and watch, which triggers a hang.

name: Adobe Flash Player Multimedia File Remote Buffer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player 9.0.115.0 and earlier, and 8.0.39.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SWF file with a negative Scene Count value, which passes a signed comparison, is used as an offset of a NULL pointer, and triggers a buffer overflow.

name: Microsoft HTML Help Workshop '.hhp' File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft HTML Help Workshop allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a .hhp file with a long "Index file" field.

name: Allscripts TouchWorks Information Disclosure
description: The TouchWorks web application may disclose database authentication information to the client.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup LGServer Stack Overflow
description: Multiple buffer overflows in CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops r11.0 through r11.1 SP1, Mobile Backup r4.0, Desktop and Business Protection Suite r2, and Desktop Management Suite (DMS) r11.0 and r11.1 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Apache MS-DOS Device Name Vulnerability
description: Apache before 2.0.44, when running on unpatched Windows 9x and Me operating systems, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via an HTTP request containing MS-DOS device names.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Tape Engine Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve Backup 9.01 through 11.5, Enterprise Backup 10.5, and CA Server/Business Protection Suite r2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via RPC requests with crafted data for opnum 0xCF in the Tape Engine service.

name: IBM Lotus Domino LDAP Server Invalid DN Message Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the LDAP server in IBM Lotus Domino before 6.5.6 and 7.x before 7.0.2 FP1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a long, malformed DN request, which causes only the lower 16 bits of the string length to be used in memory allocation.

name: IPSwitch IMail SELECT Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the IMAP server for Ipswitch IMail 8.12 and 8.13, and other versions before IMail Server 8.2 Hotfix 2, allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a SELECT command with a large argument.

name: ISC DHCPD NSUPDATE Format String
description: Format string vulnerabilities in the logging routines for dynamic DNS code (print.c) of ISC DHCP daemon (DHCPD) 3 to 3.0.1rc8, with the NSUPDATE option enabled, allow remote malicious DNS servers to execute arbitrary code via format strings in a DNS server response.

name: MailEnable Append Command Remote Buffer Overflow
description:
MailEnable is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data. 
An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition

name: MailEnable IMAP "STATUS" Command Buffer Overflow
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the IMAP service (MEIMAPS.exe) when handling the STATUS command. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow by passing an overly long string as mailbox name to the STATUS command. A stack buffer overflow occurs if the mailbox name contains more than 264 bytes.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer RealPlayer Ierpplug.DLL ActiveX Buffer Overflow
description: The RealPlayer ActiveX control is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the software fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer.

name: MySQL str_to_date DoS
description:
MySQL str_to_date Null Parameter DoS,  A query like "select str_to_date( 1, NULL );" crashes mysqld.
http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=15828
http://seclists.org/lists/bugtraq/2006/Jun/0388.html

name: UOW IMAP4 LIST, COPY, RENAME, FIND And LSUB Command Overflow
description: A remote overflow exists in the University of Washington IMAP server. The IMAP server fails to verify input length of arguments to the  LIST, COPY, RENAME, FIND, and LSUB commands resulting in buffer overflows.

name: MySQL XML Functions Scalar XPath Denial Of Service
description: A vulnerability exists in MySQL database engine. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of XML functions used in SQL statements. A remote authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to the target host. Successful exploitation would be a denial of service (DoS) condition of MySQL database services on the target host.

name: Sopcast SopCore 'SetExternalPlayer()' ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Sopcast SopCore is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application that uses the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: RealNetworks Helix Server RTSP DESCRIBE Heap Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way RealNetworks Helix Server handles RTSP requests. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a malicious RTSP request with a crafted Proxy-Require to the affected server. As a result of processing the malicious command, a heap-based buffer overflow can be triggered which may result in injection and execution of arbitrary code within the security privileges of the vulnerable service on the target system.

name: Oracle Database Trigger MDSYS.SDO_TOPO_DROP_FTBL SQL Injection Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Spatial component in Oracle Database allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft GDI+ EMF 'GpFont.SetData()' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft GDI+ is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that occurs when an application that uses the library tries to process a specially crafted EMF (Enhanced Metafile) image file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Layout Engine nsCSSStyleSheet::GetOwnerNode Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: The layout engine in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to nsCSSStyleSheet::GetOwnerNode, events, and garbage collection, which triggers memory corruption.

name: Orbit Downloader ActiveX Control 'download()' Method Arbitrary File Delete Vulnerability
description: Orbit Downloader ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers delete arbitrary files on the affected computer in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Successful attacks can result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox '_moveToEdgeShift' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors triggered by clicking on a link.

name: SupportSoft DNA Editor Module ActiveX Control Insecure Method Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: SupportSoft DNA Editor Module ActiveX control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately validate user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application running the affected control (typically Internet Explorer).

name: PostgreSQL Conversion Encoding Remote Denial Of Service
description: PostgreSQL is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow attackers to terminate connections to the PostgreSQL server, denying service to legitimate users.

name: GeoVision LiveAudio ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: GeoVision LiveAudio ActiveX Control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the vulnerable ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer).

name: Sun Java Web Start Splashscreen GIF Processing Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in Java SE Development Kit (JDK) and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) exists which can allow remote attackers to access files or execute arbitrary code via a crafted GIF image.

name: Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Oracle Database Server SQL Injection In GRANT_TYPE_ACCESS Procedure Of DBMS_AQADM_SYS Package
description: The PL/SQL package DBMS_AQADM_SYS has an instance of SQL Injection. A malicious user can call a vulnerable procedure of this package with specially crafted parameters and execute SQL statements with the elevated privileges of the SYS user.

name: Sun Java Web Start Splashscreen GIF Decoding Buffer Overflow
description: Sun Java Web Start and Java Plug-in for JDK and JRE allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted jnlp file.

name: Sun Java Runtime Environment GIF Parsing Memory Corruption
description: Buffer overflow in Java SE Development Kit (JDK) and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) allows remote attackers to access files or execute arbitrary code via a crafted GIF image.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player MID File Parsing Integer Overflow
description: Microsoft Windows Media Player is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by tricking an unsuspecting victim into opening a malicious file with the vulnerable application. A successful exploit will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service.

name: Sun Java Applet Font.createFont Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) and SDK allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) by using the Font.createFont function to create temporary files of arbitrary size in the %temp% directory.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft GDI Plugin PNG File Infinite Loop Denial Of Service
description: Microsoft GDI is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability when processing a malformed PNG file. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause an infinite loop, which will consume processing resources, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer due to attempts to access uninitialized memory in certain situations. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Oracle RDBMS TNS Listener Denial Of Service
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Listener component in Oracle Database allows remote attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors.

name: IBM eGatherer ActiveX RunEgatherer Function Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a vulnerability in the eGatherer ActiveX control, which is included with the IBM Access Support application. The vulnerability is a result of insufficient verification of user input to the  RunEgatherer  function, which results in a stack buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a crafted web page, consequently injecting and executing code that will run with the privileges of the currently logged-in user.

name: IBM DB2 Database Server Invalid Data Stream Denial Of Service
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the server in IBM DB2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (trap) via a crafted data stream.

name: Sun Java Web Start Splashscreen PNG Processing Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in Java SE Development Kit (JDK) and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) allow remote attackers to access files or execute arbitrary code via a crafted PNG image that triggers an integer overflow during memory allocation during display on the splash screen.

name: MIT Kerberos asn1_decode_generaltime() Uninitialized Pointer Memory Corruption
description: The asn1_decode_generaltime function in lib/krb5/asn.1/asn1_decode.c in the ASN.1 GeneralizedTime decoder in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors involving an invalid DER encoding that triggers a free of an uninitialized pointer.

name: Word 2000 WordPerfect 6.x Converter Stack Corruption Vulnerability
description: The WordPerfect 6.x Converter in Microsoft Office Word 2000 SP3 and Microsoft Office Converter Pack does not properly validate the length of an unspecified string, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WordPerfect 6.x file, aka "Word 2000 WordPerfect 6.x Converter Stack Corruption Vulnerability."

name: Microsoft Excel Data Validation Record Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Excel processes data validation records when loading Excel files into memory. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed file which could be hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site, or included as an e-mail attachment.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Image Processing Argument Handling Memory Corruption
description: Unspecified vulnerability in an ActiveX control (dxtmsft.dll) in Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.01, 6 SP1 and SP2, and 7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted image, aka "Argument Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarmsrv Integer Overflow
description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Network Node Manager software. The flaw is due to improper validation while processing specially crafted requests sent to the ovalarmsrv.exe server. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target server.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player MIDI File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows Media Player is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability when processing a malformed MIDI file. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to enter an infinite loop, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Mozilla Firefox Malformed JPEG File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. This issue affects Mozilla FireFox 3 running on Ubuntu Linux 8.04; other versions running on different platforms may also be affected.

name: Adobe Reader JavaScript getAnnots Method Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Reader is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability that occurs due to insufficient input validation in the implementation of the getAnnots JavaScript method. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious PDF file.

name: Symantec Fax Viewer Control Remote Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Symantec Fax Viewer. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to view a malicious web page. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary execution with privileges of the current logged in user.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'nsTextFrame::ClearTextRun()' Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. A remote attacker can create a specially crafted HTML which when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in nsTextFrame::ClearTextRun() and potentially execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the target user.

name: Symantec Norton Ghost 'EasySetupInt.dll' ActiveX Remote Denial Of Service
description: Symantec Norton Ghost EasySetup Wizard ActiveX control is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. A successful attack allows an attacker to crash the application using the affected control, causing denial-of-service conditions. The attacker may also be able to run arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 ClickJacking Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer which takes the form of embedded code or script that can execute without the user's knowledge, such as clicking on a button that appears to perform another function.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client Generic String Handling Buffer Overflow
description: A vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client (dsmagent.exe) in the generic string handling function. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a string longer than 1025 characters contained in a specially crafted request packet.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer MP3 File Handling Remote Denial Of Service
description: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to handle specially crafted files. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the application, denying further service to legitimate users.

name: PowerPoint 7 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file that could be hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: PP7 Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: BaoFeng Storm ActiveX Control 'OnBeforeVideoDownload()' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in BaoFeng Storm ActiveX control because the application fails to adequately check boundaries on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed attacks will likely result in denial-of-service condition.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Client dsmagent.exe NodeName Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in dsmagent.exe in the Remote Agent Service in the IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) client and the TSM Express client allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via (1) a request packet that is not properly parsed by an unspecified "generic string handling function" or (2) a crafted NodeName in a dicuGetIdentifyRequest request packet, related to the (a) Web GUI and (b) Java GUI.

name: McAfee GroupShield For Microsoft Exchange X-header Scan Evasion Vulnerability
description: McAfee GroupShield for Microsoft Exchange on Exchange Server and possibly other anti-virus or anti-spam products from McAfee or other vendors, does not scan X- headers for malicious content, which allows remote attackers to bypass virus detection via a crafted message.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) ovalarmsrv.exe Malformed Values Denial Of Service
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (NNM) is exposed to a denial of service condition caused due to an overflow in the EIP register. Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player WAV File Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description: Microsoft Windows Media Player is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities when processing malformed WAV files. A remote attacker can exploit these issues to cause the affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

name: IceWarp Merak Mail Server Groupware Component Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in the search form in server/webmail.php in the Groupware component in IceWarp eMail Server and WebMail Server allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the sql and order_by elements in an XML search query.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Denial Of Service
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to multiple vulnerabilities affecting the 'ovalarmsrv.exe' and 'ovtopmd.exe' processes. Attackers can exploit these issues to access potentially sensitive data on the affected computer or to deny service to legitimate users.

name: PrecisionID Data Matrix Barcode ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description: Multiple insecure method vulnerabilities in the PrecisionID Datamatrix ActiveX control (DMATRIXLib.Datamatrix) allow remote attackers to overwrite arbitrary files via the SaveBarCode and SaveEnhWMF methods.

name: Request URI Length Restriction
description: Restricts length of SIP request URI portion. Customers are recommended to customize the maximum allowed length for specific environment.

name: BaoFeng (config.dll) ActiveX Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in BaoFeng Storm ActiveX control because the application fails to adequately check boundaries on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer).

name: Allowed Authorization Schemes In SIP Requests
description: This filter restricts authorization schemes inside of a SIP request message. In some cases if a authorization scheme is unexpected, it may confuse or crash a SIP implementation. Customers are strongly recommended to customize to allowed list for their specific environment.

name: Autodesk IDrop ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Autodesk IDrop ActiveX is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that let attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content. Successful exploits will compromise affected computers and will aid in further attacks.

name: Sun Java System Delegated Administrator "HELP_PAGE" HTTP Response Splitting
description: A vulnerability has been reported in Sun Java System Delegated Administrator, which can be exploited by malicious people to conduct HTTP response splitting attacks. Input passed to the "HELP_PAGE" parameter in /da/DA/Login is not properly sanitized before being returned to the user. This can be exploited to insert arbitrary HTTP headers, which are included in a response sent to the user. This allows arbitrary HTML and script code to be executed in a user's browser session in context of an affected site.

name: Microsoft SQL Convert Buffer Overrun
description: Buffer overflow in the convert function in Microsoft SQL Server 7.0 SP4, 2000 SP4, 2005 SP2, Microsoft Data Engine (MSDE) 1.0 SP4, SQL Server 2000 Desktop Engine (MSDE 2000) SP4, and 2005 Express Edition SP2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SQL expression.

name: Apple QuickTime Image Description Atom Sign Extension Memory Corruption
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Apple QuickTime. The vulnerability is due to improper processing of Image Description Atoms in Apple Video files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted QuickTime movie file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

name: Roxio CinePlayer IAManager.dll Remote Buffer Overflow
description: Roxio CinePlayer is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: Roxio CinePlayer SonicMediaPlayer.dll Remote Buffer Overflow
description: Roxio CinePlayer is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: Adobe Acrobat Stack Exhaustion Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Adobe Acrobat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to crash, effectively denying service. Arbitrary code execution may be possible, but has not been confirmed.

name: Sun Solaris 'sadmind' Daemon RPC Request Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in sadmind in Sun Solaris 8 and 9 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted RPC request, related to improper decoding of request parameters.

name: ICQ 'ICQToolBar.dll' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: ICQ is prone to a denial of service vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause an affected application (e.g. Windows Explorer) to crash, effectively denying service.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Remote Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft IIS Hex Encoded WebDAV Requests Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the way that the WebDAV extension for IIS handles HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially crafted anonymous HTTP request to gain access to a location that should require authentication.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Security Zone Bypass Vulnerability
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer caches data and incorrectly allows the cached content to be called, potentially bypassing Internet Explorer domain restriction. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the Web page. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could view content from the local computer or another browser window in another domain or Internet Explorer zone.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Race Condition Cross-Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Race condition in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or perform other actions upon a page transition, with the permissions of the old page and the content of the new page which is aka the "bait & switch vulnerability."

name: DHTML Object Memory Corruption
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer displays a Web page that contains certain unexpected method calls to HTML objects. As a result, system memory may be corrupted in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code if a user visited a specially crafted Web site. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'keygen' HTML Tag Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to cause the browser to stop responding, thus denying service to legitimate users.

name: SAP AG SAPgui 'sapirrfc.dll' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
SAP AG SAPgui is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. 
Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an application that uses the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: File Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Works for Windows document converters handle specially crafted Works files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted .wps file. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

name: Multiple Symantec Products Alert Management System Console Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A design error exists in Symantec Alert Management System Console component shipped with Symantec software. The vulnerability is due to a design error in XFR.EXE while transferring files to AMS2. This can be exploited by remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the target host. Successful exploitation will lead to arbitrary files being executed within the context of System on the Windows platform. The behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the code executed.

name: Mozilla Firefox Cross Domain Scripting Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a cross domain scripting issue due to an error in the handling of "file:" URIs  which can be exploited to access any domain's cookies saved on the local machine.

name: Asterisk IAX 'POKE' Requests Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The IAX2 protocol implementation in Asterisk Open Source, Business Edition, AsteriskNOW and Appliance Developer Kit allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (call-number exhaustion and CPU consumption) by quickly sending a large number of IAX2 (IAX) POKE requests.

name: Sun Solaris 'sadmind' Daemon Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
An integer overflow error exists in Sun Solaris 'sadmind' Daemon when allocating memory for incoming 'sadmind' requests. This can be exploited to cause a heap-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted RPC request.

Successful exploitation of the vulnerabilities can lead to  execution of arbitrary code.

name: Apple QuickTime Obji Atom Parsing Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Apple QuickTime application. The vulnerability is due to improper processing of obji atoms in QuickTime movie files. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by providing a crafted QuickTime movie file to the target user, causing abnormal termination of the application or potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Unclamped Loop Denial Of Service
description: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service. By assigning the Radius value of the Circle attribute an overly large value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerbaility to cause the browser to enter into a loop resulting in a denial of service.

name: Mozilla Firefox SSL Tampering Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox uses the HTTP Host header to determine the context of a document provided in a non-200 CONNECT response from a proxy server, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary web script by modifying this CONNECT response, aka an "SSL tampering" attack.

name: McAfee naPolicyManager.dll ActiveX Arbitrary Data Write Vulnerability
description:
The WriteTaskDataToIniFile method doesn't check if it's being called from the
application or from a malicious user. A Remote Attacker could craft a 
html page and overwrite arbitrary files in a system.

name: Apple QuickTime CRGN Atom Denial Of Service
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a local denial of service vulnerability which is caused due to stack overflow error while parsing Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types in a movie file. Successful exploitation can crash an affected application or execute malicious code.

name: IceWarp Merak Mail Server 'Forgot Password' Input Validation Vulnerability
description: CRLF injection vulnerability in the Forgot Password implementation in server/webmail.php in IceWarp eMail Server and WebMail Server makes it easier for remote attackers to trick a user into disclosing credentials via CRLF sequences preceding a Reply-To header in the subject element of an XML document, as demonstrated by triggering an e-mail message from the server that contains a user's correct credentials, and requests that the user compose a reply that includes this message.

name: Yahoo! Widgets Engine YDPCTL.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Yahoo! Widgets Engine is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: OpenSSL DTLS Remote Memory Exhaustion DoS
description:
Multiple memory leaks in the dtls1_process_out_of_seq_message function in ssl/d1_both.c in OpenSSL 0.9.8k and earlier 0.9.8 versions allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via DTLS records.
This is a heuristics based rule and most likely indicates that an attack is currently underway. Administrators are advised to investigate the events.

name: CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine Denial Of Service
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine due to insufficient data validation. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted RPC packets to the target server.

name: CUPS 'cups/ipp.c' NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service
description:
CUPS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because of a NULL-pointer dereference that occurs when processing two consecutive IPP_TAG_UNSUPPORTED tags in specially crafted IPP (Internet Printing Protocol) packets.

An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: SonicWALL SSL-VPN 'cgi-bin/welcome/VirtualOffice' Remote Format String Vulnerability
description:
Multiple SonicWALL SSL-VPN devices are prone to a remote format-string vulnerability because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input before passing it as the format specifier to a formatted-printing function.
Attackers may exploit this issue to run arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts may cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Page Transition Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer handles transition when navigating between Web pages. As a result, system memory may be corrupted in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code if a user visited a specially crafted Web site. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Apache Tomcat Java AJP Connector Invalid Header Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the server to end up in an error state, denying service to legitimate users.

name: IBM DB2 Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description: IBM DB2 is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the server and deny service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Windows 'MPEG2TuneRequest' Object Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability that affects the TV Tuner library. An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to visit a maliciously crafted website. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: OpenSSL 'ChangeCipherSpec' DTLS Packet Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability caused by a NULL-pointer dereference condition. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Object Memory Corruption Remote Code Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Large GIF File Background Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability while handling large GIF files when it used as a body background. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial of service conditions.

name: RADIUS OTP Bypass Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in ISA Server 2006 when configured with RADIUS OTP. The vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated user to access any web published resource. With the knowledge of administrator account usernames, an attacker could take complete control of systems which is relying on the ISA Server 2006 Web publishing rules for authentication.

name: Embedded OpenType Font Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows Embedded OpenType (EOT) font technology parses name tables in specially crafted embedded fonts.  If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Office Publisher Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Publisher opens, imports, and converts files created in versions older than Microsoft Office Publisher 2007. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted Publisher file that could be included as an e-mail attachment, or hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site. If a user were logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Publisher Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Publisher opens, imports, and converts files created in versions older than Microsoft Office Publisher 2007. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted Publisher file that could be included as an e-mail attachment, or hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site. If a user were logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer AddFavorite Remote Denial Of Service
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Reports indicate that this issue may be used to corrupt process memory and be leveraged to execute code, but this has not been confirmed.

name: MySQL 'sql_parse.cc' Multiple Format String Vulnerabilities
description: MySQL is prone to multiple format-string vulnerabilities. Attackers can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the vulnerable application. Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Edraw PDF Viewer Component ActiveX Insecure Method Vulnerability
description: Insecure method vulnerability in the PDFVIEWER.PDFViewerCtrl.1 ActiveX control (pdfviewer.ocx) in Edraw PDF Viewer Component allows remote attackers to create and overwrite arbitrary files via a URL argument to the FtpConnect argument and a target filename argument to the FtpDownloadFile method.

name: Embedded OpenType Font Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows Embedded OpenType (EOT) font technology parses data records in specially crafted embedded fonts.  If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Sun One WebServer 6.1 JSP Source Viewing Vulnerability
description: Sun One WebServer is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability, which could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information.

name: Adobe Acrobat, Reader And Flash Player Unspecified Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat and Adobe Flash Player, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Flash application in a .pdf file.

name: Oracle Secure Enterprise Search search_p_groups Cross-Site Scripting
description: Oracle Database is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability that affects the Secure Enterprise Search component. Input passed to the 'search_p_groups' in Oracle Secure Enterprise Search is not properly sanitized before being returned to the user. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a user's browser session in context of an affected site.

name: Multiple Browsers 'javascript:' URI In 'Refresh' Header Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in multiple browsers because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the user running the application and to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and other sensitive data that may aid in further attacks.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to multiple remote memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to corrupt memory on the affected computer and run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles a memory object. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Remote Code Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles table operations in specific situations. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Office Web Components Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Office Web Components is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability that affects Office Web Components Spreadsheet ActiveX control. An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to visit a maliciously crafted site. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Oracle Database Server Workspace Manager Multiple SQL Injection
description: Oracle Database Server product are prone to Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. The vulnerabilities are due to insufficient sanitization of input parameters in the Oracle Workspace Manager component. A remote attacker may leverage these vulnerabilities to inject and execute SQL code with escalated privileges.

name: Oracle BEA Weblogic Server console-help.portal Cross-Site Scripting
description: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. A successful exploitation may lead to execution of arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site allowing attackers to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. An attacker with 'WLS Console Package' privileges can exploit this issue.

name: Mozilla Firefox 3.5 Unicode Remote Buffer Overflow
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.The vulnerability is caused due to an error in the JIT (Just-in-Time) compiler when returning from an "escape()" function and can be exploited to trigger a memory corruption.Successful exploitation allows execution of arbitrary code.

name: Mozilla Firefox Error Page Address Bar URI Spoofing Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is affected by a URI-spoofing vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue by inserting arbitrary content to spoof a URI presented to an unsuspecting user. This may lead to a false sense of trust because the victim may be presented with a URI of a seemingly trusted site while interacting with the attacker

name: Apple QuickTime NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker will exploit this issue by enticing a user to visit a malicious site. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine RPC Opcode 59 Denial Of Service
description: CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine is prone to a denial of service vulnerability which is caused due to insufficient data validation. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted message to the target server.

name: Oracle Database Network Authentication Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Network Authentication component in Oracle Database allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Mozilla Firefox nsXULTemplateQueryProcessorRDF::CheckIsSeparator Denial Of Service
description: The nsXULTemplateQueryProcessorRDF::CheckIsSeparator function in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to loading multiple RDF files in a XUL tree element.

name: Oracle Database Listener Component Denial Of Service
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Listener component in Oracle Database allows remote attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors.

name: Mozilla Firefox Location Bar And SSL Indicator Spoofing Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar, and possibly conduct phishing attacks, via a crafted web page that calls window.open with an invalid character in the URL, makes document.write calls to the resulting object, and then calls the stop method during the loading of the error page.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Excel ActiveX Control JavaScript Code Remote Denial Of Service
description: There exists a remote denial-of-service vulnerability in Microsoft Excel for Windows. Attackers can exploit this issue to deny access to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Remote Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Chrome Privilege Escalation
description: The nsDocument::SetScriptGlobalObject function in content/base/src/nsDocument.cpp in Mozilla Firefox when certain add-ons are enabled, does not properly handle a Link HTTP header, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript with chrome privileges via a crafted web page, related to an incorrect security wrapper.

name: Squid Proxy Invalid HTTP Response Status Code Denial Of Service
description: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in the way Squid handles HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to a error when handling malformed HTTP responses. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by accessing a malicious web server via the target Squid proxy. Successful attack could create a denial of service condition to the target server.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Remote Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to multiple remote memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to corrupt memory on the affected computer and run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Workstation Service Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the Windows Workstation Service due to a possible "Double Free" condition occurring in the service. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

name: Office Web Components Heap Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Office Web Components ActiveX Control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Mozilla Firefox ConstructFrame With Floating First-letter Memory Corruption
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox web browser, which is caused due to an implementation error when handling the first letter frame. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious web page.

name: BIND Dynamic Update DoS
description: The dns_db_findrdataset function in db.c in named in ISC BIND, when configured as a master server, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via an ANY record in the prerequisite section of a crafted dynamic update message.

name: Microsoft Wordpad Denial Of Service
description: Microsoft Wordpad (on Windows XP SP3) contains a vulnerability that can allow an attacker to cause a denial of service. The vulnerability is due to a memory exhaustion error when a user tries to view a malicious .RTF file. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by creating a malicious RTF file that will allocate large amounts of memory and cause a denial of service condition.

name: Remote Desktop Connection ActiveX Control Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Terminal Services Client ActiveX control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited that page. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: WINS Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the default configuration of the Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) due to insufficient validation of data structures within specially crafted WINS network packets received from a trusted WINS replication partner.

name: AVI Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Windows handles specially crafted AVI format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted AVI file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Office Web Components Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Office Web Components ActiveX Control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Telnet Credential Reflection Vulnerability
description: The Telnet service in Microsoft Windows allows remote Telnet servers to execute arbitrary code on a client machine by replaying the NTLM credentials of a client user.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'nsViewManager.cpp' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: nsViewManager.cpp in Mozilla Firefox 3.0.2 through 3.0.10 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via vectors related to interaction with TinyMCE.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 8 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Office Web Components HTML Script Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Office Web Components ActiveX Control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page.
