description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Silverlight and Microsoft .NET Framework CLR Virtual Method Delegate Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft .NET Framework that can allow a specially crafted Microsoft .NET application or a specially crafted Silverlight application to access memory, leading to arbitrary unmanaged code execution.

name: Word RTF Parsing Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Word parses rich text data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the local user.

name: Event Handler Cross-Domain Vulnerability
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow script to gain access to a browser window in another domain or Internet Explorer zone. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the Web page and then interacts with the browser window using the mouse.

name: Word RTF Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Word parses certain rich text data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the local user.

name: Apple Safari RSS Feed Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an RSS feed.

name: Microsoft Silverlight Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Silverlight is vulnerable to application crashes or remote code execution when handling certain pointers.

name: MS Excel Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: HTML Layout Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Shell ActiveX Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Windows contains multiple ActiveX controls that are prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers overwrite files with arbitrary, attacker-controlled content. Successfully exploiting these issues will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the victim's computer in the context of the vulnerable application using the ActiveX control.

name: Microsoft Visual Studio VCMUTL.dll Unicode ActiveX Buffer Overflow
description: Microsoft Visual Studio is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in one of the ActiveX control. This buffer overflow can allow an attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code run with the privileges of the logged in user.

name: Novell Teaming ajaxUploadImageFile Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Novell Teaming. The flaw is due to an input validation when parsing image uploads. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by uploading a maliciously crafted file.

name: Ipswitch IMail Server Mailing List 'imailsrv.exe' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Ipswitch IMail Server is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Oracle Secure Backup Administration property_box.php Other Variable Command Injection
description: Due to improper filtering the "other" parameter the property_box.php script found in Oracle Secure Backup is vulnerable to command injection.

name: Internet Explorer 8 'toStaticHTML()' HTML Sanitization Bypass Weakness
description: Internet Explorer 8 is prone to a security-bypass weakness. Internet Explorer 8 includes a method designed to sanitize executable script constructs from HTML. Attackers can bypass this protection, allowing script code to execute on the client, for example in a 'postMessage' call.

name: Adobe Acrobat/Reader 'maxp' Font Parsing Integer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in CoolType.dll in Adobe Reader and Acrobat, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a TrueType font with a large maxCompositePoints value in a Maximum Profile (maxp) table.

name: Multiple Browser Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in multiple browsers. Attackers can exploit this issue by sending malicious requests.

name: Oracle MySQL 'ALTER DATABASE' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MySQL allows remote authenticated users with alter database privileges to cause a denial of service via an ALTER DATABASE command, which causes MySQL to move certain directories to the server data directory.

name: MS Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader is prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Oracle Secure Backup Administration objectname Variable Command Injection
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Secure Backup allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft Office Property Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Office 2003 SP1 and SP2, Office XP SP3, Office 2000 SP3, and other products, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via an Office file with a malformed property that triggers memory corruption related to record lengths.

name: HHCTRLLib (hhctrl.ocx) Remote BOF Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in Microsoft HTML Help Control program. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web page.

name: Apple Safari Webkit Button First-Letter Style Rendering Code Execution
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in WebKit in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via vectors related to HTML buttons.

name: Apple Webkit SVG First-Letter Style Remote Code Execution
description:
WebKit in Apple Safari accesses uninitialized memory during processing of the (1) :first-letter and (2) :first-line pseudo-elements in an SVG text element, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted document. 

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Apple Webkit SVG Floating Text Element Remote Code Execution
description:
WebKit in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a floating element in an SVG document.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Apple Webkit SVG ForeignObject Rendering Layout Remote Code Execution
description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in WebKit in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a foreignObject element in an SVG document. 

This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Oracle MySQL Database Unique SET Column Join Denial Of Service
description: A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in Oracle MySQL database server. Remote authenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending malicious command packets to the server. Successful exploitation would cause the target server to terminate, denying service to all users until the server is restarted.

name: Apple Webkit Anchor Tag Mouse Click Event Dispatch Remote Code Execution
description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in WebKit in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted XML document.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Apple QuickTime "_Marshaled_pUnk" Backdoor Param Client-Side Arbitrary Code Execution
description: There is a remote code execution vulnerability in Apple QuickTime player. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web page.

name: Oracle MySQL 'TEMPORARY InnoDB' Tables Denial Of Service
description: MySQL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users.

name: Trend Micro extSetOwner ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Trend Micro Internet Security ActiveX control due to the way extSetOwner control is instantiated. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code as the logged-on user. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker could take complete control of the affected system.

name: OpenLDAP Modrdn RDN UTF-8 String Code Execution
description: OpenLDAP does not check the return value of a call to the smr_normalize function, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a modrdn call with an RDN string containing invalid UTF-8 sequences, which triggers a free of an invalid, uninitialized pointer in the slap_mods_free function.

name: OpenLDAP Modrdn RDN NULL String Denial Of Service
description: OpenLDAP allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a modrdn call, which is not properly handled by the smr_normalize function and triggers a NULL pointer dereference.

name: SonicWALL E-Class SSL-VPN ActiveX Control Format String Overflow
description:
Remote exploitation of a format string overflow vulnerability in the
SonicWALL E-Class SSL-VPN ActiveX Control could allow an attacker
to execute arbitrary code within the security context of the targeted
user.

name: Movie Maker And Producer Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: This is a vulnerability within Windows Movie Maker that is bundled with Windows XP and Windows Vista and Microsoft Producer 2003.  If a user opens a specially crafted Movie Maker or Microsoft Producer project it can result in remote execution of code.

name: Ipswitch IMail 'SMTPDLL.dll ' Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: Ipswitch IMail is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successfully exploiting these issues will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox XSLT Node Sorting Routine Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Integer overflow in the XSLT node sorting implementation in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large text value for a node.

name: Directory Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Internet Information Services (IIS). An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could bypass the need to authenticate to access restricted resources.

name: Word Record Parsing Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Word is vulnerable to a stack overflow through the sprmCmajority function.  Exploitation of this vulnerability can cause arbitrary code to be run on the system.

name: Google Chrome Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Google Chrome allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via vectors involving HTML object outlines.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution
description: Adobe Flash Player allows remote attackers to cause a buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a malformed SWF File.

name: Microsoft Excel RTD Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer FLV Parsing Two Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Two remote code execution vulnerabilities exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer. The vulnerabilities are due to two integer overflow errors while parsing the HX_FLV_META_AMF_TYPE_MIXEDARRAY and the HX_FLV_META_AMF_TYPE_ARRAY data types in FLV files. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a crafted FLV file.

name: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
description: Integer overflow in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via plugin content with many parameter elements.

name: Apple QuickTime FLI LinePacket Remote Code Execution
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in QuickTimeAuthoring.qtx in QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted FLC file, related to crafted DELTA_FLI chunks and untrusted length values in a .fli file, which are not properly handled during decompression.

name: Microsoft DRM Technology ActiveX Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
description: Microsoft DRM technology (msnetobj.dll) ActiveX suffers from multiple remote vulnerabilities such as buffer overflow, integer overflow and denial of service (IE crash). This issue is triggered when an attacker convinces a victim user to visit a malicious website.

name: Microsoft Paint Memory Corruption Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Paint is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to a memory-corruption issue. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Novell iPrint Client Browser Plugin call-back-url Buffer Overflow
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Novell iPrint Client browser plugin. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Novell iPrint Client ExecuteRequest debug Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in Novell iPrint browser plugin. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to access a malicious website. This can lead to a buffer overflow and the possibility of code execution in the context of the affected application.

name: Multiple Vendor ToolTalk Heap Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability PortMapper Decoding
description: When a client wishes to make an RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the Unix port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the ports those services are running on and configures firewall/IPS rules to use those ports

name: Mozilla Firefox SSL Spoofing Vulnerability
description: Versions of Mozilla Firefox are susceptible to spoofing of the location bar to appear as though a webpage is a secure page when the webpage is not secure.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'findText()' Unicode Parsing Denial Of Service
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Skype Plugin Manager ezPMUtils.dll Buffer Overflow
description: Skype Plugin Manager (ezPMUtils.dll) ActiveX suffers from buffer overflow vulnerability. This issue is triggered when an attacker convinces a victim user to visit a malicious website.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Connection Wizard-icwhelp.dll Buffer Overflow
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer Connection Wizard ActiveX control is prone to buffer overflow because it fails to perform adequate checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web pages.

name: Java 6 Standard Edition Runtime deployJava1.dll Remote Buffer Overflow
description: Java 6 Standard Edition Runtime ActiveX control is prone to buffer overflow because it fails to perform adequate checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web pages.

name: FreeType Compact Font Format (CFF) Multiple Stack Based Buffer Overflow
description: FreeType is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Apple Software Update ScriptingObjectModel.dll Buffer Overflow
description: Apple Software Update ActiveX control is prone to buffer overflow because it fails to perform adequate checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web pages.

name: Apple Software Update SoftwareUpdateAdmin.dll Buffer Overflow
description: Apple Software Update ActiveX control is prone to buffer overflow because it fails to perform adequate checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing user to visit malicious web pages.

name: Oracle Java SE And Java For Business 'readMabCurveData()' Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE and Java for Business are prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running an affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Excel SxView Memory Corruption
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files that include a malformed record object. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Squid Proxy String Processing NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service
description: Squid is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability caused by a NULL pointer dereference. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Oracle MySQL Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description: MySQL is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to run arbitrary SQL statements with 'SUPER' privileges on the slave database system. This will allow the attacker to compromise the affected database system.

name: Apple Safari 'webkit.dll' Invalid SVG Text Style Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apple Safari is vulnerable to denial of service attacks when rendering Scalable Vector Graphics (svg) files.  Rendering a specially crafted svg file will cause Safari to crash.

name: Apple Webkit Rendering Counter Remote Code Execution
description: The counters functionality in the Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) implementation in WebKit in Apple Safari, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted HTML document.

name: HP Data Protector Express Buffer Overflow
description: A boundary error in the "DtbClsLogin()" function within dpwindtb.dll (Windows) and libdplindtb.so (Linux) can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long string. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Multiple Vendor ToolTalk Heap Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: On Solaris operating system the ToolTalk database server (rpc.ttdcserverd) can be exploited through the use specially crafted rpc commands.  This exploit leverages a heap overflow that is present in the service and can result in the execution of code by an attacker.

name: Oracle MySQL 'DDL' Statements Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MySQL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Excel 2002 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Excel is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: MS Excel File Format Parsing Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Excel Record Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3326)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3328)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3331)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by convincing a user to view a specially crafted Word document. When a user closes the Word document, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Excel RTD Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Real Time Data Array Record Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: RTSP Use After Free Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows Media Player Network Sharing Service that could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted network packet to an instance of the application's network streaming service and cause remote code execution in the context of the current application.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader 'ACE.dll' ICC Streams Remote Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: WebKit Element Run-In Styling Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a use-after-free attack when opening a specially crafted webpage. The attack leverages a vulnerability in the processing of elements using the run-in style. Code executed by this attack would run in the security context of the user.

name: Novell iManager 'getMultiPartParameters()' Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
description: Novell iManager is prone to an arbitrary-file-upload vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3329)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted when a document in an HTML format is opened in Microsoft Word. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by convincing the user to open a malicious Word document. When a user closes the document, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: IBM solidDB Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: IBM solidDB is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Windows NT 4.0 DHCP Server Logging Buffer Overflow
description: The DHCP Server service for Microsoft Windows NT 4.0 Server and Terminal Server Edition, with DHCP logging enabled, does not properly validate the length of certain messages, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a malformed DHCP message.

name: Mozilla Firefox Crafted Font Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla software is vulnerable to a buffer overflow involving the storage of CSS values.  An attack could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user by directing the user to a specially crafted web page.

name: Oracle Java APPLET Tag Children Property Memory Corruption
description: There is a vulnerability in Oracle Java which could be triggered by loading Java through the APPLET tag.

name: Winamp Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description:
Winamp is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.
Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Samba SID Parsing Stack Buffer Overflow
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Samba before version 3.5.5. It fails to properly check user supplied input length of a binary representation of a Windows SID. This allows a malicious user to send a SID that could cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Unspecified Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A boundary condition error exists in the Adobe Flash Player application. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing users to open a PDF file that embeds SWF files. The vulnerability can cause a crash and potentially allow an attacker to take control of the affected system.

name: Office Art Drawing Records Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3334)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

name: MSO Large SPID Read AV Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3336)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

name: Cross-Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3330)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow script to gain access to information in another domain or Internet Explorer zone.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the Web page.

name: PowerPoint Integer Underflow Causes Heap Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-2573)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: Adobe Shockwave Player rcsL Chunk EAX Register Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description:
Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability.
Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: IBM DB2 Universal Database Server 'INSTALL_JAR' Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
description:
IBM DB2 Universal Database Server is prone to a vulnerability that could permit an attacker to overwrite arbitrary local files. A remote, authenticated attacker can exploit this issue to create or overwrite arbitrary local files. This may lead to elevated privileges or a complete compromise of the vulnerable computer.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative.
(http://www.zerodayinitiative.com)

name: WebKit Insufficient Entropy Random Number Generator Weakness
description: WebKit is prone to a random-number-generator weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into visiting a malicious webpage. Successful attacks will allow attackers to track user sessions and obtain personal information that can aid in further attacks.

name: Novell Client Print Provider RPC Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way Novell Client for Windows handles RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing RPC calls. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system with system-level privileges.

name: Novell Client NWSPOOL.DLL RPC Request Buffer Overflow
description: The vulnerability is caused due to boundary error within NWSPOOL.DLL when processing arguments passed to certain RPC request (GetPrinterDriverDirectory). This can be exploited to cause stack-based buffer overflow via RPC request with specially crafted, overly long argument.

name: Microsoft Workstation Service Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Workstation service that could allow an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability to take complete control of the affected system. An unchecked buffer overflow which could result in anonymous (Win2k) remote code execution exists in the Workstation service and lsass.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3639)
description: Adobe Flash Player is vulnerable to a denial of service attack.  If a user opens a webpage that loads a specially crafted swf file, the application can stop responding.

name: DATAC RealWin HMI Service Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow
description: DATAC RealWin is prone to multiple remote buffer-overflow vulnerabilities that affect the HMI service. Attackers can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: HTML Sanitization Vulnerability
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the toStaticHTML API sanitizes HTML, that could allow an attacker to perform cross-site scripting attacks and run script in the security context of the logged-on user. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute a cross-site scripting attack on the user, allowing the attacker to execute script in the user's security context against a site that is using the toStaticHTML API.

name: Novell Groupwise GWPOA HTTP Request Remote Code Execution
description: Novell GroupWise is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain potentially sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Novell GroupWise Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
description: Novell GroupWise is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain potentially sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Apple Safari WebKit Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
A code execution vulnerability has been reported in Apple Safari. The vulnerability is due to a use-after-free error when processing selections. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a maliciously crafted web page.

In attack scenarios where code execution is successful the behavior of the target machine would depend entirely on the intention of the injected code, which would run within the security context of the logged on user. In situations where code execution is not successful, the vulnerable application may terminate abnormally.

name: HTML Sanitization Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3324)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the toStaticHTML API sanitizes HTML, that could allow an attacker to perform cross-site scripting attacks and run script in the security context of the logged-on user. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute a cross-site scripting attack on the user, allowing the attacker to execute script in the user's security context against a site that is using the toStaticHTML API.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'nsBarProp' Use-After-Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the nsBarProp function in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by accessing the locationbar property of a closed window.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent Content-Type Multiple Value Parsing Remote Code Execution
description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Novell GroupWise. The specific flaw exists within the gwia.exe module responsible for parsing e-mail messages received by the server. When the code encounters a Content-Type header it proceeds to parse out the entities within its contents, separated by a semicolon. The process does not properly check the size of these values before copying them individually to a fixed-length stack buffer. This can be abused by an attacker to overflow the buffer and subsequently execute arbitrary code under the context of the SYSTEM user.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent Variable Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description:
Several remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in Novell GroupWise Internet Agent (GWIA). The vulnerabilities are due to buffer overflows when parsing various variables of a VCALENDAR inside an email. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a malicious email to the target. 

In attack scenarios where code execution is successful the behavior of the target machine would depend entirely on the intention of the injected code, which would run within the security context of the SYSTEM. In situations
where code execution is not successful, the vulnerable application may terminate abnormally.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative. (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com)

name: IBM Informix Dynamic Server "oninit.exe" Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in an unspecified logging function in oninit.exe in IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a crafted EXPLAIN directive.

name: IBM Informix Dynamic Server DBINFO Keyword Remote Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via long DBINFO keyword arguments in a SQL statement.

name: WebKit Stale Pointer Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apple Safari and Google Chrome are vulnerable to a use-after-free memory issue in a website changing element focus on a specially crafted webpage. This vulnerability can be used to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user. In the event that the arbitrary code fails to execute the applications could terminate abnormally.

name: HP Data Protector Manager Remote Denial Of Service
description: HP Data Protector Manager is prone to NULL pointer dereference denial of service affecting MSVCR71.dll and Omnilnet service. Attackers can crash the server via one crafted packet.

name: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management ZfHIPCND.exe Remote Code Execution
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in ZfHIPCND.exe in Novell Zenworks 7 Handheld Management (ZHM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted request to TCP port 2400.

name: HTML Element Memory Corruption - CVE-2010-3346
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to memory corruption while rendering a specially crafted webpage using HTML+Time. A malicious attacker could execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user by directing the user to a specially crafted webpage. Failure of code to execute could cause the abnormal termination of Internet Explorer

name: Array Indexing Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3955)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Publisher opens Publisher files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted Publisher file that could be included as an e-mail attachment, or hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site, and then convincing the user to open the specially crafted Publisher file. If a user were logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability - CVE-2010-3343
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to an uninitialized memory corruption vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user by having the user view a specially crafted webpage. Failure to execute code can result in Internet Explorer terminating abnormally.

name: Sharepoint Office Document Conversions Launcher Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Document Conversions Launcher Service validates SOAP requests before processing on a SharePoint server. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code on an affected SharePoint server under the security context of a guest account.

name: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Memory-Corruption Vulnerabilities(CVE-2010-3175)
description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the browser engine in Mozilla Firefox allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'document.write' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to memory corruption due to lack of validation of the input being provided to the document.write function. Successful attack could allow an attack to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user. An attempt that fails to execute arbitrary code could result in a denial of service of the Firefox application.

name: Winamp 'in_midi' Component MIDI Timestamp Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Winamp is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues by enticing an unsuspecting user to load a malicious MIDI music file. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Size Value Heap Corruption in pubconv.dll Vulnerability (CVE-2010-2569)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Publisher parses Publisher files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted Publisher file that could be included as an e-mail attachment, or hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site, and then convincing the user to open the specially crafted Publisher file.

name: Mozilla Firefox Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the rendering engine in Mozilla Firefox, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) x-mac-arabic, (2) x-mac-farsi, or (3) x-mac-hebrew characters.

name: Webkit Floating Point Datatype Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Apple Safari is vulnerable to an attack due to improper handling of floating point data types.  This vulnerability can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user.

name: Winzip WZFLDVW.OCX Multiple Properties Denial Of Service
description: The FolderViewControl shipped with Winzip product contains two buffer overflow vulnerabilities. The flaw is due to improper length validation when setting IconIndex or Text properties of the affected control. A remote attacker may inject and execute arbitrary code by inducing a user to open a crafted web page.

name: MySQL Database Prepared Statement Mode Denial Of Service
description: A vulnerability exists in MySQL where in prepared statement mode, EXPLAIN for a SELECT from a derived table could cause a server to crash.

name: HTML Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability - CVE-2010-3340
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a use after free memory condition. An attacker can execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user by directing the user to a specially crafted webpage. Failure to execute code can cause Internet Explorer to terminate abnormally.

name: WebKit Form Menus Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A memory corruption issue exists in WebKit's handling of form menus. Visiting a maliciously crafted website may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution. This issue is fixed through improved handling of form menus.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent Content-Type Parsing Integer Signedness Remote Code Execution
description: The GroupWise Internet Agent (GWIA) has a vulnerability in the way that it parses numbers within the "Content-Type" header of a received message, which could potentially allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of GWIA.

name: Allowed Resources
description: This filter restricts access to Web server resources. HTTP requests are only allowed to a specified list of types. You must customize it for your website by  entering the allowed resources and allowed scripts.

name: CUPS Server 'cups/ipp.c' Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: ipp.c in cupsd does not properly allocate memory for attribute values with invalid string data types, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted IPP request.

name: Oracle MySQL Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description: MySQL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users.

name: Real Networks RealPlayer Cook Codec Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the cook codec in RealNetworks RealPlayer 11.0 through 11.1, RealPlayer SP 1.0 through 1.1.5, and Linux RealPlayer 11.0.2.1744 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified data in the initialization buffer.

name: PICT Image Converter Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3946)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office allocates buffer size when handling PICT image files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens an Office document containing a specially crafted PICT image. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: HP Photo Creative 'ContentMan.dll' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: HP Photo Creative is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. The issue affects the 'audio.Record.1' ActiveX control. Successful exploits will allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Data Access Object Recordset Remote Code Execution
description: A heap corruption vulnerability in MSDAO (Microsoft Data Access Object) that could lead to remote code execution and browser crashing. The vulnerability can be exploited through embedded scripts.

name: Sun Java HsbParser.getSoundBank Stack Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Sun's Java Runtime Environment. The flaw exists in the parsing of long file:// URL arguments to the getSoundbank() function. Due to a lack of bounds checking on user supplied data a stack overflow can occur leading to remote code execution. Exploitation of this vulnerability can lead to system compromise under the credentials of the currently logged in user.

name: Symantec Antivirus Alert Management System Denial Of Service
description: The GetStringAMSHandler function in prgxhndl.dll in hndlrsvc.exe in the Intel Alert Handler service (aka Symantec Intel Handler service) in Intel Alert Management System (AMS), as used in Symantec Antivirus Corporate Edition on Windows 2000 SP4 and Symantec Endpoint Protection, does not properly validate the CommandLine field of an AMS request, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted request.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat 'newplayer()' JavaScript Method Code Execution
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: HP Data Protector Manager RDS Denial Of Service
description: HP Data Protector Manager is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Oracle Java SE And Java For Business Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment component in Oracle Java SE and Java for Business allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Comctl32 Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Comctl32.dll (aka the common control library) in Microsoft Windows, when a third-party SVG viewer is used, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTML document that triggers unspecified messages from this viewer, aka "Comctl32 Heap Overflow Vulnerability."

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat 'newplayer()' JavaScript Method Code Execution Vulnerability - 2
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application's webserver. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions.

name: HP OpenView NNM ovutil.dll getProxiedStorageAddress Buffer Overflow
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow attack through the jovgraph.exe CGI application. A specially crafted HTTP request sent to the HP OpenView Network Node Manager server can cause arbitrary code to be executed with the privileges of the Internet Guest account.

name: HP OpenView NNM getnnmdata.exe CGI ICount Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in getnnmdata.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an invalid iCount parameter.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovlogin.exe Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in ovlogin.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long userid or passwd parameter.

name: HP OpenView NNM ovwebsnmpsrv.exe Invalid Option Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the error handling functionality in ovwebsnmpsrv.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long, invalid option to jovgraph.exe.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvWebHelp.exe Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in OvWebHelp.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long Topic parameter.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager getnnmdata.exe CGI Hostname Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack overflow via the Hostname variable used by getnnmdata.exe.  This vulnerability can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the security context of the getnnmdata.exe process.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager snmpviewer.exe Host Header Buffer Overflow
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. A boundary error exists within snmpviewer.exe when copying strings using the "strcat()" function. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow by passing an overly long string to the 'Host' HTTP header.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager netmon sel CGI Variable Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack overflow via the sel variable used by the _OVParseLLA function.  This vulnerability can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the SYSTEM security context.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager  ovet_demandpoll sel CGI Variable Format String Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Hp OpenView Network Node Manger is vulnerable to a format string error via the sel variable used by ovet_demandpoll.exe.  This vulnerability can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the security context of the ovet_demandpoll.exe process.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'Oid' Parameter Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: HP OpenView NNM getnnmdata.exe CGI MaxAge Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in getnnmdata.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an invalid MaxAge parameter.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager webappmon.exe CGI Host Header Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A boundary error exists within webappmon.exe when copying strings from an HTTP request using the "strcat()" function. This can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow by passing an overly long string to the 'Host' HTTP header.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvAcceptLang Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in OvCgi/Toolbar.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) 7.01, 7.51, and 7.53 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via (1) a long OvAcceptLang cookie, which triggers the error in ov.dll and ovwww.dll, or (2) a long Accept-Language HTTP header, which triggers the error in ovwww.dll or libovwww.so.4.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvOSLocale Parameter Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in OvCgi/Toolbar.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) 7.01, 7.51, and 7.53 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long OvOSLocale cookie.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovlaunch HTTP Request Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the ovlaunch CGI program in HP OpenView Network Node Manager on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Host parameter.

name: Real Networks RealPlayer SP 'RecordClip' Method Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Real Networks RealPlayer SP is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently validate user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management Access Point 'ZfHIPCND.exe' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will compromise the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition

name: Oracle Document Capture Insecure Method Buffer Overflow
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Document Capture component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote attackers to affect integrity and availability via unknown vectors related to Import Server.

name: Oracle Document Capture EasyMail ActiveX Control Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Document Capture component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality via unknown vectors related to Import Server.

name: Symantec Alert Management Service Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description: Stack based buffer overflows in Intel Alert Management System allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a message to msgsys.exe, related to iao.exe in the Intel Alert Originator service. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain SYSTEM-level privileges on an affected computer.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer MHTML MIME Handler Information Disclosure
description: There is a vulnerability in Internet Explorer due to the way MHTML interprets MIME formatted requests for content blocks within a document. It is possible under certain conditions for this vulnerability to allow an attacker to inject a client-side script in the user's Internet Explorer instance.

name: Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0036)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Adobe Reader 'OpenAction' URI Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0587)
description: There exists a Cross-site scripting vulnerability in OpenAction definition in Adobe files created by Adobe Reader. It allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML/JavaScript code in the context of the browser.

name: Acrobat Reader Faulty Parsing JPEG 2000 Images Memory Corruption (CVE-2011-0602)
description: Acrobat Reader is prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability via Adobe files which contain JPEG 2000 images. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Kerberos Spoofing Vulnerability
description:
A spoofing vulnerability exists in implementations of Kerberos on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. The vulnerability exists because it is possible to downgrade Kerberos authentication to use DES instead of the default, stronger encryption standards included in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
Note: This rule may give false positive where old clients which support only one encryption are being used. Any triggers for this rule should be investigated.

name: SAP Crystal Reports 2008 Directory Traversal
description: SAP Crystal Reports 2008 contains an information disclosure vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of user input in one of Java Server Pages(JSPs). Successful exploit will allow an attacker to read the content of arbitrary files on the target host.

name: VLC Media Player MKV File Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: VLC Media Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Symantec Intel Alert Management System Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in Intel Alert Management System allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string to msgsys.exe, related to the AMSSendAlertAct function in AMSLIB.dll in the Intel Alert Handler service (aka Symantec Intel Handler service). Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Symantec Alert Management Service Remote Privilege Escalation
description: Stack based buffer overflows in Intel Alert Management System allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a message to msgsys.exe, related to iao.exe in the Intel Alert Originator service. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain SYSTEM-level privileges on an affected computer.

name: Oracle Document Capture Actbar2.ocx ActiveX Control File Overwrite
description: Oracle Document Capture contains ActiveX component ActiveBar2Library (Actbar2.ocx) which has an insecure method "SaveLayoutChanges" that can overwrite any unhidden file in the system.

name: Symantec Intel Alert Management System Message Handling Multiple Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: HDNLRSVC.EXE in the Intel Alert Handler service (aka Symantec Intel Handler service) in Intel Alert Management System (aka AMS or AMS2), as used in Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition (SAVCE), Symantec System Center (SSC) and Symantec Quarantine Server, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary programs by sending msgsys.exe a UNC share pathname, which is used directly in a CreateProcessA (aka CreateProcess) call.

name: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Oninit Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: IBM Informix is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges, completely compromising affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: IBM Lotus Domino 'nLDAP.exe' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Lotus Domino's LDAP service. The vulnerability is due to inadequate boundary checking on the LDAP BindRequests. The attack doesn't require authentication. If exploited, may lead to a root or system level compromise.

name: Microsoft Script Encoder Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Jscript decoding routine that may lead to information disclosure.

name: HP Data Protector Media Operations 'SignInName' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector Media Operations is vulnerable to an attack against one of the login parameters due to insufficient boundary checks. This vulnerability can not result in the execution of arbitrary code by an attacker but will cause the service to crash or be otherwise unavailable.

name: EnterpriseDB Postgres Plus Advanced Server DBA Management Server Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability is reported in EnterpriseDB Postgres Plus Advanced Server, which can be exploited by malicious people to bypass certain security restrictions. The vulnerability is caused due to an error in the authentication mechanism of the DBA Management Server component when allowing access to the JBoss jmx-console or web-console and can be exploited instantiate arbitrary classes. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: vsftpd Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The vsf_filename_passes_filter function in ls.c in vsftpd before 2.3.3 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service via crafted glob expressions in STAT commands in multiple FTP sessions.

name: Foxit Reader JavaScript API Arbitrary File Creation Or Overwrite Vulnerability
description: Foxit Reader is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to write or overwrite arbitrary files on a vulnerable computer. An attacker can exploit this issue to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the computer running the affected application. This may aid in further attacks.

name: Multiple Vendors STARTTLS Implementation Plaintext Arbitrary Command Injection Vulnerability
description: Multiple vendors' implementations of STARTTLS are prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers inject arbitrary commands. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the user running the application. Successful exploits can allow attackers to obtain email usernames and passwords.

name: Apple Safari WebKit Range Object Remote Code Execution
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Apple Safari WebKit. The vulnerability is due to an error while processing a removed range object. This vulnerability may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user or cause the application to crash if the execution is not successful.

name: RealPlayer ActiveX Control CDDA URI Uninitialized Pointer Vulnerability
description: An ActiveX control code execution vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer application. The vulnerability is due to uninitialized memory during processing of CDDA URIs. Successful exploits will allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the logged in user. An unsuccessful attack could cause an abnormal termination of the affected application.

name: Novell ZENworks TFTPD Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in novell-tftp.exe in Novell ZENworks Configuration Manager (ZCM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long TFTP request.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities (CVE-2011-0262)
description: Buffer overflow in the stringToSeconds function in ovutil.dll in ovwebsnmpsrv.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via large values of variables to jovgraph.exe.

name: Multiple Vendor Calendar Manager RPC Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: An error in the CDE Calendar Manager Service daemon, which is used in multiple products allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the system.Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code with superuser privileges, which can result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

name: Calendar Manager RPC Service Portmapper Decoding
description: When a client wishes to make a RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the Unix port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the port on which the service is running and configures firewall/IPS rules to use that port.

name: ProFTPD 'mod_sql' Username SQL Injection Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in proftpd's sql authentication in sanitizing input. Attackers can exploit this by sending malicious patterns.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer IVR File Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: HP OpenView NNM snmpviewer.exe CGI Multiple Variable Remote Code Execution
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the doLoad function in snmpviewer.exe in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the act and app parameters.

name: Zend Server Java Bridge 'javamw.jar' Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Zend Server is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability in the Zend Java Bridge component. Successful exploits can allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Javascript Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1245)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow script to gain access to a browser window in another domain or Internet Explorer zone.

name: Cumulative Security Updates of ActiveX Kill Bits - April 2011
description: This filter sets killbits for the activex controls mentioned in the April 2011 security advisory of Microsoft.

name: Layouts Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0094)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Object Management Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1345)
description: A defect in object lifetime management causes Internet Explorer to release an object twice which can lead to a delayed crash or even remote code execution.

name: Excel Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0098)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the current user. Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

name: IBM solidDB Password Hash Length Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: IBM solidDB is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability that affects the 'solid.exe' process.Successfully exploiting this issue will allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers.

name: Excel Buffer Overwrite Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0104)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MIT Kerberos KDC Request NULL Pointer Denial Of Service
description: The Key Distribution Center (KDC) in MIT Kerberos allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a malformed request packet that does not trigger a response packet.

name: Excel Record Parsing WriteAV Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0101)
description: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability while processing files with malformed contents. Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

name: WordPad Word 97 Text Converter Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft WordPad processes memory when parsing a specially crafted Word 97 document. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Word file that includes a malformed structure.

name: VideoLAN VLC Media Player XSPF Memory Corruption
description: Array index error in VLC media player allows remote attackers to overwrite arbitrary memory and execute arbitrary code via an XSPF playlist file with a negative identifier tag, which passes a signed comparison.

name: Microsoft Word File Handling Memory Corruption
description: Word in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3, XP SP3, Office 2003 SP2, and Office Word Viewer 2003 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted fields within the File Information Block (FIB) of a Word file, which triggers length calculation errors and memory corruption.

name: Microsoft Excel Record Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: WordPad And Office Text Converter Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that text converters in WordPad and Microsoft Office process memory when a user opens a specially crafted Word 6 file that includes malformed data.

name: Microsoft Office Excel Record Pointer Corruption Remote Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel that could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Excel file that includes a malformed record object. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Powerpoint OfficeArt Atom RCE Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0976)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file that could be included as an e-mail attachment, or hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: OpenOffice Word Document Table Parsing Integer Underflow
description: Integer underflow in OpenOffice might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted records in the document table of a Word document, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: IBM DB2 Administration Server 'receiveDASMessage' Heap Overflow
description: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in the DB2 Administration Server (DAS) component due to insufficient boundary checking. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted packet, which may result in arbitrary code execution or denial of service.

name: Microsoft Office Web Components URL Parsing Remote Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Office Web Components manages memory resources when parsing specially crafted URLs. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Mozilla Firefox Jar URI Cross-Site Scripting
description:
The jar: protocol handler does not validate the MIME type of the contents due to which it can be exploited to conduct cross-site scripting attacks. 

NOTE: This filter blocks all web pages and files which use "jar:" protocol handler.

name: Restrict "HTMLView" Tag For Windows Media Player
description: Microsoft Windows Media Player (WMP) invokes Internet Explorer to render HTML documents contained inside some media files, regardless of what default web browser is configured, which might allow remote attackers to exploit vulnerabilities in software that the user does not expect to run, as demonstrated by the HTMLView parameter in an asx file. This filter is written to block HTMLView tags so that Windows Media Player won't display HTML files inside its interface.

name: URL Validation Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in affected versions of Microsoft Windows. The vulnerability results from the incorrect validation of input sent to the ShellExecute API function. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Remote Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Excel Document Parsing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files with malformed BIFF records. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system

name: VMware Remote Console Format String Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been reported in VMware Remote Console, which can be exploited by malicious people to potentially compromise a user's system. The vulnerability is caused due to a format string error in the VMware Remote Console (VMrc) plugin and can be exploited to potentially corrupt memory via a specially crafted web page. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Sony DRM CodeSupport ActiveX Attempt
description: This is the incoming CodeSupport ActiveX control sent while uninstalling Sony DRM rootkit.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption Vulnerability (Group 1)
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a memory corruption error when certain DLLs and other COM objects are instantiated in the Internet Explorer browser. For the affected COM objects, the vulnerability is caused due to the failure of the memory allocator to zero the contents of heap memory allocated to new object instances. As a result, the object destructor may use the previous memory content as function pointers in its function calls. Successful exploitation allows execution of arbitrary code, but requires that a user is tricked into visiting a malicious web site.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption Vulnerability (Group 2)
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a memory corruption error when certain DLLs and other COM objects are instantiated in the Internet Explorer browser.
