For the affected COM objects, the vulnerability is caused due to the failure of the memory allocator to zero the contents of heap memory allocated to new object instances. As a result, the object destructor may use the previous memory content as function pointers in its function calls. Successful exploitation allows execution of arbitrary code, but requires that a user is tricked into visiting a malicious web site.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability which can be exploited by sending a crafted HTTP request to the 'OpenView5.exe' CGI application through the 'Action' parameter. Successful exploitation can allow attackers to access potentially sensitive data on the affected computer or deny service to legitimate users.

name: Mozilla Firefox Javascript URI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A regression error in Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript as the user via an HTML mail message with a javascript: URI in an (1) img, (2) link, or (3) style tag, which bypasses the access checks and executes code with chrome privileges.

name: Blended Threat From Combined Attack Using Apple's Safari On The Windows Platform
description: This is a blended threat that allows remote code execution on all supported versions of Windows XP and Windows Vista when Apple's Safari for Windows has been installed.

name: Microsoft Office Graphic Object Dereferencing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0977)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office handles graphic objects when parsing a specially crafted Office file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint Heap Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file that could be hosted on a specially crafted or compromised Web site.

name: MoBB #28: Mozilla Navigator Object
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability in the way Java references the properties of the windows.navigator object during start up which could lead to a browser crash. Successful exploitation could lead to execution of native code supplied by the attacker.

name: RealPlayer Browser Remote Arbitrary Code Execution
description: RealPlayer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently validate user supplied data. Successful exploitation will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Restrict Microsoft Windows Media DVR-MS File Download
description: A DVR-MS file is a Windows Media Center Recorded Television file. It uses Advanced Systems Format(ASF). DVR-MS file type is not common. Microsoft is phasing out this file format hence detecting such file in a working environment is suspicious. This filter blocks DVR-MS files.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1269)
description: A vulnerability exists in PowerPoint that could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007.

name: Restrict Microsoft Office Jet DataBase Engine MDB File Download
description:
MDB files are database files created by Microsoft Access. MDB files contains the database information. Downloading MDB files over internet is not recommended.

This filter blocks all MDB file downloads.

name: Microsoft IE COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption Vulnerability (MS06-021)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer instantiates COM objects that are not intended to be instantiated in Internet Explorer. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited the specially crafted Web site. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: VideoLAN VLC ModPlug ReadS3M Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the ReadS3M method in load_s3m.cpp in libmodplug allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted S3M file.

name: GNU libc glob(3) 'GLOB_LIMIT' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: GNU libc is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to make the affected computer unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer TLIApplication ActiveX Object Remote Code Execution
description: A vulnerability exists in TLIApplication ActiveX Object which can lead to Internet Explorer crash and thereby a remote code execution.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint Buffer Overrun RCE Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1270)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Office Malformed Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: GDI+ in Microsoft Office XP SP3 does not properly handle malformed objects in Office Art Property Tables, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Office document that triggers memory corruption.

name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux DNS Resolver Buffer Overflow
description: A vulnerability exists in the DNS stub resolver library in ISC BIND that also affects the resolver component of older versions of the glibc library. This can allow an attacker to send malicious DNS response packets to a vulnerable system to cause a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code.

name: DATAC RealWin SCADA System Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: There exists multiple vulnerabilities in RealFlex RealWin SCADA server that could be exploited by remote attackers to compromise a vulnerable system

name: ICONICS WebHMI ActiveX Buffer Overflow
description: The ICONICS WebHMI ActiveX control is prone to a remote stack based buffer overflow vulnerability that affects the 'GenVersion.dll' ActiveX control. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an application that uses the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Excel Data Initialization Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0105)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Winamp 'in_midi' Component Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in Winamp. The Vulnerability occurs while parsing midi file with special crafted System Exclusive message type event. Attackers can exploit this issue by sending malicious files.

name: HP Intelligent Management Center imcsyslogdm Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in HP Intelligent Management Center (IMC) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long syslog packet, related to an exception handler.

name: HP 3COM/H3C Intelligent Management Center tftpserver Mode Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in tftpserver.exe in HP Intelligent Management Center allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted packet.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Remote Execution Remote Code Execution
description: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: HP 3COM/H3C Intelligent Management Center TFTP Server DATA/ERROR Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in tftpserver.exe in HP Intelligent Management Center allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted packet content accompanying DATA or ERROR opcode.

name: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service GET_FILE Buffer Overflow
description: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability existing in HP OpenView Data Protector product. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation on user-supplied data resulting in overflowing a fixed-length buffer, which could ultimately lead to arbitrary code execution under the context of the SYSTEM user. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

name: Internet Explorer Cross Zone Cookiejacking Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cookiejacking vulnerability. As the name implies, an attacker can trick users into clicking on innocuous-looking graphics or videos, to trigger arbitrary code execution, which can further allow attackers to hijack victim's cookies.

name: HP 3COM/H3C Intelligent Management Center img Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: The img.exe is the core process of an HP Intelligent Management Center (IMC) server. It has a buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of user supplied data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted messages and result in code execution at SYSTEM level.

name: IE/Opera Source Code Viewer Null Character Handling Vulnerability
description:
There is a vulnerability in the source code viewer in both browsers (IE &
Opera) when they are processing the null control character (0?00),
including this character in the transmission message results in a
misunderstanding that is reflected in the concealment of the transmitted
message, only the code that is between valid tags is shown. In other
words, exploiting this vulnerability we can completely hide the source
code to the user of Internet Explorer and Opera browsers.

name: Excel Improper Record Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1273)
description: An out of bounds array access vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Excel Out Of Bounds Array Access Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1274)
description: An out of bounds array access vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Sybase M-Business Anywhere 'agSoap.exe' Malformed SOAP Request Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Sybase M-Business Anywhere is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability because it fails to properly validate certain SOAP requests, which may lead to a buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Excel Insufficient Record Validation Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1272)
description: An out of bounds array access vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Google Chrome Stale Pointer In Floats Rendering Memory Corruption
description: RenderBox.cpp in WebCore in WebKit, as used in Google Chrome does not properly render floats, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors that lead to a "stale pointer".

name: Selection Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1261)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: OLE Automation Underflow Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0658)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) Automation. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Host Integration Server Denial Of Service
description:
Microsoft Host Integration Server is prone to a denial of service which is caused due to an infinite loop when processing certain malicious packets.
A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to deny service to legitimate users.

name: Excel WriteAV Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1278)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service GET_FILE Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: There is a directory traversal vulnerability existing in HP OpenView Data Protector product. The vulnerability is due to insufficient sanitization while handling certain message, which could allow attackers to traverse the file system to access files or directories that are outside of the restricted directory. Please note that authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

name: Microsoft XML Editor Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1280)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft XML Editor handles specially crafted XML files.

name: VML Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1266)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted web page. When a user views the web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Excel Buffer Overrun Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1276)
description: Buffer overrun in Microsoft Excel allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted Excel spreadsheet.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2110)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player. This vulnerability can bypass Windows data execution prevention (DEP), and it can be exploited by loading a malicious SWF file that will lead to execution of arbitrary code. Unsuccessful exploitation will crash the process.

name: Internet Explorer Layout Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1254)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Internet Explorer HTTP Redirect Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1262)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Buffer Overflow In Print Spooler Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Print Spooler that could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on an affected system. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Blackice Cover Page SDK Insecure Method DownloadImageFileURL() Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within "DownloadImageFileURL()". This can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Excel Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0103)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Office Excel XP, 2003 could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the current user.  The vulnerability occurs while parsing a specially crafted XLW (workspace) file.

name: Multiple Web Browsers Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Multiple Web Browsers are prone to a denial of service vulnerability, allowing remote attackers to cause the device to reset via a web page containing an HTMLSelectElement object with a large length attribute.

name: Black Ice Fax Voice SDK Integer Dereference Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in Black Ice Fax Voice SDK which can be exploited to cause an Integer Dereference Code Execution. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Tom Sawyer Software GET Extension Factory Object Initialization Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Tom Sawyer Software GET Extension Factory is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage. Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Flash Player (Flash6.ocx) AllowScriptAccess DoS
description: Flash Player is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Unspecified Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: DNS Query Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0657)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way DNS client service handles specially crafted LLMNR queries. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the NetworkService account.

name: NetVault SmartDisk 'libnvbasics.dll' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: NetVault SmartDisk is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability. A successful exploit will cause the application to crash, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

name: Citrix Provisioning Services 'streamprocess.exe' Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Citrix Provisioning Services is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the SYSTEM user.

name: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management 'ZfHSrvr.exe' Service Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management is prone to a directory-traversal  vulnerability in the 'ZfHSrvr.exe' service because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to upload arbitrary files to the affected system.

name: VLC Media Player XSPF Playlist Integer Overflow Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: VLC media player is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because of an integer-overflow error in the XSPF playlist file parser. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Internet Explorer toStaticHTML Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1252)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles content using specific strings when sanitizing HTML. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the Web page.

name: TMG Firewall Client Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1889)
description: The NSPLookupServiceNext function in the client in Microsoft Forefront Threat Management Gateway (TMG) 2010 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving unspecified requests, aka 'TMG Firewall Client Memory Corruption Vulnerability'.

name: HP Data Protector EXEC_CMD Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is prone to a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform bounds check on user supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue by sending specially crafted packets to TCP port 5555. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle Database Server Network Authentication AUTH_SESSKEY Buffer Overflow
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Network Authentication component in Oracle Database allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Mozilla Firefox Double Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the browser engine in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader XFDF File Handler Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the OutputDebugString function for Adobe Acrobat Reader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF document with XML Forms Data Format (XFDF) data.

name: Adobe Reader U3D CLODMeshDeclaration Shading Count Memory Corruption
description: Adobe reader does not properly process U3D image files inside PDF documents which may lead to memory corruption.

name: Mozilla Firefox Object 'mObserverList' Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors related to object mObserverList.

name: Microsoft Word 'wdGetApplicationObject()' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Word is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Word file. Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'resource:' Protocol Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox on Windows allows remote attackers to determine the existence of arbitrary files, and possibly load resources, via vectors involving a resource: URL.

name: Internet Explorer Time Element Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1255)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Mozilla Firefox And Microsoft Internet Explorer Denial Of Service
description: Mozilla Firefox and Microsoft Internet Explorer suffer from an access violation exception issue that causes a denial of service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox XUL Document Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the nsXULCommandDispatcher function in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted XUL document that dequeues the current command updater.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'nsTreeRange' Dangling Pointer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox does not properly use nsTreeRange data structures, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors that lead to a dangling pointer. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2375)
description: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in the browser engine of Mozilla Firefox which could allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Sun JRE Java Deployment Toolkit Argument Injection Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is caused due to an input sanitation error in the Java Deployment Toolkit browser plugin. This can be exploited to pass arbitrary arguments to javaw.exe. Successful exploitation allows execution of arbitrary code by tricking a user into visiting a malicious web page.

name: Apache HTTP Server Mod_Proxy Remote Negative Content-Length Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in proxy_util.c for mod_proxy in Apache allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (process crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a negative Content-Length HTTP header field, which causes a large amount of data to be copied.

name: Oracle Warehouse Builder SQL Injection
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Warehouse Builder component in Oracle Database Server allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Oracle Warehouse Builder User Account.

name: IBM Lotus Domino Nnotes.dll Stack-Based Buffer Overflow
description: A stack buffer overflow exists in IBM Lotus Domino. Successful attacks lead attackers to overwrite SEH pointer stored on stack and redirect execution flow, executing arbitrary code on remote IBM Lotus Domino installations.

name: Apple Safari Webkit Memory Corruption
description: WebKit, as used in Apple Safari allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

name: Oracle Secure Backup 'validate_login' Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Secure Backup component in Oracle Secure Backup allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager HTTP Request Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to insufficiently sized buffers. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

name: Integer Overflow In X.509 Object Identifiers Spoofing Vulnerability
description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows CryptoAPI component when parsing ASN.1 object identifiers from X.509 certificates. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could impersonate another user or system.

name: OpenSLP Extension Parser Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: OpenSLP is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability that affects the extension parser. An attacker can cause the extension parser to enter an infinite loop, consume CPU resources, and trigger a denial of service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox "200 header" Code Execution Vulnerability
description: The http-index-format MIME type parser (nsDirIndexParser) in Firefox does not check for an allocation failure, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via an HTTP index response with a crafted 200 header, which triggers memory corruption and a buffer overflow.

name: Mozilla Firefox HTML Injection Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2369)
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an SVG element containing an HTML-encoded entity.

name: Microsoft Chart Control Directory Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1977)
description: Microsoft .NET Framework Chart Control contains a directory traversal vulnerability that may lead to information disclosure.

name: DNS NAPTR Query Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1966)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Windows DNS Server improperly handles a specially crafted NAPTR query string in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Window Open Race Condition Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1257)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that may have been corrupted due to a race condition. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: WebKit Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0221)
description: WebKit, as used in Apple Safari, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

name: CA ARCserve D2D r15 GWT RPC Request Auth Bypass Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in CA ARCserve D2D. The vulnerability is due to an authentication weakness in the Apache Axis component of the product. When the software is installed, default credentials are assigned to the Axis2 web services component. A remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability enabling arbitrary code execution within the security context of an Axis2 web service.

name: Sybase Adaptive Server Backup And Monitor Server Translation Array Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Sybase Adaptive Server is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code under the context of the running service. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

name: Apple Safari Webkit SVG Marker Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: WebKit, as used in Apple Safari, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

name: Microsoft MPEG Layer-3 Audio Decoder Divide-By-Zero Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft MPEG Layer-3 Audio Decoder is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability when handling malformed '.avi' files. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to deny service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Style Object Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a Style Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability. It does not properly handle objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by accessing an object that was not properly initialized or is deleted.

name: ISC DHCP Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description: ISC DHCP is prone to denial of service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to cause the affected application to crash, resulting in denial of service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2010-3776)
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into viewing a page containing malicious content. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Asterisk SIP Channel Driver Remote Denial Of Service
description: A NULL pointer dereference error in the "get_in_brackets_full()" function (channels/sip/reqresp_parser.c) can be exploited to cause a crash via a specially crafted SIP "Contact" header.

name: HP OpenView Communication Broker Arbitrary File Deletion
description: There exists a vulnerability in HP OpenView Communication Broker. By sending malicious file to ovbbccb.exe, attacker can delete any arbitrary file on the same machine or on other machines with SYSTEM privileges.

name: Multiple Check Point SSL VPN On-Demand Applications Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Multiple Check Point SSL VPN on-demand applications are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: HP Easy Printer Care Software 'HPTicketMgr.dll' ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A directory traversal vulnerability has been identified in HP Easy Printer Care Software. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation in an ActiveX control. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to view a maliciously crafted web page. This would allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the target computer with arbitrary content, which could lead to code execution.

name: Citrix XenApp And XenDesktop XML Service Interface Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Citrix XenApp and XenDesktop are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of a service account on the vulnerable server.

name: Symantec Veritas Enterprise Administrator Service Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Symantec Veritas Enterprise Administrator service ('vxsvc.exe') is prone to multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code with administrative privileges on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions.

name: BroadWin WebAccess Client Bwocxrun ActiveX Control Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: BroadWin WebAccess Client Bwocxrun ActiveX is prone to multiple vulnerabilities. A format string error in the "OcxSpool()" method (bwocxrun.ocx) can be exploited to corrupt memory via a specially crafted string. An error in the 'CloseFile()' method (bwocxrun.ocx) when handling an open file descriptor can be exploited to corrupt memory by passing an arbitrary integer value in the 'fpt' parameter. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: SharePoint Remote File Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1892)
description: A file disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office SharePoint that could allow a malicious authenticated user to use a specially crafted XML file to gain read-only access to a local file on the SharePoint server under the security context of the account running SharePoint.

name: Google Chrome And Apple Safari Display Box Use-after-free Code Execution
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Google Chrome and Apple Safari allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to display box rendering.

name: Windows Components Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2011-1991)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that certain Windows components handle the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in ActiveX Control Multiple Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the 'NSEPA.NsepaCtrl.1' ActiveX control in 'nsepa.ocx' in Citrix Access Gateway Enterprise Edition allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP header data.

name: CUPS 'gif_read_lzw()' GIF File Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The 'gif_read_lzw' function in 'filter/image-gif.c' in CUPS does not properly handle the first code word in an LZW stream, which allows remote attackers to trigger a heap-based buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted stream.

name: FreeType 'src/psaux/t1decode.c' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Integer signedness error in psaux/t1decode.c in FreeType allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted Type 1 font in a PDF document.

name: Excel Out Of Bounds Array Indexing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1987)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the current user. Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

name: Excel Use After Free WriteAV Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1986)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the current user. Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

name: Excel Heap Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1988)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the current user. Successful exploitation can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Logic Error Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2442)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, related to a "logic error vulnerability."

name: Movicon Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow And Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description: Movicon is prone to multiple heap based buffer overflow vulnerabilities and a denial of service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial of service conditions.

name: Cogent Datahub Multiple Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Cogent DataHub is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability and an information disclosure vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user supplied input. Exploiting the issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

name: EMC Autostart Domain Name Logging Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Multiple buffer overflows in EMC AutoStart allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code by sending a crafted message over TCP.

name: HP Data Protector Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in HP Data Protector that could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code and lead to denial of service conditions. The vulnerabilities are triggered by sending a request of a host running the "data protector inet" service, part of HP Data Protector. The request has several parameters, including an opcode. By sending requests with specially crafted parameters, the different bugs can be triggered.

name: Internet Explorer Scroll Event Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1993)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Internet Explorer, when handling events may lead to remote code execution.

name: Endless Loop DoS In snabase.exe Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2007)
description: An unauthenticated denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that Host Integration Server handles some UDP network traffic. The vulnerability could allow a remote user to cause snabase.exe, snaserver.exe, snalink.exe, or mngagent.exe to stop responding to new requests.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent Yearly RRULE Variable Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: ATL Object Type Mismatch Vulnerability
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Active Template Library (ATL) which is caused due to an error in the ATL header that frees unintended areas of memory. Remote attackers can exploit this issue by
enticing target users to visit a malicious web page. Successful exploitation can cause arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current logged in user.

name: Novell NetIdentity Agent 'XTIERRPCPIPE' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Novell NetIdentity Agent is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Select Element Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1999)
description: Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the logged in user.

name: Internet Explorer Virtual Function Table Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2001)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Internet Explorer when handling certain DOM operation may lead to remote code execution.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent HTTP Interface Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack based buffer overflow in gwia.exe in GroupWise Internet Agent (GWIA) in Novell GroupWise allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long HTTP request for a .css file.

name: Microsoft Client Service For Netware Denial Of Service
description: Buffer overflow in Client Service for NetWare (CSNW) in Microsoft Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted messages.

name: Apple CUPS 'gif_read_lzw' Heap Buffer Overflow
description: The "gif_read_lzw" function in "filter/image-gif.c" in CUPS does not properly handle the first code word in an LZW stream, which allows remote attackers to trigger a heap-based buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted stream.

name: Null Session Cookie Crash Vulnerability (CVE 2011-2012)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in implementations of Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG). When this occurs, an attacker could leverage the vulnerability to stop the IIS worker process and deny access to Web services on the affected system.

name: Oracle AutoVue AutoVueX ActiveX Control Remote File Creation Vulnerability
description: Oracle AutoVue 'AutoVueX.ocx' ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability caused by insecure methods. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer within the context of the affected application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: WebKit 'libxslt' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: WebKit in Apple Safari has improper libxslt security settings, which allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files, and consequently execute arbitrary code, via a crafted web site.

name: HP Power Manager 'formExportDataLogs' Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in goform/formExportDataLogs in HP Power Manager allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long fileName parameter.

name: Oracle AutoVue 'AutoVueX.ocx' ActiveX Control 'Export3DBom()' Insecure Method Vulnerability
description: Oracle AutoVue 'AutoVueX.ocx' ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability caused by an insecure method. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer within the context of the affected application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Oracle Hyperion Financial Management TList6 ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Hyperion Financial Management TList6 ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability caused by an insecure method. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer within the context of the affected application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Excel Integer Overrun Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0097)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MagnetoSoft ICMP ActiveX AddDestinationEntry Vulnerability
description: MagnetoSoft ICMP ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow attack.  If successfully exploited arbitrary code can be executed in the security context of the logged in user.

name: WebKit Multiple Unspecifeid Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: WebKit, as used in Apple iTunes, allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via vectors related to iTunes Store browsing.

name: ISC BIND Large RRSIG RRsets Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Off-by-one error in named, which is a BIND name server process in ISC BIND allows remote DNS servers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via a negative response containing large RRSIG RRsets.

name: Symantec IM Manager Code Injection Vulnerability
description: The management console in Symantec IM Manager allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, related to a "code injection issue."

name: Symantec IM Manager Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
description: Symantec IM Manager is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in a SQL query. A successful exploit can allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

name: Oracle Database 'CTXSYS.DRVDISP' Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Text component in Oracle Database Server  allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality, integrity and availability related to CTXSYS.DRVDISP.

name: Adobe Flash Player Browser Plugin Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2459)
description: The Internet Explorer Browser Plugin for Adobe Flash Player is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability, which can be exploited by attackers to compromise user's system.

name: Google Chrome Ruby Tag And CSS use-after-free Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Google Chrome before 11.0.696.57 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to the ruby element and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequences.

name: Oracle Java SE and Java for Business JRE Trusted Method Chaining Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment component in Oracle Java SE and Java for Business allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Oracle Hyperion Strategic Finance WorkBook OLE Control Remote Heap Overflow
description: Oracle Hyperion Strategic Finance Client Tidestone Formula One WorkBook OLE Control TTF16 ActiveX control is prone to a remote  heap overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the victim's computer within the context of the affected application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Identified Suspicious Microsoft Office Files With Embedded Dexter Font
description: This rule detects any Microsoft Office file embedded with Dexter font over web. Attackers may use crafted Microsoft Office files having Dexter font to run arbitrary code remotely.

name: Novell Zenworks LaunchHelp.dll ActiveX Control LaunchProcess Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Novell Zenworks LaunchHelp.dll ActiveX Control is  prone to a remote code execution vulnerability, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Novell Zenworks Software Packaging.

name: Excel Object Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: XSLT Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1963)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code.

name: HP Data Protector Multiple Products GetPolicies SQL Injection
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Data Protector Notebook Extension and Data Protector for Personal Computers allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: HP Data Protector Media Operation 'DBServer.exe' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector Media Operation is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

name: OpenSSL ECDH Ciphersuites Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: HP Data Protector Media Operations Opcode 0x10 Traversal Arbitrary File Access
description: HP Data Protector Media Operations is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability which can be exploited by malicious people to disclose potentially sensitive information and compromise a vulnerable system. An error in DBServer.exe when processing certain packets can be exploited to download arbitrary files via a specially crafted packet containing directory traversal specifiers.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: HP Device Access Manager Memory Corruption
description: The AddUser, AddUserEx, RemoveUser, RemoveUserByGuide, RemoveUserEx, and RemoveUserRegardless methods in HP Protect Tools Device Access Manager (PTDAM) allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) via a long SidString argument.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader U3D Component Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2462)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the U3D component in Adobe Reader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption).

name: Microsoft Time Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3397)
description: A vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when handling HTML behavior that may lead to remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user and could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Identified Suspicious Image File With Embedded PHP Code
description: This rule is a heuristic based rule to detect malicious php code embedded within gif, jpg and png image files. An attacker may use maliciously crafted image file to do remote code execution and take control of the victim's host machine.

name: Microsoft Windows Server Service Denial Of Service
description:
Multiple versions of Microsoft Windows are vulnerable to a null pointer 
dereference in the server driver (srv.sys). By sending a specially-crafted 
network packet to an affected system, a remote attacker could cause 
the system to crash.

name: HP Data Protector Multiple Products LogClientInstallation Remote SQL Injection Vulnerabilty
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Data Protector Notebook Extension and Data Protector for Personal Computers allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Identified Diginotar Certificate
description: This filter heuristically blocks exchange of Secure Socket Layer (SSL) certificate issued by Diginotar.

name: Microsoft Windows win32k.sys Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Microsoft Windows  which can be exploited by attackers to potentially compromise a user's system. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code with kernel-mode privileges.

name: IBM WebSphere ILOG Rule Team Server 'project' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
description: IBM WebSphere ILOG Rule Team Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site.

name: OfficeArt Shape RCE Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3413)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft PowerPoint handles specially crafted PowerPoint files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a specially crafted PowerPoint file.

name: Winamp RIFF INFO Record Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Nullsoft Winamp. The vulnerability is due to a heap buffer overflow while handling a crafted AVI RIFF INFO chunk. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a specially crafted file.

name: Microsoft ASP.NET Hashes Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3414)
description: The vulnerability exists due to the way that ASP.NET processes values in an ASP.NET form post causing a hash collision. It is possible for an attacker to send a small number of specially crafted posts to an ASP.NET server, causing performance to degrade significantly enough to cause a denial of service condition.

name: Object Packager Insecure Executable Launching Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2012-0009)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Windows registers and uses the Windows Object Packager. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Cisco WebEx WRF And ATAS32 File Format Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Buffer overflow in the WRF parsing functionality in the Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WRF file.

name: MySQL COM_TABLE_DUMP Function Stack Overflow
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the MySQL database server product. The flaw is created by improperly implemented boundary checks on incoming user input. An authenticated attacker with limited privileges may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable host within the context of the server process.

name: Telnetd encrypt_keyid Remote Root Function Pointer Overwrite Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in telnetd allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long encryption key.

name: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Heap Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-4371)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Citrix Provisioning Services Stream Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Citrix Provisioning Services is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the SYSTEM user.

name: Citrix Provisioning Services Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: Citrix Provisioning Services is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application.

name: HP OpenView NNM ov.dll _OVBuildPath Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. By specifying a long 'textFile' argument when calling the 'webappmon.exe' CGI program, an attacker can cause a stack-based buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code. The vulnerability is due to the use of a function which uses "strcat" in an insecure way.

name: Mozilla Firefox Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2365)
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability due to memory-corruption. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: HP Easy Printer Care Software 'XMLCacheMgr' ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A certain ActiveX control in HPTicketMgr.dll in HP Easy Printer Care Software allows remote attackers to download an arbitrary program onto a client machine, and execute this program, via unspecified vectors.

name: Identified Suspicious JavaScript Encoded Shellcode
description: Shellcode is a piece of machine code used as the payload to exploit a software vulnerability. This filter detects suspicious web browser exploits and some zero day attacks that use JavaScript to encode shellcode.

name: Asterisk Remote Crash Vulnerability In SIP Channel Driver
description: SIP channel driver in Asterisk does not properly initialize variables during request parsing, which allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a malformed request.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There exists a security vulnerability in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM). The vulnerability could be exploited remotely to execute arbitrary code under the context of the user running the web server.

name: Detected Missing Contact Header In REGISTER SIP Request
description: This is a generic rule to detect REGISTER SIP requests with no 'Contact' header. Sending such SIP requests by a remote authenticated attacker may cause the application to crash.

name: Novell Open Enterprise Server iPrint Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2011-4194)
description: Novell Open Enterprise Server is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: IBM solidDB 'SELECT' Statement Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: IBM solidDB is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Publisher Function Pointer Overwrite Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1508)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Publisher, a component of Microsoft Office, that could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.The vulnerability is due to an error in the "pubconv.dll" library.

name: Color Control Panel Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2010-5082)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Color Control Panel handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Indeo Codec Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2010-3138)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Indeo Codec handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Office Uninitialized Object Pointer Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1982)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office handles specially crafted Word files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Nginx DNS Resolver Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Nginx is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.
Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Apache HTTP Server 'mod_log_config' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A denial of service vulnerability has been identified in Apache httpd. The vulnerability is due to an error while logging crafted HTTP requests by mod_log_config. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted HTTP requests to the vulnerable server. A successful attack will crash the server resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

name: IBM SPSS 'VsVIEW6.ocx' ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the VsVIEW6.ocx ActiveX control of IBM SPSS SamplePower. The method SaveDoc() contains a flaw that could lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code. If code execution is successful, a denial of service condition may result.

name: Novell GroupWise Messenger Client Unicode Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Novell GroupWise Messenger Client. The vulnerability is caused by a boundary error when processing an NMX file. By enticing a target user to open a crafted HTML file, a remote attacker could possibly exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code under the context of the current user.

name: Apple QuickTime JPEG 2000 COD Length Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: There exists an integer overflow in Apple QuickTime that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted movie file with JPEG2000 encoding.

name: Oracle Java 'zip_util readCEN' Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been discovered in the JRE. The vulnerability is due to an off-by-one error when processing zip archives. This results in a series of recursive calls, terminated by a stack overflow.

name: Identified Suspicious Microsoft DLL File Over WebDav
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows due to improper handling of DLL files over network share.
This rule is based on heuristics and will only detect DLL file being requested to server. Hence this rule should be applied when DLL files are not used in Webdav.

name: PowerPoint Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2011-3396)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft PowerPoint handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Visio Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2010-3148)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Visio handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Internet Explorer Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDav (CVE-2011-2019)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Windows Mail Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDav (CVE-2011-2016)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Address Book component while loading the DLL file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Data Access Components Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2011-1975)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Windows Data Access Tracing component handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Trend Micro Control Manager 'CmdProcessor.exe' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in 'CmdProcessor.exe' in Trend Micro Control Manager allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted IPC packet. An unauthenticated, remote attacker could leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user under which the service runs, which is SYSTEM by default.

name: Oracle Java JRE Insecure Executable Loading Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java JRE is prone to an insecure executable loading vulnerability which can be exploited by malicious people to compromise a user's system. The vulnerability is caused due to the application loading an executable file in an insecure manner when an out of memory condition occurs.

name: Html Layout Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0011)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Oracle Java "zip_util readCEN" Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been discovered in the JRE. The vulnerability is due to a boundary condition, when processing zip archives. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by causing an application to process a crafted zip archive.

name: Novell GroupWise Messenger Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A heap memory corruption vulnerability exists in Novell GroupWise messenger. Specifically, the vulnerability is caused by improperly parsing of crafted tags when processing a login message. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted login command to the target service.

name: Novell GroupWise Messenger 'createsearch' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A heap memory corruption vulnerability exists in Novell GroupWise Messenger. Specifically, the vulnerability is caused by improper handling of crafted parameters when processing a request to createsearch. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the target service.

name: Adobe Flash Player MP4 File Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of a user-supplied length value when parsing MP4 files, which leads to an integer wraparound.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: DNS Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0006)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that the DNS server improperly handles objects in memory when looking up the resource record of a domain. An attacker that successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the DNS server on the target system to stop responding and automatically restart.

name: Microsoft Expression Design Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2012-0016)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows Expression Design component while loading the DLL file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability due to a memory corruption. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: An SQL injection vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input sanitation when processing HTTP requests.

name: Samba 'AndX' Request Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0870)
description: Samba is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Preboot Service Opcode Request Parsing Overflow
description: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is prone to vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or retrieve arbitrary files within the context of the affected application.

name: Excel Array Indexing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0978)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft ASN.1 Library Bitstring Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: Multiple integer overflows in Microsoft ASN.1 library (MSASN1.DLL), as used in LSASS.EXE, CRYPT32.DLL, and other Microsoft executables and libraries on Windows NT 4.0, 2000, and XP, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via ASN.1 BER encodings with (1) very large length fields that cause arbitrary heap data to be overwritten, or (2) modified bit strings.

name: Asterisk HTTP Manager Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: An error in the "ast_parse_digest()" function (main/utils.c) when handling "HTTP Digest Authentication" information can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an overly long string. Successful exploitation if this vulnerability may allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Excel Array Indexing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0978)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'OnReadyStateChange' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0170)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Novell GroupWise Address Book Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: The client in Novell GroupWise allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a long e-mail address in an Address Book file.

name: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: A SQL Injection vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express. A remote attacker can exploit this SQL injection vulnerability to update their authority level to the ADMIN level, and then upload a file to the server and execute code under the context of the SYSTEM user.

name: Unfiltered Access To UAG Default Website Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0147)
description:
A vulnerability exists in Microsoft Unified Access Gateway (UAG) that could allow an unauthenticated user to access the default website of the Microsoft UAG Server from the external network. This filter blocks the access to Microsoft UAG Server through IP Address. 

Note: Configuration option is available to add allowed UAG IP address.

name: UltraVNC Viewer 'ClientConnection.cpp' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: UltraVNC VNCViewer is affected by a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate user-supplied string lengths before copying them into static process buffers. An attacker might leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code on the affected computer with the privileges of the user running the vulnerable application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'selectAll' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0171)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: VML Style Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0172)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager Web Reports XSS Vulnerability
description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been reported in the Web Reports component of IBM's Tivoli Endpoint Manager. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted HTTP requests to a vulnerable server. A successful exploitation attempt will result in the execution of script code in the security context of a target user's browser.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Parameter Validation Vulnerability-2 (CVE-2012-0163)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft .NET Framework validates parameters when passing data to a function. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: EMC Data Protection Advisor Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in EMC Data Protection Advisor. The vulnerability is due to a NULL pointer dereference. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted requests to the vulnerable service. Successful exploitation could result in a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Data Access Components Function Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the RDS.Dataspace ActiveX control that is provided as part of the ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and that is distributed in MDAC. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MPlayer SAMI Subtitle Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in MPlayer, which can be exploited by malicious people to compromise a user's system. An attacker can use specially crafted SAMI subtitle file to exploit this vulnerability. Successful exploitation could allow execution of arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Office WPS Converter Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0177)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Works File Converter. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: VLC Media Player MMS Protocol Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in VideoLAN VLC media player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MMS:// stream in a web page.

name: Oracle WebCenter Forms Recognition CroProj.dll ActiveX Remote Vulnerability
description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in Oracle WebCenter Forms Recognition. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of parameters used in the Save() method in the ActiveX control CroProj.dll. This vulnerability may allow execution of arbitrary attacker code on the target system.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Parameter Validation Vulnerability-2 (CVE-2012-0160)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft .NET Framework due to the improper serialization of untrusted input. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Buffer Allocation Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0162)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft .NET Framework that can allow a specially crafted Microsoft .NET Framework application to access memory in an unsafe manner. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the security context of the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Serialization Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0161)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft .NET Framework due to the improper serialization of untrusted input through partially trusted assemblies. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Object Confusion Vulnerability - 2 (CVE-2012-0779)
description: Adobe Flash Player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file, related to an "object confusion vulnerability," as exploited in the wild in May 2012.

name: Excel MergeCells Record Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0185)
