description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Excel SXLI Record Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0184)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Excel Series Record Parsing Type Mismatch Could Result in Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1847)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft GDI+ Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0167)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Office GDI+ library handles validation of specially crafted EMF images embedded within an Office document. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Office document. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: RTF Mismatch Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0183)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Excel File Format Memory Corruption In OBJECTLINK Record Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0142)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: LANDesk Lenovo ThinkManagement Console Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by the improper validation of input. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing directory traversal sequences to delete arbitrary files from the system.

name: Null Byte Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0012)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that an attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted web page that could allow information disclosure if a user views the Web page.

name: Oracle WebCenter Forms Recognition Sssplt30.ocx ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilty
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle WebCenter Forms Recognition component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Designer.

name: GnuTLS Libtasn1 ASN1 Length DER Decoding Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The asn1_get_length_der function in decoding.c in GNU Libtasn1 does not properly handle certain large length values, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption and application crash).

name: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the Server Setup web service of Lenovo ThinkManagement Console allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a crafted file with an executable extension.

name: Novell eDirectory HTTP Server Redirection Buffer Overflow
description: A code execution vulnerability has been reported in the iMonitor HTTP server component of Novell eDirectory products. An attacker may exploit the vulnerability by sending a malicious HTTP request to the vulnerable target server. Exploitation of this flaw may result in the diversion of the process flow of the HTTP server process.

name: Novell eDirectory Server Long URI iMonitor Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in iMonitor 2.4 in Novell eDirectory 8.8 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via unknown attack vectors.

name: Novell eDirectory dhost.exe Content-Length Header Heap Overflow
description:
An unspecified error exists in the processing of HTTP Content-Length headers, which can be exploited to cause a crash.

This vulnerability was shared with Third Brigade in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative.(http://www.zerodayinitiative.com)

name: Microsoft Windows DNS Client Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the DNS client component of Microsoft Windows. The flaw is caused by the improper processing of crafted DNS messages. A remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability by sending crafted DNS responses to the affected service, resulting in the possible injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target system. Any injected code would be executed within the security context of the System user.

name: Novell eDirectory HTTP Head Command DoS
description:
A denial of service vulnerability exists in Novell eDirectory server. The flaw   
is caused by overflowing the Head command's argument. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to terminate the Novell eDirectory service.

name: Novell iManager 'jClient' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Novell iManager Web Interface is prone to an overflow condition related to the jclient. The create attribute function fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input passed via the 'EnteredAttrName' parameter resulting in a buffer overflow. This may potentially allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service.

name: Microsoft GDI+ EMF Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0167)
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the Office GDI+ and  library in Microsoft Office allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted EMF image in an Office document. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Asterisk Skinny Channel Driver Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Skinny channel driver in Asterisk Open Source allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact.

name: Cisco WebEx WRF File Format Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WRF file.

name: Cumulative Security Updates Of ActiveX Kill Bits - May 2012
description: This rule prevents the instantiation of the activex controls mentioned in the security advisory of Microsoft in May 2012.

name: Microsoft Visio Viewer VSD File Format Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0018)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Visio validates attributes when handling specially crafted Visio files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Mozilla Firefox AttributeChildRemoved Use-After-Free Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors related to incorrect AttributeChildRemoved notifications that affect access to removed nsDOMAttribute child nodes.

name: Lighttpd 'http_auth.c' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: An signedness error leading to out of stack-based buffer read flaw was found in the way lighttpd processes certain invalid base64 HTTP authentication tokens. A remote attacker could provide a specially crafted HTTP authentication request, leading to denial of service.

name: DirectX Pointer Validation Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft DirectShow validates certain values when updating a pointer. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted QuickTime file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Detected Lynx Client Traffic
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect HTTP Client traffic by using Lynx text only browser. For mission critical servers, limited HTTP client traffic means those servers will have less exposure to web related attacks. It also prevents potential backdoor software from contacting external malicious sites.

This filter will be triggered once per minute for a given host. The frequency of event settings can be modified on the Configuration tab should your environment require different configuration.

name: GDI+ PNG Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ allocates memory. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted PNG image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: GnuTLS TLS Record 'GenericBlockCipher' Structure Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A memory corruption flaw exists in GnuTLS. The program fails to sanitize user-supplied input when handling TLS records resulting in memory corruption, with a specially crafted GenericBlockCipher structure a remote attacker can execute arbitrary code.

name: Adobe Flash Player Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. Successful exploitation could result in execution of arbitrary code within the security context of the currently logged on user.

name: Internet Explorer 'OnBeforeDeactivate' Event Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1878)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Lync Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2012-1849)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Lync handles the loading of DLL files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Internet Explorer 'insertAdjacentText' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1879)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an undefined memory location. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer OnRowsInserted Event Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1881)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Null Byte Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1873)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow an attacker to gain access and read Internet Explorer's process memory.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Memory Access Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1855)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft .NET Framework due to the improper execution of a function pointer. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MSCOMCTL.OCX RCE Vulnerability For Rich Text File (CVE-2012-0158)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows common controls. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution.

name: Internet Explorer InsertRow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1880)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer HTML Sanitization Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1858)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles content using specific strings when sanitizing HTML. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the Web page.

name: Apple QuickTime STSD JPEG Atom Heap Corruption
description: A heap buffer memory corruption vulnerability in Apple QuickTime. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks while processing the JPEG atoms embedded in the STSD atom in QuickTime movie files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability  by enticing the target user to open a crafted QuickTime movie file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

name: Cisco WebEx Player atas32.dll Content Decompression WRF File Handling Remote Overflow
description: Cisco WebEx Player is prone to an integer overflow condition. The program fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow when decompressing certain content. With a specially crafted WRF file, a context-dependent attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: Developer Toolbar Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1874)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability allows you to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Title Element Change Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1877)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in a way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Cisco WebEx Recording Format Player ATDL2006.DLL Integer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the ATDL2006 processing functionality in the Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WRF file.

name: Center Element Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1523)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted.

name: Cisco WebEx Player atdl2006.dll Content Decompression WRF File Handling Remote Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WRF file.

name: Adobe Shockwave Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exist in Adobe Shockwave Player. A remote attacker can exploit these vulnerability by enticing a target user to visit a maliciously crafted web site. Successful exploitation could result in execution of arbitrary code within the security context of the currently logged on user.

name: RealNetworks Helix Server rn5auth.dll Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in rn5auth.dll in RealNetworks Helix Server and Helix Mobile Server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted authentication credentials.

name: Mozilla Firefox 'Array.reduceRight()' Remote Code Execution
description: Integer overflow in the Array.reduceRight method in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving a long JavaScript Array object.

name: Libpng 'png_decompress_chunk' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Integer overflow in libpng, used in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors that trigger an integer overflow.

name: Apple iTunes 'm3u' Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Apple iTunes, in a way that the successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities by a remote attacker can result in code execution on the vulnerable system. Unsuccessful exploit can cause sudden termination of the application.

name: Apple QuickTime QTVR 'QTVRStringAtom' Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Integer signedness error in Apple QuickTime on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted QTVR movie file.

name: Mozilla Firefox Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0469)
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in mozilla firefox IDBKeyRange interface of IndexedDB API allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors related to crafted IndexedDB data.

name: Microsoft .Net Framework Tilde Character Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The URL parser in Microsoft Internet Information Services(IIS) allows remote attackers to execute a recoverable Denial of service attack by supplying too many tilde characters in URI path.

name: Microsoft XML Core Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1889)
description: The vulnerability exists when MSXML attempts to access an object in memory that has not been initialized which may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications Insecure Library Loading Vulnerability Over WebDav (CVE-2012-1854)
description: The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a legitimate Microsoft Office file that is located in the same directory as a specially crafted dynamic link library (DLL) file. An attacker could then install programs, view, change, or delete data or create new accounts that have full user rights.

name: Excel File Format Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0141)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft ADO Cachesize Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1891)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Data Access Components accesses an object in memory that has been improperly initialized. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code on the target system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Attribute Remove Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1524)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Symantec PcAnywhere Login And Password Field Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The host-services component in Symantec pcAnywhere does not properly filter login and authentication data, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code execution via a crafted session.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Cached Object Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1522)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Apple Quicktime Text Track Descriptor Parsing Remote Code Execution
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Apple QuickTime on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted text track in a movie file.

name: Apple QuickTime TeXML Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in Apple QuickTime on Windows allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted TeXML file.

name: Web Client Restrict Executable File Downloads
description: This filter blocks EXE file downloads. Administrator can configure this filter and allow certain EXE file downloads.

name: MSXML Response Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability can exists in the way that Web Client Services like MSXML, etc. handles HTTP responses. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user browses a Web site that does not contain StatusText in HTTP response. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Preboot Service 0x21 Buffer Overflow
description: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will compromise the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Apple QuickTime TeXML Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in Apple QuickTime on Windows allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted TeXML file.

name: Apple QuickTime PICT File Processing Memory Corruption (CVE-2012-0671)
description: Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted .pict file.

name: Mozilla Firefox XSL Parsing 'root' XML Tag Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description:
Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability.
An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected browser. Failed exploit attempt will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox InsertFrames Bad Cast Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox.The vulnerability is due to the InsertFrames method failing to handle mixed group table frames.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Server Oracle Outside-In FPX File Parsing Heap Overflow
description: Microsoft SharePoint Server uses Oracle Outside In Technology which is prone to unspecified vulnerabilities that allows remote attacker to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Server Oracle Outside-In JP2 File Parsing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft SharePoint Server uses Oracle Outside In Technology which is prone to unspecified vulnerabilities that allows remote attacker to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Server Oracle Outside-In LWP File Parsing Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft SharePoint Server uses Oracle Outside In Technology which is prone to unspecified vulnerabilities that allows remote attacker to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters.

name: HP StorageWorks File Migration Agent CIFS and FTP Archives Processing Vulnerabilities
description: HP StorageWorks File Migration Agent is prone to an overflow condition when parsing CIFS archive names and the root path of FTP archives. The HsmCfgSvc.exe service fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow. With a specially crafted packet, a remote attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Office SharePoint Server Access Control Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 and Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 Service Pack 1.   The vulnerability could allow elevation of privilege if an attacker bypasses authentication by browsing to an administrative URL on a SharePoint site. A successful attack leading to elevation of privilege could result in denial of service or information disclosure.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability
description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists in SharePoint Server 2007. When Javascript is encoded in a malicious URL it is echoed back to the user in the resulting page. This effectively allows attacker-controlled JavaScript to run in the context of the user clicking the link. This is an elevation of privilege vulnerability as it allows an anonymous attacker to potentially issue SharePoint commands in the context of an authenticated user.

name: Sharepoint Help Page Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft SharePoint handles specially crafted requests to the help page. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending specially crafted packets to the targeted SharePoint server which could cause the Web server to become non-responsive until the associated application pool is restarted.

name: Sharepoint toStaticHTML Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the SharePoint toStaticHTML API sanitizes HTML, that could allow an attacker to perform cross-site scripting attacks and run script in the security context of the logged-on user.

name: HP Data Protector Create New Folder Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Data Protector Express allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via unknown vectors.

name: Oracle Database Server ctxsys.context Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Text component in Oracle Database Server  allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality, integrity and availability via CTXSYS.CONTEXT.

name: Ubisoft Uplay ActiveX Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Ubisoft's Uplay launcher,it installs unsecure browser plug-in, which grants unexpectedly wide access to websites.

name: Microsoft Windows NetDDE Buffer Overflow
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a vulnerability in the NetDDE service, which provides network connection mechanism for data exchange between applications. A specially crafted message with an overly long NetDDE share name can overflow a stack buffer, due to insufficient boundary check. A successful exploitation attempt could lead to the execution of arbitrary code with system level privileges.

name: Microsoft Windows Routing and Remote Access Remote Code Execution
description: Various vulnerabilities exist in the RRAS RPC API of which the worst would allow an attacker to take control of the system.

name: Microsoft Windows RPC UPnP Memory Allocation Denial Of Service
description: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Plug and Play service. A remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the problematic service. This may potentially result in the service using extensive amounts of memory and processor resources leading to a temporary denial of service condition.

name: Novell Client nwspool.dll EnumPrinters Function Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way Novell Client for Windows handles RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing RPC requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable host with System-level privileges.

name: Novell Netware Client Print Provider Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Novell Client Print Provider module. The flaw may be exploited by sending malicious request message to the Print Spooler RPC interface. Successful exploitation allows attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with system level privileges.

name: Microsoft Visio DXF File Format Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1888)
description: Microsoft Visio is vulnerable to remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code as the current user. If the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker could take complete control of the affected system.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2049)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Invalid Form Value Vulnerability
description: An invalid value in PDF interactive form directories may lead to denial of service or arbitrary code execution if the attach is successful.

name: Excel Featheader Record Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files that include a malformed record object. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1535)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Windows Common Controls ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows Common Controls is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage. Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application that uses the ActiveX control.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4152)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vector.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4151)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vector.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1525)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2050)
description: Buffer overflow in Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4148)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Internet Explorer Virtual Function Table Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2522)
description: A vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when handling certain DOM operation. This may lead to crash or remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user and could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Client Service For NetWare Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in Client Service for NetWare (CSNW) in Microsoft Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted messages, aka "Client Service for NetWare Memory Corruption Vulnerability".

name: Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in For Windows Nsepacom ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in for Windows due to insufficient validation of the "CSEC" header field in the HTTP responses to the requests sent by the StartEpa() method.

name: Oracle Outside In XPM Processing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Oracle Outside In Technology. This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable products utilizing the Oracle Outside In Technology. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4149)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle Business Transaction Management Server FlashTunnelService Remote File Deletion Vulnerability
description: Oracle Business Transaction Management Server is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to delete arbitrary local files. Successful exploits may allow attackers to compromise the system in the context of the user running the vulnerable application, other attacks are also possible.

name: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4155)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability which allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: MailEnable Enterprise Multiple XSS Injection Vulnerabilities
description: MailEnable is prone to multiple XSS injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied inputs. Attacker-supplied JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user.

name: War FTP Daemon Format String Vulnerability
description: War FTP Daemon is prone to multiple format-string vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer OnMove Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1529)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Layout Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2548)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: HP Application Lifecycle Management ActiveX Control Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple vulnerabilities in XGO.ocx ActiveX control in HP Application Lifecycle Management allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user.

name: Novell ZENworks Asset Management Remote Execution Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Novell ZENworks Asset Management. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of "filename" that allows remote attacker to upload arbitrary files outside of the directory and execute arbitrary codes. This vulnerability can be remotely exploited by an attacker to achieve code execution on the vulnerable server.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Event Listener Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2546)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Nullsoft Winamp 'gen_ff.dll' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The Nullsoft Modern Skins Support module (gen_ff.dll) in Nullsoft Winamp allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MAKI file, which triggers an incorrect sign extension, an integer overflow, and a stack-based buffer overflow.

name: Zeroboard Multiple File Disclosure Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in ZeroBoard allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files.

name: Novell ZENWorks AdminStudio ISGrid.dll ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Novell ZENWorks AdminStudio is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control.

name: Microsoft RTF File listid Use-After-Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2528)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office handles specially crafted RTF files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Flash Player And Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-4165)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, cause denial-of-service conditions, or gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible.

name: Foxit Reader Divide By Zero Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Foxit Reader is prone to a denial of service vulnerability which allows attacker to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Works Heap Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2550)
description: The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Microsoft Word file using Microsoft Works. An attacker who has successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player And Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-4163)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, cause denial-of-service conditions, or gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible.

name: Apple QuickTime QTMovie Objects Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the plugin in Apple QuickTime on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted QTMovie object.

name: Cisco Linksys PlayerPT ActiveX Control SetSource() Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in the Cisco Linksys PlayerPT ActiveX control. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checks when handling parameters passed to the SetSource() function.

name: Cumulative Security Updates Of ActiveX Kill Bits - March 2012
description: This rule prevents the instantiation of the activex controls mentioned in the security advisory of Microsoft in March 2012.

name: IBM Rational ClearQuest 'cqole.dll' ActiveX Control Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the Ole API in the CQOle ActiveX control in cqole.dll in IBM Rational ClearQuest allows remote attackers to execute  arbitrary code via a crafted web page that leverages a RegisterSchemaRepoFromFileByDbSet function-prototype mismatch.

name: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express Isig.isigCtl.1 ActiveX Buffer Overflow (CVE-2012-0198)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software Distribution.Specifically, the flaw exists in the way the Isig.isigCtl.1 ActiveX Control parses data supplied to the RunAndUploadFile() method.

name: Oracle AutoVue AutoVueX ActiveX Control SetMarkupMode Stack Buffer Overflow
description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Oracle AutoVue. The vulnerability is due to an unbounded copy from heap to stack buffer when processing SetMarkupMode function.

name: Quest InTrust 'AnnotateX.dll' Uninitialized Pointer Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A memory access vulnerability is present in Quest InTrust's Annotation Objects ActiveX control. The vulnerability is due to a design flaw in the Add() method, which allows script code to cause the process to execute code from an attacker-controlled memory location.

name: Quest InTrust ArDoc.dll ActiveX Control Remote File Creation
description: Quest InTrust ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveToFile() insecure method to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.

name: Novell GroupWise Date/Time Parsing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Novell GroupWise is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to verify user-supplied inputs. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: EMC NetWorker 'nsrd' RPC Service Format String Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been reported in EMC NetWorker, which can be exploited by malicious attacker to compromise a vulnerable system. The vulnerability is caused due to a format string error in librpc.dll within the nsrd RPC service when parsing RPC data.

name: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability that may cause a heap-based buffer-overflow. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

name: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4147)
description: Rich Media Annotations (RMAs) in Adobe Acrobat allow authors to embed video, audio, and SWF content for playback in a PDF document.This behavior might lead to a denial of service of the application or the execution of arbitrary malicious code.

name: Adobe Flash Player ActionScript Opcode Verifying Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a Flash file with an affected version of Adobe Flash Player. Successful exploitation would result in execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the affected application

name: Novell GroupWise Client Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in Novell Groupware Client. The vulnerability is due to an integer overflow while parsing Novell Address Book files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a malformed Novell Address Book file. A successful attack would lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the target user. If the code execution attempt does not succeed, the application may terminate abnormally.

name: Mozilla Firefox Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the nsWaveReader::DecodeAudioData function in Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: RealPlayer 3GP File Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer. The vulnerability is caused by memory corruption while parsing 3gp video files.
An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities by enticing a user to open a specially crafted .3gp file, with the affected application. Successful exploitation can result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Apple QuickTime Player Divide By Zero Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime Player is prone to a denial of service vulnerability which allows attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In CREATE DATABASE LINK
description: A database link name parameter passed to the CREATE DATABASE LINK query may overflow a buffer in Oracle Database server

name: Microsoft Word PAPX Section Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0182)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Word handles specially crafted Word files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: HP Intelligent Management Center UAM Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The HP Intelligent Management Center is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the SYSTEM user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Internet Explorer JavaScript Integer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2523)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer calculates the size of an object in memory during a copy operation. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Asynchronous NULL Object Access Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2521)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or crash the application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CTreeNode Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4775)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CFormElement Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1538)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Layout Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1526)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CTreePos Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1539)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Windows Font Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2897)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected components handle a specially crafted TrueType font file. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted TrueType font file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Photoshop PNG Parsing Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4170)
description:
Adobe Photoshop is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks when processing a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image. 
Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: Microsoft Excel SerAuxErrBar Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1885)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows License Logging Service Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows License Logging Service component. A specially crafted DCE-RPC message can cause a buffer overflow condition in the affected product and can allow for arbitrary code execution. A remote attacker successfully exploiting the vulnerability may create a denial of service condition or inject and execute code with system level privileges.

name: Microsoft Windows Briefcase Integer Underflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1527)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Briefcase feature in Windows. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by convincing a user to open a specially crafted briefcase. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the security context of the current user.

name: Exim DKIM DNS Decoding Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the dkim_exim_query_dns_txt function in dkim.c in Exim, when DKIM support is enabled and acl_smtp_connect and acl_smtp_rcpt are not set to "warn control = dkim_disable_verify," allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an email from a malicious DNS server.

name: Restrict HTTP Content-Type Header Field Length
description: This rule blocks the HTTP response with Content-Type header field that exceed a maximum length.

name: lighttpd HTTP Header Processing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: lighttpd is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Windows Briefcase Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1528)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Briefcase feature in Windows. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by convincing a user to open a specially crafted Windows Briefcase. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the security context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader JP2KLib And CoolType Write Access Violation Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader is prone to a write access violation which allows attackers to crash the application.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4776)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the .Net Framework retrieves the default web proxy settings. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Apple QuickTime TeXML Style Element Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Multiple buffer overflows allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted style element in a QuickTime TeXML file.

name: Oracle Java Font Processing "maxPointCount" Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A heap overflow vulnerability in Oracle Java JRE/JDK can be exploited by remote attackers to compromise a vulnerable system via a specially crafted web page.

name: HP SiteScope APIMonitorImpl Web Service 'loadFileContent' Request Detected
description:
HP SiteScope is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass the security restrictions and to perform unauthorized actions such as execution of arbitrary code in the context of the application.

Note: This rule blocks SOAP requests, specifically the "loadFileContent" operation of the APIMonitorImpl web service. Rule may trigger on legit traffic and every trigger should be investigated.

name: Identified Suspicious EOT File With Embedded Dexter Font
description: Attackers may use crafted EOT files with embedded Dexter font to cause remote code execution.

name: Oracle MySQL GRANT Command Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted request to trigger a stack overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target database service.

name: Oracle MySQL Server Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MySQL allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service via a SELECT command with an UpdateXML command containing XML with a large number of unique, nested elements.

name: Oracle MySQL Server Command Length Restriction
description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in MySQL allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code.

Note: Configuration options provided to configure length value of SQL command.

name: Windows MySQL Server Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability has been reported in MySQL database server. A remote user can send a specially crafted request to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

name: Foxit Reader Arbitrary DLL Injection Code Execution Vulnerability Over WebDAV
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Foxit Reader while loading the DLL file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: HP SiteScope APISiteScopeImpl Web Service 'getFileInternal' Or 'getSiteScopeConfiguration' Request Detected
description:
HP SiteScope is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass the security restrictions and to perform unauthorized actions such as execution of arbitrary code in the context of the application.

Note:This rule blocks SOAP requests, specifically the 'getFileInternal' or 'getSiteScopeConfiguration' operation of the APIMonitorImpl web service. Rule may trigger on legit traffic and every trigger should be investigated.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Improper Ref Counting Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4787)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: NVIDIA Install Application NVI2.dll Unicode Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: NVIDIA Install Application is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bound check user supplied input. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user or to trigger denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Windows OpenType Font Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2556)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected components handle a specially crafted OpenType font file. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted OpenType font file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: VLC Media Player Swf File Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: VLC media player is prone to a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player URI Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player and Adobe AIR allows attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors involving URL parsing.

name: Microsoft Rich Text File DirectPlay Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1537)
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that DirectPlay handles specially crafted content. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if an attacker convinces a user to view a specially crafted Rich Text File with embedded contents. 

Note: This is a heuristic based rule to detect specially crafted Microsoft Office files exploiting this vulnerability. It may trigger on legit files, hence every trigger should be investigated.

name: Microsoft Office DirectPlay Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1537)
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that DirectPlay handles specially crafted content. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if an attacker convinces a user to view a specially crafted Office document with embedded content. 

Note: This is a heuristic based rule to detect specially crafted Microsoft Office files exploiting this vulnerability. It may trigger on legit files, hence every trigger should be investigated.

name: MySQL Server get_salt_from_password Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in get_salt_from_password from sql_acl.cc for MySQL allows attackers with ALTER TABLE privileges to execute arbitrary code via a long Password field.

name: Microsoft Word RTF 'listoverridecount' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-2539)
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

Note: Any trigger caused by this DPI rule should be investigated further to confirm the attack.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote stack overflow vulnerability.
An attacker can exploit this issue by creating a specially crafted web page, and sending a link to the user or hosting. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution.

name: IBM Lotus Notes URL Handler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: IBM Lotus Notes is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Apple QuickTime Player Use-after-free Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the Clear method in the ActiveX control in Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application by sending crafted FLV files.

name: Cisco WebEx Recording Format Player atas32.dll Memory Corruption
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) Player. This vulnerability is due to a write-what-where memory corruption when the WRF player handles WRF files. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can leverage this vulnerability by crafting a WRF file and enticing a target user to view the malicious file. Successful exploitation would result in execution of arbitrary code on the target host in the context of the application.

name: IBM Lotus iNotes Upload Module ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A security vulnerability exists in an ActiveX control shipped by IBM Lotus. This vulnerability could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on installations of Lotus iNotes when the control is invoked as ActiveX

name: Opera Web Browser GIF File Handling Write Access Violation Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in Opera, which is caused by an unspecified error while processing specially crafted GIF file which will result in heap corruption. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to cause a denial of service or potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: IBM Lotus Quickr 'qp2.cab' ActiveX Control Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in a certain ActiveX control in qp2.cab in IBM Lotus Quickr for Domino allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the Attachment_Times or Import_Times method.

name: Apple QuickTime Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user or to trigger denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle MySQL Server Heap Overrun Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in MySQL allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code, as demonstrated using certain variations of the (1) USE, (2) SHOW TABLES, (3) DESCRIBE, (4) SHOW FIELDS FROM, (5) SHOW COLUMNS FROM, (6) SHOW INDEX FROM, (7) CREATE TABLE, (8) DROP TABLE, (9) ALTER TABLE, (10) DELETE FROM, (11) UPDATE, and (12) SET PASSWORD commands.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CDwnBindInfo Object Use-After-Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4792)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted or has not been properly allocated. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in a way that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user within Internet Explorer. An attacker could host a specially crafted website that is designed to exploit this vulnerability through Internet Explorer and then convince a user to view the website.

name: IBM System Director Agent DLL Injection Vulnerability
description: IBM Director CIM Server contains a flaw that is triggered when an error occurs in /CIMListener/ during the handling of a specially crafted M-POST request, which may allow a remote attacker to inject DLL files. This may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands.

name: RealPlayer RealMedia File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted RealMedia file, possibly embedded in a web page, with the affected application. Successful exploitation can result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged in user.

name: Microsoft Office Excel ReadAV Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Office Excel Viewer and Excel contain a flaw that is triggered when an error occurs during the handling of XLS files. This may allow a context dependent attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted XLS file.

name: TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4786)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected components handle a specially crafted TrueType font files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted TrueType font file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer MSXML XSLT Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0007)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows parses XML content. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Fraudulent Digital Certificate
description:
This rule heuristically prevents the exchange of Secure Socket Layer (SSL) certificate whose trust has been revoked. 

Ref: Microsoft Security Advisory (2798897).

name: EMC AutoStart Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities have been reported in EMC AutoStart. These vulnerabilities are caused by integer overflow errors while calculating heap buffer size. An unauthenticated, remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: Novell File Reporter NFRAgent VOL Tag Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Novell File Reporter Agent. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.This vulnerability can result in remote code execution under the context of the SYSTEM account.

name: Option Element Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1996)
description: Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the user.

name: Ruby On Rails XML Processor YAML Deserialization Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There exists a vulnerability in the parameter parsing code for Ruby on Rails which allows attackers to bypass authentication systems, inject arbitrary SQL, and execute arbitrary code on a Rails application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'execCommand' Use-After-Free Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a use-after-free flaw related to the CMshtmlEd::Exec() function's use of the object's memory after it is deleted during the rendering of an HTML page. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to execute arbitrary code by tricking a user into visiting a specially crafted website.

name: Mozilla Firefox XMLHttp Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a denial of service vulnerability which allows attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Novell NetIQ Privileged User Manager Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
description: NetIQ Privileged User Manager is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and change the administrator password.

name: Novell File Reporter NFR Agent Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
description: Novell File Reporter is prone to multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to upload and download arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: HP SiteScope Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
description: HP SiteScope is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences to upload or download arbitrary files.

name: Restrict YAML And Symbol Type In Xml Parameters
description: The parameter parsing code of Ruby on Rails allows applications to automatically cast values from strings to certain data types. The type casting code supports certain conversions which are not suitable on user-provided data including creating Symbols and parsing YAML. These unsuitable conversions can be used by an attacker to compromise a Ruby on Rails application. This rule blocks the YAML and Symbol Type in Xml parameter parsing in HTTP requests.

name: Adobe Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1530)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Reader Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0622)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat allow attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Reader Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0603)
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Reader and Acrobat allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Skype Toolbars Extension For Firefox Clipboard Security Weakness
description: Skype Toolbars Extension for Firefox is prone to a security weakness that allows attackers to inject arbitrary content onto a user's clipboard. Attackers can exploit this issue to write content to a victim's clipboard. As a result, attacker-supplied URIs can persist in the victim's clipboard.

name: Microsoft Replace Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0005)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the OData specification that could allow denial of service. The vulnerability could cause the server or service to stop responding and restart.

name: OpenX Administrative Interface Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: This rule detects the access of the web page /admin/install.php or /admin/install-plugins.php over HTTP.

name: Adobe Reader Stack Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0626)
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Adobe Reader and Acrobat allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Windows Filename Parsing Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2012-4774)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows parses filenames. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Novell NCP Pre-Auth Remote Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A stack based buffer overflow in Novell eDirectory NetWare Core Protocol (NCP) allows remote attackers to cause an unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft XML Core Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft XML Core Services is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: EMC NetWorker Opcode 0x01 Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the EMC NetWorker allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Port Mapper Decoder For EMC Networker
description: When a client wishes to make a RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the port mapper traffic to find out the port on which the service is running and configures firewall/DPI rules to use that port.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup PortMapper Decoding
description: When a client wishes to make an RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the Unix port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the ports those services are running on and configures firewall/IPS rules to use those ports.

name: Trend Micro OfficeScan Client Denial Of Service
description: Trend Micro OfficeScan Client is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to handle crafted requests.

name: Restrict Oracle Application Framework RF.jsp Diagnostic Mode
description:
The Oracle Application Framework supports a diagnostic and developer mode feature that are intended to be enabled from developer or administrative interfaces. However, any user can manually enable the modes by setting the "OADiagnostic" or "OADeveloperMode" cookies to "1".

Note: This rule blocks request for enabling diagnostic mode in RF.jsp.

name: Foxit Reader Plugin For Browsers URL Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the Foxit Reader plugin for browsers (npFoxitReaderPlugin.dll) when processing a URL and can be exploited to cause a stack based buffer overflow via an overly long file name in the URL.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In SYS_CONTEXT Function
description: Oracle Database Servers are vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the SYS_CONTEXT function. A remote attacker, with SQL command execution privileges, could overflow a buffer and cause the Oracle server process to crash or execute arbitrary code on the system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0633)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer SetCapture Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0018)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Shift JIS Character Encoding Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0015)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow an attacker to gain access to information in another domain or Internet Explorer zone. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted webpage that could allow information disclosure if a user viewed the webpage.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer LsGetTrailInfo Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0022)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Common Controls Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1313)
description: The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted file. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CMarkup Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0020)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer CObjectElement Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0028)
description: This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user views a specially crafted webpage using Internet Explorer. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Internet Explorer CDispNode Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0023)
description: This rule identifies SVG file with a reference to itself.

name: Adobe Flash Player FLV File Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Internet Explorer pasteHTML Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0024)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Excel Cache Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft IIS Internal IP Address Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Microsoft IIS supporting WebDAV methods allows remote attackers to determine the internal IP address of the system (which may be obscured by NAT) via unspecified vectors.

name: SMB Validation Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: An unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Server Message Block (SMB) Protocol software handles specially crafted SMB packets. An attempt to exploit the vulnerability would not require authentication, allowing an attacker to exploit the vulnerability by sending a specially crafted network message to a computer running the Server service. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the attacker to take complete control of the system.

name: PostgreSQL "enum_recv()" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: PostgreSQL does not properly declare the enum_recv function in backend/utils/adt/enum.c, which causes it to be invoked with incorrect arguments and allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service or read sensitive process memory via a crafted SQL command, which triggers an array index error and an out-of-bounds read.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer vtable Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0021)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player SWF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0648)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the ExternalInterface ActionScript functionality in Adobe Flash Player on Windows, Linux, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted SWF content.
