name: Internet Explorer SLayoutRun Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0025)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: SAP Netweaver Message Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability has been reported in SAP NetWeaver Message Server. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted message to a vulnerable server. This can lead to code execution in the context of the affected service.

name: Ruby On Rails JSON Parser Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There is a vulnerability in the JSON code for Ruby on Rails which allows attackers to bypass authentication systems, inject arbitrary SQL, inject and execute arbitrary code, or perform a DoS attack on a Rails application.

name: Internet Explorer CHTML Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0029)
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site that triggers access to a deleted object, aka "Internet Explorer CHTML Use After Free Vulnerability."

name: Internet Explorer CPasteCommand Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0027)
description: This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user views a specially crafted webpage using Internet Explorer. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-5677)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote integer overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Office Common Controls Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1313)
description: The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted file. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Unix PortMapper Decoding
description: When a client wishes to make an RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the ports those services are running on and configures firewall/IPS rules to use those ports.

name: IBM Java Invoke() Method Sandbox Bypass Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: IBM Java contains a flaw that is triggered when an error occurs in the invoke() method in java.lang.reflect.Method. This may allow a remote attacker to bypass the sandbox and execute arbitrary code.

name: Adobe InDesign Server SOAP Request With Non-empty scriptText XML Tag Detected
description:
A command execution vulnerability exists in Adobe InDesign Server. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted SOAP request to the vulnerable server. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary command execution in the context of the logged on user.

Note: This rule blocks a non-empty scriptText XML tag in SOAP Request. Rule may trigger on legit traffic and every trigger should be investigated.

name: Adobe InDesign Server SOAP Message Command Execution Vulnerability
description: A command execution vulnerability exists in Adobe InDesign Server. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted SOAP request to the vulnerable server. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary command execution in the context of the logged on user.

name: Identified Download Of XBAP/Application File Over HTTP
description: This rule identifies the download of xbap file over HTTP using Microsoft Internet Explorer.

name: Internet Explorer CElement Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0091)
description: A vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted. The Internet Explorer process may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft OneNote Buffer Size Validation Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0086)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft OneNote allocates memory from parsing a specially crafted OneNote (.ONE) file.

name: Internet Explorer CTreeNode Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1288)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer onBeforeCopy Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0093)
description: A vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted. The Internet Explorer process may corrupt memory in such a way that will lead to a crash or to executing arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer OnResize Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0087)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0809)
description: Oracle Java SE contains an integer overflow condition in the 2D sub-component of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: VML Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0030)
description: The Vector Markup Language (VML) implementation in Microsoft Internet Explorer does not properly allocate buffers, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site, aka "VML Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

name: Identified Obfuscated JavaScript For Internet Explorer
description: This rule identifies suspicious Internet Explorer exploits that use obfuscated JavaScript. Attackers tend to obfuscate malicious JavaScript to avoid detection by IPS/IDS product.

name: Microsoft Visio Viewer Tree Object Type Confusion Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0079)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Visio Viewer handles memory when rendering specially crafted Visio files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: IBM Java defineClass() Method Sandbox Bypass Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: IBM Java contains a flaw that is triggered when an error occurs in the defineClass() method in java.lang.ClassLoader. This may allow a remote attacker to bypass the sandbox and execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Office Excel String Copy Stack-Based Overrun Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Excel that could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Excel file that includes a malformed record object. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Opera SVG Document clipPath Handling Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A use-after-free vulnerability has been reported in Opera web browser. The vulnerability is due to an error while parsing SVG content. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to download and process a maliciously crafted file with a vulnerable version of Opera. This can lead to code execution in the context of the affected application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'removeChild' Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0094)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: PostgreSQL Malicious Remote Payload Execution
description: Default installations of PostgreSQL may allow a remote authenticated user to execute arbitrary code via the update pg_largeobject method of binary injection.

name: Internet Explorer InsertElement Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0026)
description: There exists a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0646)
description: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player, Adobe AIR SDK and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: VMware OVF Tool Format String Vulnerability
description: Format string vulnerability in VMware OVF Tool on Windows, as used in VMware Workstation, VMware Player and other products allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted OVF file.

name: Apache HTTP Server 'httpOnly' Cookie Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Apache HTTP Server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. The issue occurs in the default error response for status code 400. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

name: Oracle MySQL Server Geometry Query Processing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Oracle MySQL Server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users.

name: Windows Media Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists within the functionality of an embedded Windows Media Player in Mozilla Firefox. An attacker can leverage this to execute arbitrary code under the context of the user running the browser.

name: IBM Java Multiple Unspecified Method Sandbox Bypass Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: IBM Java contains a flaw that is triggered when an error occurs in multiple unspecified methods in the java.lang.class. This may allow a remote attacker to bypass the sandbox and execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer "saveHistory" Use After Free Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability which allows attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0641)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or to crash the application.

name: Microsoft Windows MDAC Vulnerability
description: CVE-2006-0003 - A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the RDS.Dataspace ActiveX control that is provided as part of the ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and that is distributed in MDAC. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Windows Media Player has a memory corruption vulnerability which can be exploited by sending a crafted audio file.

name: Oracle Database Server Buffer Overflow In FILE NAME Parameter
description: Boundary error exists in Oracle Database Server while handling File Name Parameter in ALTER DATABASE, ALTER TABLESPACE, ALTER INDEX, ALTER CLUSTER, CREATE DATABASE, CREATE TABLESPACE.

name: WINS Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) due to a buffer overflow caused by incorrect calculation of buffer length when processing specially crafted WINS network packets. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Internet Explorer GetMarkupPtr Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0092)
description: A vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted. The Internet Explorer process may corrupt memory in such a way that will lead to a crash or to executing arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: PostgreSQL Database Name Command Line Flag Injection Vulnerability
description: Argument injection vulnerability in PostgreSQL allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (file corruption) and allows remote authenticated users to modify configuration settings and execute arbitrary code via a crafted connection request.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CTableCell get_cellIndex Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious web page. In the case of successful exploitation, arbitrary attacker code would cause an information disclosure.

name: SMB Null Session Detected - 2
description: SMB Null session can be used to call APIs and use Remote Procedure calls to enumerate information on passwords, groups, services and users.

name: Windows Live Essentials WLW URI Protocol Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0096)
description: The WindowsLiveWriter.exe application in Windows Live Essentials registers a URI protocol. Certain parameters supported by WLW URI protocol may lead to information disclosure or other unwanted side effects.

name: Internet Explorer XSS Filter Bypass Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a flaw that is due to the application failing to sanitize NULL bytes in an arbitrary file. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to bypass XSS filter protection and conduct a cross-site scripting attack.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader getIcon() Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability is reported on Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation in the getIcon() method of a Collab object, while processing a crafted PDF file. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open malicious PDF files.

name: Identified Malicious Java JAR Files
description: This filter blocks malicious java jar files which are known to have been used in the wild.

name: CoreFTP Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Core FTP allow remote FTP servers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) or non-responsive via a long directory name in a (1) DELE, (2) LIST, or (3) VIEW command.

name: RDP ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1296)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when the Remote Desktop ActiveX control, mstscax.dll, attempts to access an object in memory that has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by convincing the user to visit a specially crafted webpage. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Foxit Reader PDF XREF Parsing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Foxit Reader does not validate data in PDF Cross Reference Table (XREF) header properly. Tampering with XREF header may lead to integer division by zero exception during its parsing by the application. Raised, not handled, exception causes Denial of Service of Foxit Reader.

name: Java Applet Reflection Type Confusion Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE contain an unspecified flaw related to the HotSpot subcomponent. This may allow a context dependent attacker to overwrite public final fields. This can be used to disable the security manager, allowing for additional privileges.

name: Novell GroupWise Client For Windows ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the ActiveX control for Novell GroupWise Client for Windows. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target to view a specially crafted webpage. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged in user.

name: libxslt "xsltAddKey()" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A NULL-pointer dereference error within the "xsltAddKey()" function (libxslt/keys.c) when parsing XSL keys can be exploited to cause a crash.

name: Identified Java Exploit
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect java vulnerability being exploited in the wild.

name: ISC BIND Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: libdns in ISC BIND on UNIX platforms allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted regular expression by a memory-exhaustion attack against a machine.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CDwnBindInfo Object Use-After-Free Vulnerability (CVE-2012-4792) - 2
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted or has not been properly allocated. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in a way that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user within Internet Explorer. An attacker could host a specially crafted website that is designed to exploit this vulnerability through Internet Explorer and then convince a user to view the website.

name: OpenSSL TLS And AES-NI Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. The issue is triggered during the handling of CBC Ciphersuites on AES-NI platforms. An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the application using the affected library, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Asterisk Management Interface Remote Stack Corruption Vulnerability
description: Asterisk management interface is prone to a remote stack corruption vulnerability. With specially crafted requests, a remote attacker can corrupt stack memory, resulting in execution of arbitrary code.

name: Identified Too Many Web Application Failed Login Attempt
description:
This rule blocks too many failed login attempts to web application by inspecting the number of error responses in a given time period.

Note: The rule should be customized to monitor the error message returned by server.

name: Novell Messenger/Groupwise Messenger Client Unspecified Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the nim: protocol handler in Novell GroupWise Messenger and Novell Messenger allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an import command containing a long string in the filename parameter.

name: Oracle Java SE GSUB FeatureCount Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java fails to check the FeatureCount value in the Truetype font leading to buffer overflow. Successful exploitation would cause memory corruption that may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user, or terminate the application resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: MongoDB "native_helper()" Type Confusion Vulnerability
description: MongoDB is prone to a remote code-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: EMC AlphaStor Device Name Creation Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: EMC AlphaStor is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: EMC AlphaStor Format String And Command Injection Vulnerabilities
description: EMC AlphaStor is prone to a format string vulnerability and a remote command injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial of service condition.

name: Kerberos KDC "pkinit_check_kdc_pkid()" NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability due to a NULL-pointer dereference error in KDC. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1307)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: XML External Entities Resolution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1301)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Visio parses specially crafted XML files containing external entities.

name: Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1308)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer JSON Array Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1297)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer that could allow an attacker to gain access and read the contents of JSON data files.

name: HTTP.sys Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1305)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Windows Server 2012 when the HTTP protocol stack (HTTP.sys) impropery handles a malicious HTTP header. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could trigger an infinite loop in the HTTP protocol stack by sending a specially crafted HTTP header to a Windows 2012 server.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1309)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1312)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Use-after-free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2550)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a local security bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

name: Vulnerability In Windows Shell Could Allow Remote Code Execution Over WebDAV (CVE-2012-0175)
description:
The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a file or directory with a specially crafted name. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

Note: This detection may have false alerts because some non-Windows operating system may create filenames using special characters which are not allowed on Windows systems.

name: RedHat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Web Console Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: The Web Console (aka web-console) in JBossAs in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (aka JBoss EAP or JBEAP)  performs access control only for the GET and POST methods, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via an unspecified request that uses a different method.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer JRE isInstalled.dnsResolve Function Memory Exception
description: There exists a design weakness vulnerability in the way Sun Java Web Start ActiveX control handles user supplied data. Specifically, the vulnerability is due to improper validation of user supplied data in the isInstalled.dnsResolve ActiveX control method. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious webpage, causing a denial-of service condition.

name: Java Web Start Launcher ActiveX Control Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect availability.

name: Microsoft WebDAV XML Message Handler Denial Of Service
description: The WebDAV Message Handler for Internet Information Services (IIS) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory and CPU exhaustion, application crash) via a crafted request with an XML message.

name: Kerberos KDC TGS-REQ Processing NULL-Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability due to a NULL-pointer dereference error. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Identified Suspicious Exim Sender Email Address
description:
This DPI rule is intended to detect a crafted sender's email address. Dovecot when configured with Exim, as a local delivery agent, contains a flaw as the program fails to sanitize input in the 'sender_address' parameter properly. Successful attacks may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands.

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Symantec Alert Management System Intel Alert Originator Service Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in the Symantec Alert Originator Service component, which can be exploited by malicious users to compromise a vulnerable system. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in iao.exe which can be exploited by remote unauthenticated attackers to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host.

name: Excel Record Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Identified EOT File With Embedded TrueType Font File
description: This is a generic rule to prevent download of any Embedded TrueType (EOT) font file over web. Attackers may use crafted EOT files embedding malicious TrueType font to cause remote code execution.

name: Identified TTF File/OTF File Download
description: This is a generic rule to prevent any True Type Font (TTF) and Open Type Font (OTF) file downloads over HTTP. Attackers may use malicious TTF and OTF files to cause remote code execution.

name: Restrict Java Bytecode File (Jar/Class) Download
description: This rule blocks Java Jar files and Class files from being downloaded over HTTP. These files can be used by an attacker to run arbitrary Java code.

name: Squid httpMakeVaryMark() Header Value Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Squid contains a flaw in the httpMakeVaryMark() function in http.cc that may allow a remote denial of service. The issue is triggered during the handling of a malformed X-HEADSHOT header. This may allow a remote attacker to crash the program.

name: HP System Management Anonymous Access Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in HP System Management Homepage (SMH). A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a malicious request to the affected server. A successful exploitation attempt could result in executing arbitrary code on the target server. Anonymous access must be enabled to trigger this vulnerability.

name: Novell GroupWise Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: The client in Novell GroupWise allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (incorrect pointer dereference) via unspecified vectors.

name: Apple Quick Time Player Out Of Bound Read Vulnerability
description: A memory out of bound read issue exists in Apple Quick Time Player which can be triggered while trying to open a specially crafted "qtif" image file using Quick Time Player/Quick time Picture Viewer or Quick Time Browser Plug-in.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3110)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3124)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java Font Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1491)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: Asterisk SIP SDP Header Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Asterisk is prone to a remote stack based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Digium Asterisk HTTP Manager Interface Resource Exhaustion Vulnerability
description: Asterisk management interface is prone to a remote stack exhaustion vulnerability which allows remote attackers to conduct stack-consumption attacks and cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP POST request.

name: IBM Cognos TM1 Admin Server Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: IBM Cognos TM1 is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user supplied input before copying it into a fixed length buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3142)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3139)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3116)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1311)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java setICMpixels Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3111)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Adobe Portable Document Format File With Embedded Font
description: This rule prevents the download of Adobe Portable Document Format (pdf) file embedded with font file over web. Attackers may use crafted pdf files, with font file embedding to cause read and write access violation in Adobe Acrobat Reader.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3123)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java JDK / JRE ImageIO Subcomponent Unspecified Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability exists within the write and readImage of the JPEGImageReader class. This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Oracle Java.

name: Oracle WebCenter Capture BlackIceDevMode.ocx ActiveX Control "SetAnnotationFont()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle WebCenter Capture component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote authenticated users to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Import Server.

name: Apple Safari Webarchive File Format UXSS Vulnerability
description: Apple Safari is prone to a universal cross site scripting vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute script in the context of any domain.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3114)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java DriverManager Privilege Block Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability exists within the java.sql.DriverManager implicit call to toString(). This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Oracle Java.

name: IBM SPSS SamplePower C1Tab ActiveX Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM SPSS SamplePower. The vulnerability is due to a lack of boundary checking on the user-supplied TabCaption value in the c1sizer ActiveX control.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3118)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3119)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3121)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: SAS Integration Technologies Client ActiveX Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The SASspk module in the SAS Integration Technologies client has stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability  that could allow arbitrary code execution by an attacker when exploiting the non-sanitized 'bstrFileName' parameter.

name: Mozilla Firefox Flash Privileged Code Injection Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privileges by leveraging improper interaction between plugin objects and SVG elements.

name: SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher Service Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple vulnerabilities exist in SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher service in a way that a remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted Diagnostic packet to the vulnerable "Dispatcher" service. Successful exploitation can result in code execution in the context of the affected service. If code execution is unsuccessful the affected service may terminate abnormally.

name: Identified Malicious Java JAR Files - 1
description: This rule blocks malicious java jar files which are known to have been used in the wild.

name: Microsoft IIS Content Location Internal IP Address Disclosure
description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Microsoft IIS that may disclose the internal IP address to remote attackers. This vulnerability can be exploited if an attacker connects to a host using HTTPS and crafts a specially formed request.

name: Detected HTTP Basic Authentication Method
description:
The HTTP Basic Authentication scheme is not considered to be a secure method of user authentication (unless used in conjunction with some external secure system such as TLS/SSL), as the user name and password are passed over the network as cleartext.

Note: This rule could give multiple triggers on some network environment, as it is notifying the usage of authentication method.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1533)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Deployment.

name: Cumulative Security Updates Of ActiveX Kill Bits - May 2013
description: This rule prevents the instantiation of the ActiveX controls mentioned in the security advisory of Microsoft in May 2013.

name: Apple QuickTime enof Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via crafted enof atoms in a movie file.

name: Identified Microsoft Word Document References A Remote Picture File
description:
This is a heuristic based rule intended to block the word documents reference a PNG/GIF/JPEG file loaded from Internet and hosted on a remote server.

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3117)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Nagios XI Command Execution Vulnerability
description: A command execution vulnerability exists in Nagios XI Autodiscovery tool, due to insufficient sanitization of user input. Successful exploitation could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary shell commands.

name: Apache Tomcat 'Transfer-Encoding' Information Disclosure And Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
description:
Apache Tomcat contains a vulnerability that might expose the server to remote denial of service attacks and potentially disclose information about applications running on the server. 

Note: Apache Tomcat servers that utilize SSL are not immune to such attacks. Administrators are suggested to enable SSL traffic inspection feature in the Deep Security Manager to provide sufficient protection.

name: Microsoft IIS Server Crafted ASP Page Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

name: Word RTF File Parsing Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) formatted data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: IBM SPSS SamplePower 'Vsflex8l' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM SPSS SamplePower due to
a lack of boundary checking while processing the ComboList and ColComboList property. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to visit a crafted web page. Successful exploitation can lead to arbitrary code execution.

name: MDaemon Body HTML Injection Vulnerability
description: MDaemon is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control.

name: Nagios Remote Plugin Executor Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Nagios Remote Plugin Executor (NRPE) is prone to a remote arbitrary command-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Nginx http_parse_chunked Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Nginx is prone to a remote security vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial of service condition or obtain sensitive information.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3144)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3164)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3150)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: SAP ConfigServlet OS Command Execution Vulnerability
description: The ConfigServlet in the SAP Netweaver Application Server has OS Command Execution Vulnerability which can be exploited to run OS commands remotely in the context of the running process.

name: HP Operations Agent coda.exe GET Request Handling Remote Code Execution (CVE-2012-2020)
description: A code execution vulnerability has been reported in HP Operations Agent. When handling requests with various opcodes, the vulnerable code uses a user-supplied value as the length for a copy operation whose destination is a fixed length stack buffer.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3145)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: IBM Lotus Domino Request Forgery Vulnerability
description: IBM Domino Web Administrator client (webadmin.nsf) is vulnerable to Cross Site Request Forgery attack. One of the ways to execute this attack is Cross Site Command Execution. By sending a special link to the administrator, an attacker can execute any command on the OS where Lotus is installed and get the result of the executed command.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Control Center Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
description: The web server in Novell ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM) does not properly perform authentication for zenworks/jsp/index.jsp, which allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks, and consequently upload and execute arbitrary programs.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3148)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3153)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3115)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3152)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: VLC Media Player Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: VLC Media Player is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Symantec Web Gateway Remote Shell Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a vulnerability that can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attack-supplied commands in the context of the affected application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3143)
description: A vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted. The Internet Explorer process may corrupt memory in such a way that will lead to a crash or to executing arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft UPnP NOTIFY Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) on allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a NOTIFY directive with a long Location URL.

name: GnuTLS TLS Record Decoding Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: GnuTLS is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3146)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Apple QuickTime Movie File JPEG Encoded Data Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via crafted JPEG data in a movie file.

name: SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher Service Multiple Vulnerabilities - 2
description: Multiple vulnerabilities exist in SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher service in a way that a remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted Diagnostic packet to the vulnerable "Dispatcher" service. Successful exploitation can result in code execution in the context of the affected service. If code execution is unsuccessful the affected service may terminate abnormally.

name: Microsoft Windows DirectShow Arbitrary Memory Overwrite Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3174)
description: Microsoft DirectShow is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running an application that uses DirectShow. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe TIFF File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader allows remote attackers to cause a buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a malformed PDF document.

name: Identified Suspicious Apache Linux/Cdorked HTTP Request Cookie Header
description:
This DPI rule is intended to detect a crafted HTTP request Cookie header which was used in the recent Apache Backdoor, Linux/Cdorked.A. The backdoor redirects traffic to malicious websites by crafting web Cookie header. Successful attacks enables remote attackers to get the full root access to the server from modifying configurations, to injecting modules and replacing binaries. 

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Disallow Unnecessary IIS ISAPI Filter AND Extension
description: ISAPI filters and extensions are used to modify or enhance the functionality provided by IIS. Some versions of IIS enable unwanted filters and extensions by default, and these services have been known to be insecure.

name: SAP NetWeaver SOAP RFC Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: SAP NetWeaver contains a vulnerability in the SXPG_CALL_SYSTEM function, on the SAP SOAP RFC Service, which will allow a remote attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3147)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Novell iPrint Client Unspecified Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Novell iPrint Client is vulnerable to buffer overflow. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of IPP responses that can lead to a buffer overflow. Successful exploitation can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a target system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Debian Linux Httpd Vulnerability
description: The Debian GNU/Linux Apache package by default allows anyone to view /usr/doc via the web, remotely.

name: Apache 'mod-rpaf' Module Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The reverse proxy add forward module (mod_rpaf) for the Apache HTTP Server allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (server or application crash) via  unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft IIS Multiple Extension Processing Security Bypass
description:
Microsoft IIS is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.
This vulnerability may result in IIS interpreting unexpected files as CGI applications. Attackers may be able to exploit this vulnerability to bypass intended security restrictions.

name: Apple QuickTime Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1017)
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user. Failed exploit attempts will cause denial of service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code or crash the application resulting in denial of service conditions.

name: HP Database Archiving Software Remote Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Database Archiving Software allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: SonicWALL GMS Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
description: SonicWALL Global Management System (GMS) is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain administrative access to the web interface. This allows attackers to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges that could fully compromise the system.

name: IBM AIX FTP NLST Command Crafted Parameter Core Dump Password Hash Remote Disclosure Vulnerability
description: AIX FTP Server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

name: Squid "idnsALookup()" DNS Name Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Squid is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3188)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3193)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3194)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3199)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3189)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Linux Kernel iSCSI Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability is in the iscsi_add_notunderstood_response() function in the iscsi_target driver of Linux kernel while processing very long keys. A successful attack can result in arbitrary code execution with kernel privileges. An unsuccessful attack will cause the kernel to crash resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3187)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer JavaScript OnLoad Handler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploitation attempts likely result in the application crashing.

name: Restrict Ruby On Rails Known Secret Session Cookie Header Field Length
description: This rule identifies the HTTP request with Cookie header field that exceeds a certain length restriction with some other heuristic detection.

name: Oracle WebCenter Content CheckOutAndOpen.dll ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle WebCenter Content component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote authenticated users to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Content Server.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3191)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java IntegerComponentRaster Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java suffer from an unspecified vulnerability that exists within the native IntegerComponentRaster method which allows for remote code execution. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user.

name: Red Hat Linux Apache Remote Username Enumeration Vulnerability
description: Apache on Red Hat Linux with the UserDir directive enabled generates different error codes when a username exists and there is no public_html directory and when the username does not exist, which could allow remote attackers to determine valid usernames on the server.

name: VLC Media Player ABC File Handling Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exist in the libmodplug library used by VLC Media Player. The vulnerability results in integer overflow while parsing Parts field in ABC files.

name: Media Decompression Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0077)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows handles media content. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted media file (such as an .mpg file), opens a Microsoft Office document (such as a .ppt file) that contains a specially crafted embedded media file, or receives specially crafted streaming content.

name: Microsoft Office Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1331)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Office parses specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Apache Shiro Filters Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: Apache Shiro could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when normalizing URL paths for the path-matching logic. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory traversal attacks to bypass path-based filters.

name: Microsoft Silverlight Null Pointer Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3178)
description: Microsoft Silverlight 5 does not properly initialize arrays, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted Silverlight application, aka "Null Pointer Vulnerability."

name: ISC BIND DNS Server RDATA Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: ISC BIND Server does not properly handle resource records within RDATA section, which allows remote DNS servers to cause a denial of service.

name: ISC BIND DNS RDATA Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: ISC BIND does not properly handle resource records within RDATA section, which allows remote DNS servers to cause a denial of service.

name: HP Managed Printing Administration jobAcct Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: A directory traversal vulnerability has been identified in HP Managed Printing Administration, which allows attackers to read or write arbitrary files.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader U3D Component Memory Corruption (CVE-2011-2462)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the U3D component in Adobe Reader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption).

name: Perl Locale::Maketext Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
description: The _compile function in Maketext.pm in the Locale::Maketext implementation in Perl does not properly handle backslashes and fully qualified method names during compilation of bracket notation, which allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary commands via crafted input to an application that accepts translation strings from users.

name: Oracle Hyperion Directory Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3803)
description: Oracle Hyperion is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to gain access to arbitrary files. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.

name: Libtirpc "svc_dg_getargs()" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The svc_dg_getargs function in libtirpc allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a Sun RPC request with crafted arguments that trigger a free of an invalid pointer.

name: SAP Netweaver CTC Service User Management Vulnerability
description: SAP NetWeaver CTC service suffers from authentication bypass vulnerability which can be exploited by an remote unauthenticated attacker for unauthorized user management.

name: Microsoft PhoneBook Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was discovered in the URL processing routines of the Phone Book Service requests on IIS. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code and obtain a remote command shell with those privileges of the IUSR_machinename account or the IWAM_machinename account.

name: CA ARCserve Backup RPC Request Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: CA ARCserve Backup Server does not properly process RPC requests, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted request.

name: EMC NetWorker 'nsrindexd' RPC Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: EMC NetWorker is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2463)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE and OpenJDK, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: HP LoadRunner Unspecified Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP LoadRunner is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: Mozilla Firefox GIF Color Map Parser Heap Buffer Overflow
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code and to cause denial of service conditions by tricking a victim into visiting a malicious webpage.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player AVM Bytecode Verification Vulnerability
description: A critical vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player and the Authplay.dll component. This vulnerability could cause a crash and potentially allow an attacker to take control of the affected system. The vulnerability has been exploited in the wild in targeted attacks via a Flash (.swf) file.

name: Restrict HTTP Request URI Terminal Escape Sequences
description: Web Servers can fail to filter terminal escape sequences from error logs. Escape sequences are a series of characters that begin with the ASCII (0x1B) sequence and are followed by a series of arguments. If a remote attacker could inject escape sequences into an Apache error log, the attacker could take advantages of weaknesses in many terminal emulator software packages and launch further attacks against remote users. This could include denial of service attacks, file modification, data modification, and possibly the execution of arbitrary commands.

name: Oracle Warehouse Builder 'WB_RT_AUDIT_SHADOW_TABLE' Multiple SQL Injections
description: Oracle  Warehouse  Builder, a component of Oracle Database, contains multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. The vulnerabilities are due to improper input validation in various procedures in the OWBREPOS_OWNER.WB_RT_AUDIT_SHADOW_TABLE package. Remote authenticated attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities by sending a specially crafted parameter to the affected procedures. Successful exploitation would result in disclosure and manipulation of data in the underlying database, and execution of arbitrary commands on the system on which the database is running.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat util.printf Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Adobe Acrobat and Reader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF file containing a crafted format string in the util.printf JavaScript function.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat 'newplayer()' JavaScript Method Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle Java SE Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2470)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: VLC Player Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: VLC Player is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Products authplay.dll Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A critical vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player and the authplay.dll component that ships with Adobe Reader and Acrobat for Windows, Macintosh and UNIX operating systems. This vulnerability could cause a crash and potentially allow an attacker to take control of the affected system.

name: PHP File Path Injection Vulnerability
description: A policy bypass vulnerability has been reported in PHP. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of user-supplied file path names when filling the $_FILES[] array. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files on a web server. This can lead to arbitrary code execution.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3206)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3202)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java JDK/JRE 2D Subcomponent Unspecified Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java and OpenJDK , allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer EUC-JP Character Encoding Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3192)
description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted character sequences with EUC-JP encoding.

name: VMware vCenter Chargeback Manager ImageUploadServlet Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
description: VMware vCenter Chargeback Manager (aka CBM) does not properly handle uploads, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Windows Theme File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0810)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected editions of Microsoft Windows handles certain specially crafted Windows theme files. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code if the attacker convinces a user to apply a specially crafted Windows theme.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3208)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3209)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3204)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat util.printf JavaScript Function Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Adobe Acrobat and Reader 8.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF file that calls the util.printf JavaScript function with a crafted format string argument, a related issue to CVE-2008-1104.

name: iTunes .Pls File Handling Buffer Overflow
description: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iTunes. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can create a specially crafted '.pls' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.

name: SMTP Server MX Record Vulnerability
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that the Microsoft Windows Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) component handles specially crafted DNS Mail Exchanger (MX) resource records. An attempt to exploit the vulnerability would not require authentication, allowing an attacker to exploit the vulnerability by sending a specially crafted network message to a computer running the SMTP service. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the SMTP service to stop responding until restarted.

name: phpMyAdmin Superglobal Session Manipulation Arbitrary PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
description: libraries/auth/swekey/swekey.auth.lib.php in the Swekey authentication feature in phpMyAdmin assigns values to arbitrary parameters referenced in the query string, which allows remote attackers to modify the SESSION superglobal array via a crafted request, related to a "remote variable manipulation vulnerability".

name: Microsoft Windows Server Message Block Buffer Overflow
description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows SMB (Server Message Block) implementation. The affected products do not perform sufficient validation on the length of SMB network messages. This flaw may allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service, or inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system with system level privileges.

Note: In some network environment, rule could log events multiple times, as rule will not be able to identify the attack precisely, to confirm the attack every trigger should be investigated further.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3203)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: HP LoadRunner WriteFileString ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP LoadRunner is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1347)
description:
Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. 
Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Oracle Java SE Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2472)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE and OpenJDK, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: Microsoft SQL Server sp_replwritetovarbin Limited Memory Overwrite Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the implementation of the "sp_replwritetovarbin()" SQL procedure. This can be exploited to cause a heap-based buffer overflow via specially crafted arguments passed to the affected procedure. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code with escalated privileges.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3205)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Apache Struts Redirect/RedirectAction Prefix In HTTP Request
description: This rule detects the usage of OGNL predefined prefix "redirect" and "redirectAction", which may allow remote attacker to evaluate crafted OGNL expressions to execute arbitrary Java code, execute arbitrary commands and redirect URL to any location.

name: Apache Struts 'ParameterInterceptor' Class OGNL Expression Parsing Remote Command Execution
description: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer.

name: Apache Struts2 ParametersInterceptor Remote Command Execution
description: A command execution vulnerability exists in the web application framework Apache Struts2. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation when parsing incoming HTTP requests. A remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to a target system and execute arbitrary code remotely.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3184)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Apache Struts Action Prefix In HTTP Request
description: This rule detects the usage of OGNL predefined prefix "Action", which may allow remote attacker to evaluate crafted OGNL expressions to execute arbitrary Java code, execute arbitrary commands and redirect URL to any location.

name: Identified Apache Struts Dynamic Method Invocation In HTTP Request
description: This rule detects the usage of Dynamic Method Invocation, which may allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary method.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Server Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0081)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Microsoft SharePoint Server. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the W3WP process on an affected version of SharePoint Server to stop responding, causing the SharePoint site, and any other sites running under that process, to become unavailable until the process is restarted.

name: Identified Suspicious Malware Activity
description: This DPI rule is intended to detect the "Operation DeputyDog" campaign leveraging the Internet Explorer zero-day CVE-2013-3893.

name: Adobe Flash Player 'SWF' File Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been reported in Adobe Flash Player, which can be exploited by attackers to compromise a user's system.

name: Adobe Flash Player XLS Remote Code Execution
