description: A critical vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player and the Authplay.dll component that ships with Adobe Reader and Acrobat. This vulnerability could cause a crash and potentially allow an attacker to take control of the affected system. The vulnerability has been exploited in the wild in targeted attacks via a Flash (.swf) file embedded in a Microsoft Excel (.xls) file delivered as an email attachment.

name: Disallow SMTP Command EXPN And VRFY
description: In Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP)-compliant applications EXPN and VRFY command, could allow an attacker to determine if an account exists on a system. Such information could provide an attacker significant assistance in executing a brute force attack on user accounts.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3207)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses an object in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer "document.getElementById" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Successfully exploiting this issue will cause the application to stop responding, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Visual Basic 'VBP_Open Project' File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Visual Basic is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service.

name: Disallow HTTP (Including WebDAV) Methods
description: This filter restricts HTTP methods that can be used when accessing the server. It can be configured to prevent specific HTTP methods including WebDAV. Exceptions can also be specified for certain resources.

name: Novell iPrint Client 'ienipp.ocx' ActiveX 'GetDriverSettings()' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
A stack buffer overflow exists in Novell iPrint client. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation by the ienipp.ocx ActiveX when processing input to one of the vulnerable methods. A remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a specially crafted web page.

Successful exploitation can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a target system. In an unsuccessful attack attempt, the browser may abnormally terminate.

name: Core FTP 'LIST' Command Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Core FTP is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. Exploiting this issue allows an attacker to write arbitrary files to locations outside of the FTP client's current directory. This could help the attacker to launch the further attacks.

name: Multiple Vendor Web Browser FTP Client Cross Site Scripting
description: Multiple vendors' web browsers are prone a cross-site scripting vulnerability that arises because the software fails to handle specially crafted files served using the FTP protocol. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of an FTP session. This may allow the attacker to perform malicious actions in a user's browser or redirect the user to a malicious site.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3886)
description: A vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted. The Internet Explorer process may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3875)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3874)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3112)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3885)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0753)
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer SWF File Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Parameter Validation Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0163)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft .NET Framework validates parameters when passing data to a function. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3873)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: PHP XML Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: ext/xml/xml.c in PHP does not properly consider parsing depth, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted document that is processed by the xml_parse_into_struct function.

name: Identified Suspicious Download Of XML File Over HTTP
description: This rule prevents the download of large XML file over HTTP. Attackers may use crafted XML files to cause remote code execution. It may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Oracle Java True Type Font Processing Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote security vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Internet Explorer FTP Client Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote malicious FTP servers to overwrite arbitrary files via directory traversal sequence.

name: Oracle JRE JPEG.DLL Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote security vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Oracle Java mlib_image!cvtCustomToDefault Array Out Of Bound Read Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote security vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: OpenSSL SSL_get_shared_ciphers Function Buffer Overflow
description: There exits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the OpenSSL library. The flaw is due to improper handling of overly long cipher lists supplied by the peer. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system.

name: HP Data Protector Cell Request Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector Cell Request Service is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: Squid Web Proxy Cache HTTP Version Number Parsing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description:
Squid is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the proxy server fails to handle certain HTTP requests.
Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying further service to legitimate users.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0428)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2421)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to HotSpot.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2422)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Libraries.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1475)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Allow Outgoing Passive FTP Connections
description:
This is a dummy rule to assign DPI rule, '1003022 - Port Mapper Decoder FTP Client' which will in-turn help in handling dynamic ports in Firewall.

Dynamic port functionality has been removed from the Firewall in DS 9.0. Hence Passive FTP does not work on FTP Client that's protected by DSVA/DSA. DPI port mapper rule which decodes dynamic ports can be used to enable dynamic ports in Firewall with Stateful Inspection configuration.

name: Apache Mixed Platform AddType Directive Information Disclosure
description: Apache HTTP Server, when running on Linux with a document root on a Windows share mounted using smbfs, allows remote attackers to obtain unprocessed content such as source files for .php programs via a trailing "\" (backslash), which is not handled by the intended AddType directive.

name: Oracle Java Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Anonymous/Default FTP Login Attempt Detected
description: This is a heuristic based rule to detect the FTP login using default/Anonymous login. Anonymous FTP accounts can allow unauthorized access to a system.

name: Microsoft IIS Internal IP Address Disclosure
description: IIS allows remote attackers to obtain the internal IP address of the server via an HTTP 1.0 request for a web page which is protected by basic authentication and has no realm defined.

name: Samba Packet Handling Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Samba is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to consume excessive CPU resources, resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2012-5073)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Oracle Java Signature Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability exists in Oracle Java which allows remote attackers to bypass verification of XML signatures via vectors related to a missing check for DOMCanonicalizationMethod canonicalization algorithm.

name: Microsoft OpenType Font Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3128)
description: There is a denial of service vulnerability in the way that Windows parses OpenType fonts.  An attacker can modify an OpenType font file so that, when it is installed on the victim's computer, it triggers a system crash.

name: IBM SPSS SamplePower 'Vsflex7l' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM SPSS SamplePower 'Vsflex7l' due to
a lack of boundary checking while processing the ComboList and ColComboList property. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to visit a crafted web page. Successful exploitation can lead to arbitrary code execution.

name: Identified Microsoft Office File With Embedded TIFF File
description:
This rule is intended to block any Microsoft Office file embedded with TIFF over web. Attackers may use crafted Microsoft Office files having embedded TIFF file to run arbitrary code remotely.

Note: TIFF files can be embedded in Microsoft Office files in multiple ways. This rule detects TIFF files embedded in Microsoft Office in certain known ways. And the rule does not detect Microsoft Office Open XML format (docx, pptx, etc.) files.

name: Microsoft Graphics Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3906) - 1
description: A remote code execution vulnerability that exists in the way affected components handle specially crafted TIFF images. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by convincing a user to open a specially crafted file, or browse specially crafted web content.

name: Apache mod_accounting Blind SQL Injection Vulnerability

name: Asterisk SIP Channel Driver Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Denial of Service vulnerability exists in channel driver of Asterisk Open Source SIP, which allows remote users to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact.

name: Sybase EAServer XML Injection Vulnerability
description: XML External Entity vulnerability exists in Sybase EAServer. The vulnerability can lead to arbitrary file reading.

name: MongoDB 'conn' Mongo Object Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: MongoDB is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Express CAD Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in context of the affected application.

name: Apache HTTP Server Default Install Directory Listing Vulnerability
description: By default, the Apache configuration under Red Hat Linux, and possibly other Linux operating systems, could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. A remote attacker can send a GET request followed by two slash characters '//' to traverse directories and view directory listings and arbitrary files outside of the Web root directory

name: Allow Incoming Passive FTP Connections
description:
This rule is intended to assign DPI rule, '1003783 - Port Mapper Decoder FTP Server' which will in-turn help in handling dynamic ports in Firewall.

Dynamic port functionality has been removed from the Firewall in DS 9.0. Hence Passive FTP does not work on FTP server that's protected by DSVA/DSA. DPI port mapper rule which decodes dynamic ports can be used to enable dynamic ports in Firewall with Stateful Inspection configuration.

name: Allow Outgoing Active FTP Connections
description:
This is a smart rule to assign DPI rule, '1005721- Port Mapper Decoder Active FTP Client' which will in-turn help in handling dynamic ports in Firewall.

Dynamic port functionality has been removed from the Firewall in DS 9.0. Hence Active FTP does not work on FTP client protected by DSVA/DSA. DPI port mapper rule which decodes dynamic ports can be used to enable dynamic ports in Firewall with Stateful Inspection configuration.

name: Microsoft WinVerifyTrust Signature Validation Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3900)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Authenticode Signature Verification function used for portable executable (PE) formats. An anonymous attacker could exploit the vulnerability by modifying an existing signed executable file to manipulate unverified portions of the signature and file in such a way as to add malicious code to the file without invalidating the signature. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Open Flash Chart 'ofc_upload_image.php' Remote PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Open Flash Chart is prone to a vulnerability that lets remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because the application fails to sanitize user-supplied inputs. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code within the context of the affected web server process.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3352)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Identified HTTP Request For TEST-CGI
description: This rule detects HTTP requests for the test-cgi program. These requests could indicate attempts by an attacker to view the contents of the cgi-bin directory or other directories on the Web server.

name: Identified Malicious PDF Document - 2
description:
This DPI rule is intended to block known malicious PDF documents which are used in attacks in the wild.

Note: This rule is always recommended when any version of PDF reader is installed on the computer.

name: Identified Malicious PDF Document - 7
description:
This DPI rule is intended to block known malicious PDF documents which are used in attacks in the wild.

Note: This rule is always recommended when any version of PDF reader is installed on the computer.

name: EMC NetWorker Product "nsrexecd.exe" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: nsrexecd.exe in EMC Networker does not properly control the allocation of memory, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion) via multiple crafted RPC requests.

name: PHP Exif Extension 'exif_read_data()' Function Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: exif.c in the Exif extension in PHP performs an incorrect cast, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via an image with a crafted Image File Directory (IFD) that triggers a buffer over-read.

name: HP System Management Homepage JustGetSNMPQueue Command Injection Vulnerability
description:
HP System Management Homepage is prone to remote command injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in context of the affected application.

Note: To monitor SSL Data Stream, agent (DSA) needs to be configured via "SSL Configuration Wizard" and has to acquire the Server SSL certificate where DPI rule is assigned.

name: Microsoft SharePoint Directory Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0084)
description: An elevation of privilege exists in Microsoft SharePoint Server. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive system data and elevate their access to the server.

name: Restrict Sitecore CMS Staging Service 'api.asmx' Authentication Bypass
description:
Sitecore CMS is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain administrative access to the affected application. This DPI rule is intended to detect and restrict the following staging operations to/from slave web servers, i.e,"Upload", "Download", "List" and "ClearCache". 

Note: This DPI rule is intended to be applied on Slave Sitecore Server. Configuration options are provided to add Master Web Servers' IP addresses.

name: Adobe ColdFusion Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists in Adobe ColdFusion, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Apple QuickTime TeXML textBox Element Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to insufficient validation of textBox and defaultTextBox. The vulnerability could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption).

name: Microsoft Windows Locator Service Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow in the RPC Locator service for Microsoft Windows allows remote users to execute arbitrary code via an RPC call to the service containing certain parameter information.

name: Multiple Products EJBInvokerServlet And JMXInvokerServlet Marshalled Object Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Remote Code Execution vulnerability exists in Multiple Products marshalled objects EJBInvokerServlet and JMXInvokerServlet. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

name: Mozilla Firefox Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5329)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Access Memory Corruption Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Microsoft Access in Microsoft Office allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted Access file.

name: iPlanet Web Publisher Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in Web Publisher in iPlanet Web Server Enterprise Edition allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a request for a long URI.

name: HTTP Method Length Restriction
description: This DPI rule is intended to restrict length of HTTP method. Configuration option is provided to change the maximum length of HTTP method.

name: iPlanet Web Server Search Component File Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability in search engine for iPlanet web server and Netscape Enterprise Server, when running on Windows platforms, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via directory traversal sequences in the NS-query-pat parameter.

name: iPlanet Administration Server ViewLog Component Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability in ViewLog for iPlanet Administration Server allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a specially crafted request.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Entity Expansion Vulnerability
description: Microsoft .NET Framework does not properly parse a DTD during XML digital-signature validation, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash or hang) via a crafted signed XML document, aka "Entity Expansion Vulnerability".

name: Apache CXF XML Parser Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apache CXF is prone to remote denial-of-service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service condition.

name: HP Operations Agent coda.exe GET Request Handling Remote Code Execution (CVE-2012-2019)
description: A code execution vulnerability has been reported in HP Operations Agent. When handling a length-encoded chunk in a request received over the network, the vulnerable code copies user-supplied data into a fixed-length stack buffer without boundary check.

name: PHP Exif Header Parsing Vulnerability
description: Integer overflow in the exif_process_IFD_TAG function in exif.c in the exif extension in PHP allows remote attackers to read the contents of arbitrary memory locations or cause a denial of service via a crafted offset_val value in an EXIF header in a JPEG file

name: Serva TFTPD Service Large Read Requests Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the TFTPD service in Serva32 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a long string in a read request.

name: HP Data Protector Cell Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: EMC AlphaStor Library Control Program Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: EMC AlphaStor is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial of service conditions or execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: iPlanet Application Server WelcomeListServlet Internal File Disclosure Vulnerability
description: A file/information disclosure vulnerability exists in iPlanet Application Server WelcomeListServlet that could allow an attacker to gain access and read the contents of the files.

name: iPlanet Long SHTML URI Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the SHTML logging functionality of iPlanet Web Server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a long filename with a .shtml extension.

name: HP Data Protector Cell Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2324)
description: HP Data Protector Cell Manager is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: HP SiteScope "omHost" Command Injection Vulnerability
description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in HP SiteScope, when SOAP is used, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft IIS MDAC msadcs.dll RDS Arbitrary Remote Command Execution
description: The Remote Data Service (RDS) DataFactory component of Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC) in IIS exposes unsafe methods, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

name: Microsoft Windows NFS Server NULL Pointer Dereference Remote Denial Of Service (CVE-2013-1281)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when the Windows NFS server fails to properly handle a file operation on a read-only share. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause the affected system to stop responding and restart.

name: PHP Session Serializer Data Injection Vulnerability
description: The default session serializer in PHP does not properly handle the PS_UNDEF_MARKER marker, which allows context-dependent attackers to modify arbitrary session variables via a crafted session variable name.

name: Quick TFTP Server Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Quick TFTP Server has a buffer overflow vulnerability when it receives a crafted request containing the payload more than its buffer length.

name: WinRadius Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability exists in WinRadius which can be exploited to cause a Denial of Service. The vulnerability is caused due to an error when parsing Access-Request packets with long password field.

name: Telnet-Ftp Service Server Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been identified in Telnet-Ftp Service Server, which allows attackers to read or write arbitrary files.

name: HP System Management iprange Parameter Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
HP System Management Homepage is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in context of the affected application.

Note: To monitor SSL Data Stream, agent (DSA) needs to be configured via "SSL Configuration Wizard" and has to acquire the Server SSL certificate where DPI rule is assigned.

name: Apache mod_alias CGI Source Code Disclosure Vulnerability
description: This rule detects HTTP requests for the CGI-BIN program. These requests could indicate attempts by an attacker to view the contents of the scripts in cgi-bin directory.

name: Identified Adobe ColdFusion Administration RDS Authentication With Blank Password
description: This DPI rule detects the RDS authentication with blank password to Adobe ColdFusion administrator, which may allow remote attacker to gain unauthorized access and execute arbitrary code.

name: Restrict Sitecore CMS 'url' Parameter URI Redirection
description:
Sitecore CMS is prone to URI redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user supplied input. Successful exploits may redirect a user to a potentially malicious website. This DPI rule is intended to detect and restrict HTTP request when "url" parameter is set to an external host.

Note: By nature of this vulnerability, it is difficult to distinguish between a malicious and benign traffic. Configuration options are provided to enter IP/Domain where redirection is allowed.

name: Kerberos KDC TGS-REQ Request Handling NULL Pointer Dereference Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability due to a NULL-pointer dereference error. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: PHP OpenSSL Extension X.509 Certificate Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the OpenSSL module of PHP, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted X.509 certificate.

name: WordPress Caching Plugins Remote PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
description: W3 Total Cache and WP Super Cache plugins for WordPress are prone to a remote PHP code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code within the context of the web server.

name: iPlanet Web Server Chunked Encoding Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in iPlanet Web Server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an HTTP request using chunked transfer encoding.

name: HP Intelligent Management Center Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Unspecified vulnerabilities in HP Intelligent Management Center (iMC) and HP IMC Branch Intelligent Management System Software Module allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or obtain sensitive information via unknown vectors.

name: HP ProCurve Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: HP ProCurve Manager (PCM) does not properly validate the fileName argument, which allows remote attackers to upload .jsp files and consequently execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

name: Kingsoft Office Path Subversion Arbitrary DLL Injection Code Execution Vulnerability Over WebDAV
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Kingsoft Office while loading the DLL file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Oracle Outside In Filters Subcomponent OS/2 Metafile Parser Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle Outside In Technology is prone to a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the vulnerable application using the library. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial of service conditions.

name: Kingsoft Writer WPS File Font Name Handling Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Kingsoft Writer is prone to a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions.

name: PHP Multiple Vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-1172)
description: The file-upload implementation in PHP does not properly handle invalid characters in name values, which makes it easier for remote attackers to cause a denial of service (malformed $_FILES indexes) or conduct directory traversal attacks during multi-file uploads by leveraging a script that lacks its own filename restrictions.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0496)
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Kingsoft Office Writer DOC File Handling Overflow Vulnerability
description: Kingsoft Writer is prone to a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions.

name: Oracle Outside In Filters Subcomponent OS/2 Metafile Parser Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description:
A denial of service vulnerability exists in Oracle Outside-In, a set of libraries used to decode many file formats. The vulnerability is due to an error while processing OS/2 Metafiles. Successful exploitation can result
in a denial of service condition of the affected application.

name: Oracle Outside In OS/2 Metafile Parser Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle Outside In Technology contains an overflow condition in the OS/2 Metafile Parser (immet2.flt) in the Outside In Filters subcomponent. The issue is triggered as user-supplied input is not properly validated. Successful exploitation can result in execution of arbitrary code or a denial of service condition in the context of the affected application.

name: Oracle Outside In Microsoft Access Parser Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Outside In Technology component allows context-dependent attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters.

name: Apache Santuario XML Security Transforms Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apache Santuario XML Security for Java, when applying transforms, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted Document Type Definitions, related to signatures.

name: Oracle Outside In Technology Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Outside In Technology component allows context-dependent attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Maintenance.

name: Microsoft Outlook Message Certificate Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3870)
description: Microsoft Outlook is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user, which can lead to a complete compromise of the affected computer.

name: Oracle Java SE And Java For Business Remote Java Plug-in Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE and Java for Business is prone to a remote vulnerability in the Java plug-in. The new plug-in component fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input resulting in a stack buffer overflow. With a specially crafted website, a context-dependent attacker can potentially cause arbitrary code execution.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0288)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java BasicServiceImpl Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java is prone to a remote vulnerability in Java Web Start 'BasicServiceImpl'. The vulnerability can be exploited to escape the Java sandbox and run arbitrary code in the context of the Java Runtime.

description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code while processing a RealMedia file. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted RealMedia file, possibly embedded in a web page, with the affected application.

name: Oracle Java SE JNDI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0422)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to JNDI.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5893)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Libraries.

name: VLC Media Player ASF Demuxer Division By Zero Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: VLC Media Player is prone to denial of service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to crash.

name: Identified POSWDS Malware Connection Over SMB
description:
This DPI rule is intended to detect remote access of the windows folder twain_32(windows\twain_32) over SMB. This type of network activity is being used in POSWDS malware.

Note: SMB access to folder, twain_32(windows\twain_32) can also be used for legitimate purpose. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an infection.

name: Identified Missing Principal Service Name In Multi-realm Kerberos Request
description:
This DPI rule is intended to block Kerberos AS-REQ requests with missing service principal name (sname). Such requests can lead to NULL-pointer de-reference in a multi-realm Kerberos implementation. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

Note: It is suggested to apply this rule when sname is configured as the rule will block Kerberos AS-REQ requests with missing sname.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0271) - 2
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: NTP Server Unrestricted Query Reflected Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Unrestricted access to the monlist feature in ntp_request.c in ntpd allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (traffic amplification) via forged (1) REQ_MON_GETLIST or (2) REQ_MON_GETLIST_1 requests.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0286)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Firefox nsSVGValue Out Of Bound Access Vulnerability
description: The SVG implementation in Mozilla Firefox does not properly interact with DOMAttrModified event handlers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory access) or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors involving removal of SVG elements.

name: VLC Media Player RTSP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A stack based buffer overflow exists in VideoLAN VLC Media Player when handling RTSP requests and responses. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to connect to a malicious RTSP media stream or by opening a malicious playlist file. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5330)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0283)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Excel Malformed FNGROUPCOUNT Value Vulnerability (CVE-2006-1308)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Excel allows user assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a .xls file with a crafted FNGROUPCOUNT value. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0498)
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. Successful exploitation could result in execution of arbitrary code within the security context of the currently logged on user.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0493)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or to crash the application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Out Of Bound Read Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0499)
description: Out of bound read in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. Successful exploitation could result in denial of service within the security context of the currently logged on user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0275)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft XML Core Services Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0266)
description: An information-disclosure vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker to read files on the local file system of a user or read content of web domains where a user is currently authenticated to when the user views specially crafted web content that is designed to invoke MSXML through Internet Explorer.

name: HP Intelligent Management Center SOM euAccountService Servlet Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: HP IMC Service Operation Management Software is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions on the affected computer. This may aid in further attacks.

name: OpenX Backdoor PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
description: OpenX is prone to a backdoor vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Successful attacks will compromise the affected application.

name: IBM Platform Symphony SOAP Request Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Platform Symphony, which allows remote attacker to cause a denial of service via a malformed SOAP request with a large amount of request data.

name: Identified Suspicious Image Files Over HTTP
description: This DPI rule detects malicious BMP and GIF files. Such files can exploit a weakness in image parsing libraries to execute attack on victim's browser.

name: Oracle Endeca Server createDataStore SOAP Request Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Endeca Server component in Oracle Fusion Middleware allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3897)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when it improperly accesses an object in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Google Chrome PPAPI URLLoader Use-after-free Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the Google Chrome allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors involving a resource-destruction message.

name: Identified Remote File Inclusion (RFI) Over HTTP
description:
This DPI rule detects Remote File Inclusion (RFI) in HTTP traffic via request parameters, query string and headers. Remote File Include is an attack technique used to exploit "dynamic file include" mechanisms in web applications. When web applications take user input (URL, parameter value, etc.) and pass them into file include commands, the web application might be tricked into including remote files with malicious code. However, some web applications may still want to accept user supplied input from remote servers.

Note: Administrators are suggested to add trusted domain/IP in the configuration page. The rule will allow all remote file inclusions unless configured.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0324)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Solaris in.telnetd TTYPROMPT Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

name: Adobe Flash Player Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5332)
description: Adobe Flash Player on Windows and Linux allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition (CMCNE), which could allow remote attacker to read files on the local file system or include and execute arbitrary local files.

name: Adobe Flash Player Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0504)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player that could allow an attacker to read the contents of the system via unspecified vector.

name: Adobe U3D CLODProgressiveMeshDeclaration Array Overrun Vulnerability
description: The U3D implementation in Adobe Reader and Acrobat allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via malformed U3D data in a PDF document, related to a CLODProgressiveMeshDeclaration "array boundary issue".

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0313)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Detected Too Many SNMP GETBULK Requests
description:
This DPI rule detects SNMP getbulk requests. Such requests in large number could be used to launch reflected amplification DDoS attack with the spoofed IP address of the victim.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the frequency of SNMP GETBULK requests. It's suggested to update the configuration according to SNMP usage and bandwidth.

description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Detected FTP Server Traffic.
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect FTP server traffic. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Adobe Flash Player Cross Domain Policy Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0503)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a cross-domain security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass the same-origin policy and execute other attacks.

name: ProFTPD Backdoor Unauthorized Access Vulnerability

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat U3D File Invalid Array Index Remote Vulnerability

description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the computer. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0303)

description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0274)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Malicious Image File
description: This DPI rule is intended to block known malicious image files which are used in attacks in the wild.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0307)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists in EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition (CMCNE), which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code by using a servlet to upload an executable file.

name: OpenLDAP slapd RWM Overlay Use-After-Free Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The rwm overlay in OpenLDAP does not properly count references, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (slapd crash) by unbinding immediately after a search request, which triggers rwm_conn_destroy to free the session context while it is being used by rwm_op_search.

name: PHP "imagecrop()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: PHP is prone to remote heap based buffer overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds check user supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: SAP NetWeaver Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: SAP NetWeaver could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the SAP Host Control Service. By sending a specially crafted SOAP request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain internal operating system information.

name: Microsoft Windows OLE Object File Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3400)
description: Microsoft Windows does not properly handle OLE objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted object in a file, aka "OLE Property Vulnerability."

name: Microsoft DirectShow Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0301) - 1
description: Double free vulnerability in qedit.dll in DirectShow in Microsoft Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted JPEG image.

name: Oracle Java Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5907)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE and OpenJDK allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: Allow Incoming Oracle Database Connections
description:
This dummy rule is intended to assign Application Type, 'Database Oracle' which will in-turn help in handling dynamic ports in Firewall.

Dynamic port functionality has been removed from the Firewall in DS 9.0. Hence incoming Oracle Database connection does not work on Oracle Database server that's protected by DSVA/DSA. Application Type port mapper which decodes dynamic ports can be used to enable dynamic ports in Firewall with Stateful Inspection configuration.

name: Allow Outgoing Oracle Database Connections
description:
This dummy rule is intended to assign Application Type, 'Oracle Database Client' which will in-turn help in handling dynamic ports in Firewall.

Dynamic port functionality has been removed from the Firewall in DS 9.0. Hence incoming Oracle Database connection does not work on Oracle Database server that's protected by DSVA/DSA. Application Type port mapper which decodes dynamic ports can be used to enable dynamic ports in Firewall with Stateful Inspection configuration.

name: Restrict Download Of Mozilla Firefox Bootstrapped Add-on Over HTTP
description: This is a heuristic based rule to restrict the download of bootstrapped add-on. An unsuspecting user can be tricked into installing such add-ons via social engineering techniques. Successful execution of malicious bootstrapped extension, can give complete control of the victim's machine to the attacker.

description: Firefox allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (access violation and crash), and possibly execute arbitrary code, by calling InstallVersion.compareTo with an object instead of a string.

The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of the parameters passed to function toQTPointer. The flaw can be leveraged remotely to execute arbitrary code under the context of the currently logged in user.

name: IBM Rational Focal Point Web Service Axis Gateway Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Webservice Axis Gateway in IBM Rational Focal Point allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions and obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

name: Identified Too Many Pingback Initiated Requests
description:
WordPress has an XMLRPC API, which exposes "pingback.ping" method. This method could be exploited by an attacker to cause DoS or DDoS attack on other websites. This is a heuristic based rule to detect such Pingback initiated requests.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the alert frequency for Pingback initiated requests.

name: Nagios "process_cgivars()" Off-By-One Vulnerability
description: Nagios is prone to an off-by-one error within the "process_cgivars()" function, which can be exploited by a remote attacker to cause an out of bounds read memory access by sending a specially crafted request.

name: Squid Proxy NTLM Authentication Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Squid Web Proxy Cache is reportedly affected by a buffer-overflow vulnerability when processing NTLM authentication credentials. This would allow an attacker to cause a denial-of-service condition and execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable web proxy.

name: Oracle MySQL Client Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Oracle MySQL client is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability when processing received server information. Successful exploitation may allow execution of arbitrary code by tricking a user into connecting to a malicious server.

name: Samba 'nttrans' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in samba allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via an encrypted password that causes the overflow during decryption in which a DOS code page string is converted to a little-endian UCS2 unicode string.

name: Identified Malicious C&C Server SSL Certificate
description: This is a heuristic based DPI rule to detect Indicators of Compromise related to a vulnerability in MS Word (CVE-2014-1761) which is getting exploited in the wild. It detects a static self-signed certificate used by the backdoor on the compromised machine to communicate with the remote C&C server.

name: Disallowed Resources
description:
This DPI rule restricts access to specific web server resource types. Exceptions can also be specified for certain resources.

Note: Configuration options are provided to enter disallowed resource types and allowed resources.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0305)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Suspicious Microsoft Office Binary File With Embedded VBA
description:
Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) enables building user-defined functions, automating processes, accessing Windows API and other low-level functionality. VBA is built into Microsoft Office applications. It can be programmed to run embedded/existing executable on victim's machine which can cause security implications. This DPI rule detects such suspicious Microsoft Office documents with embedded VBA.

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Mozilla Firefox Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Allow Specified HTTP Request Exceptions
description:
This rule will prevent the URI normalization of HTTP requests for resources that are specified on the Configuration tab. This can be used for non-standard HTTP requests that are dropped by URI normalization.

Note that only the request line will not be normalized, the POST body will continue to be processed as specified in the HTTP Protocol Decoding Filter.

description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web page that triggers access to a deleted object.

description:
WordPress has an XMLRPC API, which exposes "pingback.ping" method. This method could be exploited by an attacker to cause DoS or DDoS attack on other site. This is a heuristic based rule to detect such HTTP POST requests.

name: Restrict OpenSSL TLS/DTLS Heartbeat Request

Note: Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events.

name: Restrict Apache Struts ClassLoader Manipulation Via HTTP Cookie Header
description:
The CookieInterceptor in Apache Struts allows remote attackers to manipulate the ClassLoader via the class parameter. This DPI rule is intended to prevent requests to the ClassLoader via the class parameter in HTTP cookie.

Note: By nature of this vulnerability, it is difficult to distinguish between malicious and benign traffic. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack.

name: Restrict Apache Struts 'class.classLoader' Request
description:
The ParametersInterceptor in Apache Struts allows remote attackers to manipulate the ClassLoader via the class parameter, which is passed to the getClass method. This DPI rule is intended to prevent requests to the ClassLoader via the class parameter.

Note: By nature of this vulnerability, it is difficult to distinguish between malicious and benign traffic. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack.

name: Microsoft Windows Kernel Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5065)

An attacker who successfully exploits this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the kernel mode. This vulnerability is used in conjunction with Adobe Acrobat And Reader ToolButton Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3346) to gain higher privileges.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer SMIL File Remote Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a remote stack based buffer overflow vulnerability. The issue exists due to lack of boundary checks performed by the application when parsing Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language (SMIL) files. A remote attacker may execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer to gain unauthorized access.

name: Apple iTunes Playlist Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Apple iTunes is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. This issue is exposed when the application parses 'm3u' and 'pls' playlist files. If the vulnerability is successfully exploited, it will result in execution of arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability ( CVE-2014-0524)

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0529)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Java Applet Field Bytecode Verifier Cache Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Hotspot.

name: CUPS "kerberos" Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been reported in CUPS, which can be exploited by malicious people to conduct cross-site scripting attacks. Input passed via the "kerberos" parameter to /admin/ is not properly sanitised before being returned to the user. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a user's browser session in context of an affected site.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5331)
description: Adobe Flash Player on Windows and Linux allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted content that leverages an unspecified "type confusion", as exploited in the wild.

Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, obtain sensitive information, or execute local programs in the context of the browser.

description:

description:
An HTTPS stream could allow a remote attacker to obtain plaintext secrets from the ciphertext by observing multiple compressed HTTPS responses. This is a heuristic based rule to detect too many suspicious HTTPS requests within a period of time.
