description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: WS_FTP Server Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability exists in the way WS_FTP server parses FTP commands. Specially crafted arguments to certain FTP commands can trigger a buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code with system level privileges.

name: Oracle Java Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
description: Oracle Java suffers from multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities that exist within few of the native functions. These vulnerabilities allows remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Oracle Java.

name: OpenSSL "do_ssl3_write()" NULL Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to Null pointer dereference vulnerability because it fails to properly manage a buffer pointer during certain recursive calls, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.

name: Veritas Backup Exec Remote Agent Authentication Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Veritas Backup Exec Remote Agent for Windows Servers is prone to a remotely exploitable buffer-overflow vulnerability. This issue occurs when handling authentication requests. Successful exploits could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.

name: Vsftpd Backdoor Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Vsftpd is prone to a backdoor vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the application. Successful attacks will compromise the affected application.

name: Microsoft Excel Malformed Column Record Vulnerability (CVE-2007-0030)
description: Microsoft Excel allows user assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed string. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0536)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Apache Tomcat Chunked Transfer Encoding Data Saturation Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause denial of service conditions.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Discovery Service SERVICEPC Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote buffer overflow vulnerability reportedly affects CA BrightStor ARCserve. This issue is due to a failure of the application to securely copy data from the network. A remote attacker may execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer, potentially facilitating unauthorized superuser access.

name: Win32k TrueType Font Parsing Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0159)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected components handle a specially crafted TrueType font file. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted TrueType font file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2801)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: ISC BIND Client Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: libdns in ISC BIND client does not properly handle EDNS options, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (REQUIRE assertion failure and daemon exit) via a crafted packet.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2797)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Winamp Ultravox Streaming Metadata Parsing Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Winamp is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly bound-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the vulnerable application.

name: phpScheduleIt 'reserve.php' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: PhpScheduleIt is prone to a vulnerability that lets remote attackers execute arbitrary code because the application fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code on an affected computer with the privileges of the webserver process.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2795)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: phpMyAdmin 'server_databases.php' Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: phpMyAdmin allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a request to server_databases.php with a sort_by parameter containing PHP sequences, which are processed by create_function.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Universal Agent Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote buffer-overflow vulnerability affects BrightStor ARCserve because the application fails to securely copy data from the network. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer, potentially facilitating unauthorized superuser access.

name: Apache Struts SessionAware/RequestAware Request Parsing Session Map Manipulation
description: A weakness has been reported in Apache Struts, which can be exploited by malicious attacker to bypass certain security restrictions. The weakness is caused due to the SessionAware or RequestAware interfaces not blocking access to the session map, which can be exploited to change the session map by sending specially crafted requests.

name: MailEnable IMAP Service Login Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The vulnerability is due to an unspecified boundary error in the handling of IMAP commands. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via specially crafted data with unspecified IMAP commands. Successful exploitation would allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with "System" privileges of the server process.

name: Darwin Streaming Server Command Execution Vulnerability
description: A command execution vulnerability has been discovered in the Darwin Streaming Servers. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient sanitization performed on some user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by submitting a specially crafted string to the parse_xml.cgi application that include malicious shell commands.

name: HP OpenView Performance Insight Server Backdoor Account Code Execution
description: HP OpenView Performance Insight Server contains a "hidden account" in the com.trinagy.security.XMLUserManager Java class, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the doPost method in the com.trinagy.servlet.HelpManagerServlet class.

name: Windows RSH Daemon Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Windows RSH Daemon (rshd) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted TCP request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.

name: PostgreSQL Database Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0063)
description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in PostgreSQL allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (file corruption) via a crafted command request.

name: Microsoft Windows iSCSI Target Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0255)
description: Microsoft Windows allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (iSCSI service outage) by sending many crafted packets.

name: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_ajp Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The mod_proxy_ajp module in the Apache HTTP Server when used with mod_proxy_balancer in certain configurations, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a malformed HTTP request.

name: GnuTLS "read_server_hello()" Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: GnuTLS is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2787)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Mozilla Firefox "BumpChunk" Object Processing Use-After-Free Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the TypeObject class in the JavaScript engine in Mozilla Firefox, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by triggering extensive memory consumption while garbage collection is occurring by improper handling of BumpChunk objects.

name: Identified Samba DNS Packet Header "reply" Flag Denial Of Service
description:
The internal DNS server in Samba does not check the QR field in the header section of an incoming DNS message before sending a response, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and bandwidth consumption) via a forged response packet that triggers a communication loop. This is a heuristic based rule to detect too many DNS response messages within a period of time.

Note: Triggers from this DPI rule should be investigated further to confirm attacks. Configuration options are provided to customize the event frequency.

name: IBM SPSS SamplePower 'vsflex8l' ActiveX Control ComboList Property Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM SPSS SamplePower. The vulnerability is due to a lack of boundary checking on the user-supplied ComboList or ColComboList property value in the Vsflex8I ActiveX control. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a malicious website. Successful exploitation could allow arbitrary code execution in the context of the target user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2551)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. These vulnerabilities may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0456)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0528)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial of service conditions.

name: Apple QuickTime Movie File Ftab Atom Handling Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user. Failed exploit attempts will cause denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2804)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1775)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Discovery Service ASBRDCST.DLL Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in CA BrightStor ARCserve which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted data to ASBRDCST.DLL in the Discovery Service (casdscsvc.exe).

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Message Engine Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Message Engine component shipped with CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Server. The vulnerability is due to improper data verification in the handling of RPC requests. An unauthenticated remote attacker may use this flaw to inject and execute code on the vulnerable system with system level privileges.

name: HP Data Protector EXEC_BAR Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Storage Data Protector allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via unknown vectors.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0532)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Exchange Heap Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2003-0714)
description: The Internet Mail Service in Exchange Server 5.5 and Exchange 2000 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion) by directly connecting to the SMTP service and sending a certain extended verb request, possibly triggering a buffer overflow in Exchange 2000.

name: GnuTLS V1 Intermediate Certificates Verification Security Issue (CVE-2014-1959)
description: GnuTLS treats version 1 X.509 certificates as intermediate CAs, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended restrictions by leveraging a X.509 V1 certificate from a trusted CA to issue new certificates.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0282)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: OpenSSL 'ssl_get_algorithm2()' Function Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The ssl_get_algorithm2 function in OpenSSL obtains a certain version number from an incorrect data structure, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted traffic.

name: Wordpress TimThumb WebShot Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: TimThumb WebShot for WordPress is prone to a remote PHP code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code within the context of the web server.

name: Identified Microsoft BAT And CMD Files Over WebDAV
description: This is a heuristic based rule to detect .bat and .cmd files being accessed over WebDAV. A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows processes .bat and .cmd files that are run from an external network. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1765)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Suspicious Image With Embedded PHP Code
description: This rule is a heuristic based rule to detect malicious php code embedded within gif, jpg and png image files. An attacker may use maliciously crafted image file to do remote code execution and take control of the victim's host machine.

name: Oracle Java Runtime Environment Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-1493)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application.

name: GnuTLS Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: GnuTLS does not properly handle unspecified errors when verifying certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via a crafted certificate.

name: Vulnerability In Internet Explorer Could Allow Remote Code Execution (CVE-2010-3962)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a memory corruption in the way the browsers handle tables. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the current user. Unsuccessful exploitation can cause IE to crash.

name: Oracle Java SE And Java For Business Unspecified Vulnerabilities
description: Oracle Java SE and Java for Business are prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. Successful attacks may allow attackers to gain unauthorized access to a computer in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Opera 'opera:config' Script Access Configuration Overwrite
description: Opera contains a flaw that may allow an attacker to modify the browser configuration. The issue is triggered by unrestricted script access to the opera:config page.

name: Identified Suspicious Usage Of Shellcode For Mozilla Firefox
description: Shellcode is a piece of machine code used as the payload in the exploitation of a software vulnerability. This rule will identify common shellcode exploits and some zero day attacks in web client traffic.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0523)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2799)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0522)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2006-1359)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via a dereference of an invalid table pointer which allows the program flow to be redirected to the heap.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2006-1359) - 1
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via a dereference of an invalid table pointer which allows the program flow to be redirected to the heap.

name: Mozilla Firefox Javascript Navigator Object Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by changing certain properties of the window navigator object that are accessed when Java starts up, which causes a crash that leads to code execution.

name: OpenSSL TLS Handshake Null Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The ssl3_take_mac function in OpenSSL allows remote TLS servers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted Next Protocol Negotiation record in a TLS handshake.

name: Internet Explorer Layout Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1260)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Identified Suspicious Microsoft Office Document - 1
description:
This is a heuristic based rule which detects suspicious contents in Microsoft Spreadsheets, Word and PowerPoint Documents.

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4216)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4262)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player '.wav' File Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows Media Player is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of the issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible.

name: VLC Media Player WriteAV Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: VLC Media Player contains a flaw in ibmpgatofixed32_plugin.dll that is triggered as user-supplied input is not properly sanitized when handling a specially crafted AVS file. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to corrupt memory and cause a denial of service or potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2823)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4057)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Veritas Backup Exec Registration Request Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: VERITAS Backup Exec is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Agent Browser service when handling incoming registration requests. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.

name: EMC AlphaStor Server Agent Application Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: EMC AlphaStor Server Agent is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data before copying it to insufficiently sized buffers. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges and failed attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Storage Data Protector allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via unknown vectors.

name: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management PreBoot Service Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the PreBoot service in Novell ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM), allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files in a preboot update pathname.

name: Nagios Remote Plugin Executor Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Nagios Remote Plugin Executor is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context to the affected application.

name: PHP "gdImageCreateFromXpm()" NULL Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
description: The gdImageCreateFromXpm function in PHP libgd library allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted color table in an XPM file.

name: PHP CDF File Parsing Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: PHP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to hang, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Works WkImgSrv.dll ActiveX DoS
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Works. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing target users to visit a malicious web page. Successful exploitation would cause the service to crash and would render it unusable.

name: ISC BIND Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: libdns in ISC BIND does not properly handle EDNS options, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (REQUIRE assertion failure and daemon exit) via a crafted packet.

name: Apple iTunes Protocol Handler Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Apple iTunes is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks before copying user-supplied data to an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Wu-Ftpd Format String Stack Overwrite Vulnerability
description: The lreply function in wu-ftpd does not properly cleanse an untrusted format string, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

name: Adobe Multiple Products PDF JavaScript Method Buffer Overflow - 1
description: Multiple buffer overflows in Adobe Reader and Acrobat 8.1.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF file with long arguments to unspecified JavaScript methods.

name: SAP Business One License Manager Remote Buffer Overflow
description: SAP Business One License Manager is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability allowing unauthenticated attackers to gain complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0540)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0544)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2820)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Google Chrome Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-6632)
description: Integer overflow in Google Chrome allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4050)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Yahoo! Messenger YVerInfo.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: Yahoo! Messenger is prone to multiple buffer-overflow weaknesses because it fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into insufficiently sized buffers. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2824)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Samba Symlink Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: Samba is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploits would allow an attacker to access files outside of the Samba user's root directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. To exploit this issue, attackers require authenticated access to a writable share.

name: OpenSSL Anonymous ECDH Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Invalid Pointer Reference Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer. The vulnerability exists due to an invalid pointer reference being used within Internet Explorer. It is possible under certain conditions for the invalid pointer to be accessed after an object is deleted. In a specially-crafted attack, in attempting to access a freed object, Internet Explorer can be caused to allow remote code execution.

name: MoBB #18: WebViewFolderIcon setSlice
description: Microsoft WebViewFolderIcon ActiveX control is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary machine code in the context of the affected application, facilitating the remote compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may likely result in browser crashes.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Remote Code Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF file with crafted Flash content involving the (1) pushstring (0x2C) operator, (2) debugfile (0xF1) operator, and an "invalid pointer vulnerability" that triggers memory corruption.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0543)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0545)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer XMLHTTP ActiveX Control setRequestHeader Code Execution
description: There exists a vulnerability in the XMLHTTP 4.0 ActiveX Control of Microsoft XML Core Services. The flaw is due to improper handling of user supplied data in the setRequestHeader method of the ActiveX control. By persuading a target user to visit a malicious web site, an attacker may possibly execute arbitrary code on the client side with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

name: SAP GUI EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX control (webviewer3d.dll) in SAP AG SAPgui allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the SaveViewToSessionFile method.

name: Cumulative Security Updates Of ActiveX Kill Bits - July 2009
description: This rule prevents the instantiation of the ActiveX controls mentioned in the security advisory of Microsoft in July 2009.

name: Apache HTTP Server Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0117)
description:
Apache HTTP Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to cause an affected application to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

Note: Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this rule.

name: Google Chrome Blink "locationAttributeSetter" Use After Free Vulnerability
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the AttributeSetter function in bindings/templates/attributes.cpp in the bindings in blink, as used in Google Chrome allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors involving the document.location value.

name: EnjoySAP SAP GUI ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Download Vulnerability
description: Insecure method vulnerability in the KWEdit ActiveX control in SAP GUI allows remote attackers to overwrite arbitrary files.

name: Samba LSA RPC lsa_io_trans_names Request Handling Heap Overflow
description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Samba handles RPC messages. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while performing specific RPC operations. Remote authenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted RPC request to the LSA RPC interface. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected process.

name: Core FTP LE Response Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Core FTP LE is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. This allows remote FTP servers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a long string in a reply to a command.

name: Disallow Web Resources
description:
This DPI rule is intended to restrict access to a given web directory or web resource over HTTP.

Note: Administrators are suggested to add web resources/directory in the configuration page. The rule will allow all resources unless configured.

name: Detected Too Many ANY Query Type Requests
description:
A Domain Name Server (DNS) Amplification attack consists of an attacker sending a DNS name lookup request to a DNS server with the source address spoofed to be the target's address. The spoofed queries sent by the attacker are of the type ANY which return all known information about a DNS zone resulting considerably large response. This DPI rule is intended to detect such DNS requests.

Note: Configuration options are provided to customize the number of DNS requests to be monitored and the duration.

name: Libpng 'png_push_read_chunk' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Libpng is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to enter an infinite loop which may cause denial-of-service.

name: Google Chrome Cross Site Scripting Filter Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: Google Chrome is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass the cross-site scripting filter. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary script code and steal cookie-based authentication credentials.

name: Internet Explorer Same ID Property Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1875)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Mozilla Firefox Chrome Object Wrapper Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: The Chrome Object Wrapper (COW) implementation in Mozilla Firefox does not prevent modifications to the prototype of an object, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privileges by referencing Object.prototype.__proto__ in a crafted HTML document.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Code Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment component in Oracle Java allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability, related to JAX-WS.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1815)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: OpenSSL DTLS Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2014-3507)
description:
OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to cause a memory leak, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the alert frequency for zero length DTLS fragments.

name: IBM Lotus Domino 'names.nsf' Password Disclosure Vulnerability
description: IBM Lotus Domino is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information from the directory database, names.nsf, which is readable by default.

name: PHP Fileinfo Component Out Of Bounds Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: PHP is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service conditions in the context of an application using the vulnerable extension.

name: PHP sapi_header_op HTTP Header Injection Vulnerability
description: The sapi_header_op function in main/SAPI.c in PHP does not check for %0D sequences (aka carriage return characters), which allows remote attackers to bypass an HTTP response-splitting protection mechanism via a crafted URL, related to improper interaction between the PHP header function and certain browsers, as demonstrated by Internet Explorer and Google Chrome.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4082)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web page that triggers access to a deleted object.

name: Microsoft Graphics Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3906)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability that exists in the way affected components handle specially crafted TIFF images. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by convincing a user to open a specially crafted file, or browse specially crafted web content.

name: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerabilities exist in Adobe Flash Player that could allow an attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0541)
description: Adobe Flash Player does not properly restrict the SWF file format, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4089)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4092)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4094)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Kodak Image Viewer Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Windows Kodak Image Viewer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary machine code in the context of a user running the application. Successful exploits will compromise the user's account and possibly the underlying computer. Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Java Runtime Environment Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3545)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: RealPlayer '.3gp' File Processing Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-3444)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer. The vulnerability is caused by memory corruption while parsing 3gp video files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted .3gp file, with the affected application. Successful exploitation can result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use After Free Vulnerability
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Samba DCE/RPC IDL Compiler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1182)
description: Samba is prone to a remote-code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server Describe Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow has been reported in the Helix Universal Server. Due to insufficient bounds checking on the 'describe' field of a RTSP request, it is possible for a user to exploit a boundary condition error. This could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the Helix Universal Server process.

name: Google Chrome Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-3168)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Google Chrome accesses an object in memory that has been deleted. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Mozilla Firefox 3.5 Remote Buffer Overflow
description:
Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.An
attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

name: cURL/libcURL Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: cURL/libcURL is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

name: Oracle Database Server XML Parser HTTP Create Session Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3751)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the XML Parser component in Oracle Database Server allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Adobe TIFF File Vulnerability - 2
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader allows remote attackers to cause a buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a malformed PDF document.

name: Adobe Reader Unspecified Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0512)
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Reader allows remote attackers to bypass a PDF sandbox protection mechanism via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0565)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Squid "strHdrAcptLangGetItem()" Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Squid contains a flaw in the strHdrAcptLangGetItem() function in errorpage.cc that may allow a remote denial of service. The issue is triggered when handling a malformed Accept-Language header. This may allow a remote attacker to crash the program.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0567)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector contains a flaw in the Backup Client Service (OmniInet.exe), as it does not properly sanitize user input, specifically path traversal style attacks supplied via Opcode 42 requests. With a specially crafted request, a remote attacker can write files outside of a restricted path to execute arbitrary code.

name: LANDesk Management Suite Alert Service Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Alert Service (aolnsrvr.exe) in LANDesk Management Suite allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer RealPlayer rmoc3260.dll ActiveX Control Memory Corruption
description: The vulnerability is caused due to an error within the RealPlayer ActiveX Control (rmoc3260.dll) when handling the "Console" property. This can be exploited to cause a memory corruption and execute arbitrary code when a user is tricked into visiting a malicious website.

name: Apache Chunked-Encoding Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Apache allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a chunk-encoded HTTP request that causes Apache to use an incorrect size.

name: Identified Wordpress Mailpoet Newsletter Plugin Malicious File Upload
description: This DPI rule detects the upload of malicious file to wordpress mailpoet newsletter plugin. The mailPoet newsletter plugin for wordpress is prone to a remote file-upload vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files and arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Apple QuickTime "mvhd" Atom Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4979)
description: Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a malformed version number and flags in an mvhd atom.

name: Pointer Reference Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Internet Explorer, which can be exploited by an attacker to compromise a user's system. The vulnerability is caused due to an error while processing XML tags and can be exploited to de-reference freed memory via a specially crafted HTML document.

name: Adobe Flash Player Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0559)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Google Chrome Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1705)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Google Chrome. The vulnerability is due to an error while processing JavaScript code by the V8 JavaScript Engine. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a malicious web page. Successful exploitation could permit an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the Google Chrome sandbox.

name: Mozilla Firefox MessagePort Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1548)
description: A use after free vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox due to a memory corruption issue when handling SharedWorker objects. Successful exploitation could lead to remote code execution under the security context of the browser process.

name: Identified Download Of A Webpage With Data URI Scheme
description:
This DPI rule is intended to detect download of a webpage with "data" URI scheme used in an unusual way. "data" URI scheme is used to allow inclusion of small data items as "immediate/in-line" in web pages. Attackers may use this type of URI scheme to embed malicious content like cross-site scripting payload, malicious media content, etc. An attack gets executed when the browser interprets the malicious content.

Note: Webpage with "data" URI scheme is also used for legitimate purpose. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack. Configuration options are provided to block different Data URI supported HTML tags.

name: GNU Bash Remote Code Execution Vulnerability Over SIP
description: GNU Bash is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when it incorrectly processes trailing strings after certain malformed function definitions in the values of environment variables, which allows remote attackers to write to files or possibly have unknown other impact via a crafted SIP request.

name: Internet Explorer Col Element Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-1876)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer accesses an object that does not exist. The vulnerability may corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player MIDI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0003)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Media Player. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted MIDI file that could allow remote code execution when played using Windows Media Player.

name: Microsoft Windows Application Installer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by tricking an unsuspecting victim into viewing a malformed file. Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the privileges of the user running the affected application.

description: GNU Bash is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when it incorrectly processes trailing strings after certain malformed function definitions in the values of environment variables, which allows remote attackers to write to files or possibly have unknown other impact via a crafted DHCP response from a malicious DHCP server.

name: GNU Bash Remote Code Execution Vulnerability Over SMTP
description: GNU Bash is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when it incorrectly processes trailing strings after certain malformed function definitions in the values of environment variables, which allows remote attackers to write to files or possibly have unknown other impact via a crafted SMTP request.

name: Identified Suspicious Bash ShellShock Attack
description:
Bash is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when it incorrectly processes trailing strings after certain malformed function definitions in the values of environment variables, which allows remote attackers to write to files or possibly have unknown other impact via a crafted request. This is a heuristic based rule to detect such attacks.

Note: In some network environment this rule could generate many alerts, hence every trigger should be investigated further to confirm the attack.

name: Samba nbmd "unstrcpy()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Samba is prone to a remote-code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0555)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: HP Data Protector Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP Data Protector, in a way that a remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted request to the vulnerable service. Successful exploitation could cause a stack buffer overflow resulting in code execution in the context of the affected service.

name: Novell NetMail IMAPD Subscribe Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the IMAP daemon (IMAPD) in Novell NetMail allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a long crafted request. Successful exploitation would allow arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the server process.

name: OpenSSL SRP Buffer Overrun Vulnerability (CVE-2014-3512)
description: OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to overrun an internal buffer, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Discovery Service Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Discovery Service for CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long packet to UDP port, which is not properly handled in a recvfrom call.

name: Oracle HTTP Server SSLv2 Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Mozilla Network Security Services used in HTTPS OSSL module of Oracle HTTP server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via invalid "Client Master Key" length values.

name: Trend Micro ServerProtect SPNT And EarthAgent Multiple Stack Overflow
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in Trend Micro ServerProtect allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted data which triggers an overflow in the SPNT and EarthAgent modules.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup For Laptops And Desktops LGServer Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the server component of CA (Computer Associates) BrightStor ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown attack vectors.

name: MSCOMCTL.OCX RCE Vulnerability For Office Binary File
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows common controls. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution.

name: MailEnable HTTP Authorization Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way MailEnable processes the HTTPMail protocol. This issue is caused by insufficient boundary checking while copying data into a fixed size buffer. This vulnerability can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system with privileges of the HTTPMail service process.

name: Squid 'snmpHandleUdp()' Function Off-By-One Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6270)
description: Heap based buffer overflow in the snmpHandleUdp function of Squid, due to  Off-by-one error, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted UDP SNMP request.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0564)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Mozilla Firefox DOMSVGLength Reflected Attribute Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1563)
description: A use after free vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox due to the deletion of a DOMSVGLength object followed by a subsequent attempt to access it. Successful exploitation could lead to remote code execution under the security context of the browser process.

name: Identified CBC Based Cipher Suite In TLS Request
description:
This DPI rule detects the usage of CBC Based cipher suites in TLSv1.0 traffic. The CBC Based cipher suites use symmetric encryption algorithm in vulnerable TLS protocol to encrypt data with chained initialization vectors, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain plain-text HTTP headers via a block-wise chosen-boundary attack on an HTTPS session aka a "BEAST" attack.

Note: CBC Based cipher suites in SSL/TLS protocol are also used for legitimate purpose due to server limitations. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack. Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events.

name: Identified CBC Based Cipher Suite In TLS Response
description:
This DPI rule detects the usage of CBC Based cipher suites in TLSv1.0 traffic. The CBC Based cipher suites use symmetric encryption algorithm in vulnerable TLS protocol to encrypt data with chained initialization vectors, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain plain-text HTTP headers via a block-wise chosen-boundary attack on an HTTPS session.

Note: CBC Based cipher suites in SSL/TLS protocol are also used for legitimate purpose due to server limitations. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack. Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events.

name: Mozilla Firefox Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information from process memory via crafted web script that interacts with a CANVAS element associated with a malformed GIF image.

name: HP OpenView Omniback II Command Execution
description:
OpenView Omniback II is reported prone to an unspecified remote command execution vulnerability. This issue can allow a remote attacker to gain superuser privileges on a vulnerable computer.
All versions of OpenView Omniback II are considered vulnerable to this issue.

name: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Apache Connector Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache, Sun and IIS web servers component in BEA Product Suite allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Unspecified Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2013-2729)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified remote integer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attack may cause a denial of service condition.

name: DTLS Invalid Fragment Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0195)
description: OpenSSL is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the vulnerable library.

name: DTLS Invalid Fragment Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0195) - 1
description: OpenSSL is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the vulnerable library.

name: Restrict Access Of HTML Tags Over HTTP
description:
Many Web servers such as iPlanet, include HTML tags. These HTML tags allow a remote attacker to view the contents of the directories on the web server. This rule detects HTTP request containing HTML tags such as wp-cs-dump, wp-html-rend etc. as HTTP query parameter.

Note: Configuration options are provided to configure HTML Tags.

name: Winamp Malformed Playlist File Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Winamp is susceptible to a buffer-overflow vulnerability when handling specially crafted playlist files. An attacker may exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to a computer with the privileges of the logged on user.

name: Squid HTTP Range Request Handling Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Squid is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial of service conditions.

name: Detected Fragmented DTLS Message
description:
DTLS attempts to avoid IP fragmentation. But many SSL related messages contain data (for example certificates) that exceed common network MTUs. As a result, DTLS fragments the messages. This DPI rule detects such fragmented DTLS packets.

Note: Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this rule.

name: Detected Fragmented DTLS Request
description:
DTLS attempts to avoid IP fragmentation. But many SSL related messages contain data (for example certificates) that exceed common network MTUs. As a result, DTLS fragments the messages. This DPI rule detects such fragmented DTLS packets.

Note: Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this rule.

name: OpenSSL TLS Handshake Null Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability - 1
description: The ssl3_take_mac function in OpenSSL allows remote TLS servers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted Next Protocol Negotiation record in a TLS handshake.

name: Identified Kerberos GSSAPI Invalid Token Injection
description: This DPI rule detects the Kerberos invalid token injection. MIT Kerberos allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service due to buffer over-read or NULL pointer dereference by injecting invalid tokens into a GSSAPI application session.

name: Microsoft SSL PCT Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: The Private Communications Transport (PCT) protocol, a part of the Microsoft Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) library, contains a buffer overflow in the processing of certain messages. It is possible for a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a local system user when SSL is enabled.

name: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Cell Request Service Portmapper
description: Portmapper for HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Cell Request Service. Listens on port 5555 by default.

name: Microsoft Word And Office Web Apps Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4117)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in way that Microsoft Office software parses certain properties of Microsoft Word files. If an attacker is successful in exploiting this vulnerability, and if the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, the attacker could take complete control of the affected system.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework ASP.NET Forms Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2011-3416)
description: The Forms Authentication feature in the ASP.NET subsystem in Microsoft .NET Framework allows remote authenticated users to obtain access to arbitrary user accounts via a crafted username, aka "ASP.Net Forms Authentication Bypass Vulnerability."
