name: Identified Unvalidated Redirect And Forward Over HTTP
description:
This DPI rule detects Unvalidated redirect and forward in HTTP traffic via request parameters, query string and headers. Unvalidated redirects and forwards are possible when a web application accepts untrusted input that could cause the web application to redirect the request to a URL contained within untrusted input. By modifying unvalidated URL input to a malicious site, an attacker may successfully launch multiple social engineering attacks.

Note: Administrators are suggested to add trusted domain/IP in the configuration page. The rule will allow all redirects and forwards unless configured.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0557)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: OpenSSL DTLS Packets Double Free Vulnerability
description: Double free vulnerability in the DTLS implementation in OpenSSL allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via crafted DTLS packets that trigger an error condition.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4121)
description: Microsoft .NET Framework does not properly parse internationalized resource identifiers, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted request to a .NET web application.

name: HP Data Protector EXEC_INTEGUTIL Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description: HP Data Protector is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the SYSTEM user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: OpenSSL DTLS Memory Exhaustion Vulnerability
description:
DTLS implementation in OpenSSL allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via crafted DTLS handshake messages that trigger memory allocations corresponding to large length values.

Note: Configuration options are provided to configure the value of certificate chain size.

name: HP OpenView OVTrace Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the Shared Trace Service (OVTrace) for HP OpenView Operations for Windows, and possibly earlier versions, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via certain crafted requests.

name: Adobe Flash Player Type Confusion Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0577)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0588)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0581)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8441)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Word RTF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1761) - 1
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) data. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Novell iPrint Client ActiveX Control Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Novell iPrint Client. The vulnerability is caused due to insufficient boundary checking when certain parameters are passed to the affected ActiveX control. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious web page. Successful exploitation might lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user.

name: Windows OLE Automation Array Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6332) - 1
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer due to attempts to access uninitialized memory in certain situations. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. When a user views the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged-on user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6347)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft XML Core Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4118)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) improperly parses XML content, which can corrupt the system state in such a way as to allow an attacker to run arbitrary code.

name: IBM Access Support ActiveX GetXMLValue Method Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the GetXMLValue method in the IBM Access Support ActiveX control in IbmEgath.dll, as distributed on IBM and Lenovo computers, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6351)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Novell iPrint Client ActiveX Control ExecuteRequest Buffer Overflow
description: The exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Novell iPrint Client for Windows. The flaw is due to boundary error in certain method of ActiveX control shipped with the product. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to view a malicious web page. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code execution with privileges of the currently logged on user.

name: Cisco Webex Meeting Manager atucfobj ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the WebexUCFObject ActiveX control in atucfobj.dll in Webex Meeting Manager allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the NewObject method.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Clipboard Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6323)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2782)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Apache Connector Buffer Overflow Vulnerability - 1
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache, Sun and IIS web servers component in BEA Product Suite allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: HP Intelligent Management Center mibFileUpload Servlet Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Intelligent Management Center (iMC) and Intelligent Management Center for Automated Network Manager (ANM) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

name: Restrict Content-Length Header Value
description:
This DPI rule restricts the value of Content-Length.

Note: Configuration options are provided to configure the maximum allowed Content-Length value.

name: VideoLAN VLC Media Player RealText File Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in VideoLAN VLC media player might allow user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via an an invalid RealText (rt) subtitle file, related to the ParseRealText function in modules/demux/subtitle.c.

name: VideoLAN VLC Media Player TY Processing Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the parse_master function in the Ty demux plugin (modules/demux/ty.c) in VLC Media Player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a TiVo TY media file with a header containing a crafted size value.

name: Nginx STARTTLS Command Injection Vulnerability
description: Nginx could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the ngx_mail_smtp_starttls() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using the STARTTLS command to inject commands into SSL sessions and gain access to plaintext information sent by the target client.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'OVAS.EXE' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in ovwparser.dll in HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long URI in an HTTP request processed by ovas.exe, as demonstrated by a certain topology/homeBaseView request.

name: Creative Software AutoUpdate Engine ActiveX Stack Overflow
description: There exists an access control weakness vulnerability in the way Creative Software AutoUpdate Engine handles user supplied data. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious webpage, potentially allowing arbitrary code to be executed in the security context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Novell iPrint Client ienipp.ocx target-frame Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in ienipp.ocx in Novell iPrint Client allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long target-frame parameter.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'ovalarm.exe' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: GDI+ WMF Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ allocates buffer size when handling WMF image files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted WMF image file or browses to a Web site that contains specially crafted content. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: OpenSSL SSL/TLS Man In The Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL is prone to security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'OvJavaLocale' Cookie Value Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow through the Cookie parameter OvJavaLocale.

name: Identified XML Entity Expansion Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description:
This DPI rule detects XML Entity Expansion Denial of Service attack. XML allows to define entities. Recursive definition of entities could allow an attacker to cause an affected application to consume excessive amounts of CPU and memory, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

Note: Configuration options are provided to customize the xml entity value. XML Entity with long data is also used for legitimate purpose. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack.

name: SAPlpd And SAPSprint Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
description: SAPlpd and SAPSprint are prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues allows remote attackers to crash the service and potentially to execute arbitrary code. This may facilitate the complete compromise of affected computers.

name: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Media Server SUN RPC DoS
description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the SUN RPC service in CA BrightStor ARCserve Media Server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via malformed RPC strings.

name: CA eTrust PestPatrol Anti-Spyware 'ppctl.dl' ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: CA eTrust PestPatrol Anti-Spyware 'ppctl.dl' ActiveX control is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and the computer. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

description: The Incutio XML-RPC Library, as used in WordPress, does not limit the number of elements in an XML document, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a large document.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0557) - 1
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Apple QuickTime PICT Image PnSize Opcode Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - 1
description: Integer signedness error in Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted PnSize opcode in a PICT file that triggers a stack-based buffer overflow.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6369)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Too Many TLS Alert Messages In TLS Traffic
description:
This is a heuristic based rule to detect too many SSL alert messages responses from a server within a period of time. Such large number of alert messages could be an indication of block-wise chosen-boundary attack, which could allow an attacker to obtain plain-text HTTP headers on an HTTPS session using TLS protocol.

Note: Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events. Multiple alert messages in TLS protocol can occur legitimately due to server limitations. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'display:run-in' Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8967)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: SAP NetWeaver msg_server.exe WRITE_C() Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: SAP NetWeaver contains a flaw in the WRITE_C() function of the message server (msg_server.exe). The issue is triggered as user-supplied input is not properly sanitized when handling packets that contain 0x15 opcode. This will allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and cause a denial of service or potentially execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft DirectShow Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0301)

name: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities

description: Libupnp is prone to buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the device that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

name: UPnP SDK "unique_service_name()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the unique_service_name function in the SSDP parser in the portable SDK for Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) Devices allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a UDP packet with a crafted string that is not properly handled.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-9158)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in OmniInet.exe (aka the backup client service daemon) in the Application Recovery Manager component in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an MSG_PROTOCOL command with long arguments.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8446)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8448)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Unspecified Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8449)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified remote integer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial of service condition.

name: Apache Axis SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-3596)
description: Apache Axis does not properly verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attacks.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat XML External Entity Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8452)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via an XML external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference.

name: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Stack Buffer Overflow (CVE-2011-1865)
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector. The vulnerability is due to improper parsing of requests sent to the vulnerable service. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system.

name: CA License Software Buffer Overflow (CVE-2005-0581)
description: CA License software is prone to a buffer overflow while receiving a crafted message. This flaw may allow a malicious user to execute code on the vulnerable system with system or root level privileges.

name: CA License Software Client Buffer Overflow (CVE-2005-0581)
description: CA License software is prone to a buffer overflow while receiving a crafted message. This flaw may allow a malicious user to execute code on the vulnerable system with system or root level privileges.

name: IBM Lotus Domino iCalendar Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: IBM Lotus Domino Server is vulnerable to attack through a specially crafted iCalendar event request. If the attacker knows a valid email address on the domain, they can craft an iCalendar request that can allow the execution of arbirtrary code within the security context of the affected service or cause the service to terminate abnormally.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow exists in the HP OpenView Network Node Manager (NNM) program jovgraph.exe. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while processing HTTP requests which contain a maliciously crafted displayWidth parameter. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to a target server, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed within the security context of the Internet Guest Account.

name: Microsoft Windows Server First Class Mailslot Message Remote Code Execution
description: A pool overwrite vulnerability exists in the kernel driver SRV.SYS for the SMB protocol, which could lead to remote code execution. The vulnerability is exposed via SMB Mailslots due to a failure in validating the parameterCount passed to SrvSmbTransaction.

name: Port Mapper Decoder Active FTP Client
description: FTP Servers can run in Active or Passive mode. In Active mode, the FTP Client creates a TCP control connection, and opens a dynamic port for data connection and sends it to the FTP server. This rule is to inspect FTP Port command traffic and decode the dynamic port number over TCP control connection.

name: GNU Wget FTP Symlink Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4877)
description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in GNU Wget, when recursion is enabled, allows remote FTP servers to write to arbitrary files, and consequently execute arbitrary code, via a LIST response that references the same filename within two entries, one of which indicates that the filename is for a symlink.

name: Oracle MySQL 'COM_FIELD_LIST' Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: MySQL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An authenticated attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Restrict Microsoft Internet Explorer OLE Object ActiveX Controls
description:
Microsoft Internet Explorer does not properly handle objects in memory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by accessing an ActiveX control that was not properly initialized. 

Note: This DPI rule blocks web pages which use instances of the suspicious OLE Object ActiveX controls. Usage of these ActiveX Controls is also common in legitimate web pages. Hence triggers by this DPI Rule should be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Microsoft Graphics Component Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6355)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Graphics Component that could allow an attacker to bypass the ASLR protection mechanism via a crafted JPEG files.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8445)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-9165)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-2782) - 1
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Cross Domain Policy Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8453)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a cross-domain security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass the same-origin policy and execute other attacks.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8451)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to read the contents of the system via unspecified vector.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer JPEG DHT Parsing Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information from process memory via crafted web script that interacts with a CANVAS element associated with a malformed JPEG image.

name: Adobe Flash Player Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0553)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-1776)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory that have been deleted. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft XMLDOM ActiveX Control Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
description: Microsoft XMLDOM ActiveX control is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information like local drive letters, files and directory names.

name: Adobe Reader Unspecified Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0512) - 1
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Reader allows remote attackers to bypass a PDF sandbox protection mechanism via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8966) - 1
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. Successful exploitation could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Detected Too Many NTP Traffic Amplification Requests
description:
This DPI rule detects NTP traffic amplification requests. Such requests in large number could be used to launch reflected amplification DDoS attack with the spoofed IP address of the victim.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the frequency of NTP requests.
Administrators are suggested to configure the UDP Timeout option to 0 seconds in the Network Engine tab of System Settings.

name: PHP 'cdf_read_property_info()' Function Incomplete Fix Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: PHP is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

name: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Stack Buffer Overflow (CVE-2011-1865) - 1
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector. The vulnerability is due to improper parsing of requests sent to the vulnerable service. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - 1
description: A buffer overflow exists in the HP OpenView Network Node Manager (NNM) program jovgraph.exe. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while processing HTTP requests which contain a maliciously crafted displayWidth parameter. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to a target server, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed within the security context of the Internet Guest Account.

name: Adobe Acrobat/Reader 'maxp' Font Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Integer overflow in CoolType.dll in Adobe Reader and Acrobat, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a TrueType font with a large maxCompositePoints value in a Maximum Profile (maxp) table.

name: Identified Suspicious Shellcode Over Network Traffic
description: Shellcode is a piece of machine code used as the payload in the exploitation of a software vulnerability. This rule will identify common shellcode exploits and some zero day attacks.

name: OpenSSL TLS/DTLS Heartbeat Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: The TLS and DTLS implementations in OpenSSL do not properly handle Heartbeat Extension packets, which allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory via crafted packets that trigger a buffer over-read.

name: OpenSSL TLS/DTLS Heartbeat Message Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: The TLS and DTLS implementations in OpenSSL do not properly handle Heartbeat Extension packets, which allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory via crafted packets that trigger a buffer over-read.

name: Microsoft Windows Components Directory Traversal Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0016)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Windows Components. The vulnerability is caused when Windows fails to properly sanitize file paths. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: IBM AIX Portmapper Decoder
description: When a client wishes to make an RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact Portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This rule decodes the Unix port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the ports those services are running on and configures firewall/IPS rules to use those ports.

name: Microsoft Windows WMF/EMF Image Format Rendering Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that occurs when an application that uses the library tries to process a specially crafted WMF(Windows Metafile) or EMF (Enhanced Metafile) image file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0497)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2013-0634)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0515) - 3
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability that could allow an attacker to crash the application via unspecified vector.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Parsing Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted web page. Successfully exploiting this issue can lead to execution of arbitrary code or cause the application to stop responding, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Apple QuickTime PICT Image PnSize Opcode Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Integer signedness error in Apple QuickTime allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted PnSize opcode in a PICT file that triggers a stack-based buffer overflow.

name: Oracle Java Applet ProviderSkeleton Insecure Invoke Method Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote security vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.

name: Adobe Flash Player Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0302)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player that could allow an attacker to read the contents of the system via unspecified vector.

name: Adobe Flash Player Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0304)
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Flash Player Out Of Bounds Read Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0307)
description: Adobe Flash Player allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Flash Player Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0308)
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Identified Microsoft Office File With Embedded Executable File
description: This rule is intended to block any Microsoft Office file having OLE compound document with embedded executable file. The detection is for identifying such Microsoft Office files when downloaded over web. Attackers may use crafted Microsoft Office files having embedded executable file to run arbitrary code remotely.

name: Adobe Flash Player Type Confusion Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0305)
description: Adobe Flash Player allow attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging an unspecified "type confusion" vulnerability.

name: ExcelTable Response Splitting XSS Vulnerability
description: CRLF injection vulnerability in Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers, and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks and cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, via unspecified vectors, aka "ExcelTable Response Splitting XSS Vulnerability."

name: Network Time Protocol ctl_putdata() Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow flaw exists in ntpd's ctl_putdata() function. A remote attacker could use this flaw to send a specially crafted request packet that could crash ntpd or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the ntp user.

name: WordPress WP Symposium Shell Upload Vulnerability
description: The WP Symposium plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that lets attackers upload arbitrary files. An attacker may leverage these issues to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: HP Data Protector Cell Request Service Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in crs.exe in the Cell Request Service in HP Data Protector allow remote attackers to create arbitrary files via an opcode-1091 request, or create or delete arbitrary files via an opcode-305 request.

name: IBM AIX 'rpc.ttdbserver' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: IBM AIX is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, which can result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Schannel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2014-6321) - 4
description: A vulnerability exists in the Secure Channel (Schannel) security package that could result in remote code execution for an unauthenticated user.

name: UPnP SDK "unique_service_name()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerability - 1
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the unique_service_name function in the SSDP parser in the portable SDK for Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) Devices allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a UDP packet with a crafted string that is not properly handled.

name: Identified Chunked Transfer Encoding In HTTP Request
description: This is a heuristic based rule to identify the presence of chunked data in HTTP requests. It acts as a helper rule for "HTTP Protocol decoding" to ignore processing of HTTP requests with chunked transfer encoding.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0303)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: PHP "php_parserr()" Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the php_parserr function in PHP allows remote servers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted DNS TXT record.

name: Apache HTTP Server 'mod_cache' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the mod_cache module. By sending a specially-crafted Content-Type header value, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.

name: Excel HFPicture Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office Excel handles specially crafted Excel files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MySQL yaSSL Pre-authentication Code Execution
description: yaSSL is an open source SSL library mainly used in MySQL and in other products. In MySQL, if SSL support is enabled, it is possible to use this vulnerability for pre-authentication code execution.

name: Port Mapper Decoder Passive FTP Server
description:
FTP servers can run in Active and Passive modes. In passive mode, the FTP server opens a dynamic port, sends the FTP client the server's IP address to connect to and the port on which it is listening over the control stream and waits for a connection from the FTP client.  
This filter decodes the FTP port mapper traffic to find out the dynamic port number over FTP control connection.

name: Port Mapper Decoder Passive FTP Client
description:
FTP servers can run in Active and Passive modes. In passive mode, the FTP server opens a dynamic port, sends the FTP client the server's IP address to connect to and the port on which it is listening over the control stream and waits for a connection from the FTP client.  
This filter decodes the FTP port mapper traffic to find out the dynamic port number over FTP control connection.

name: Identified Microsoft Internet Explorer VBScript ShellExecute Command
description:
This DPI rule detects the use of VBscript with ShellExceute command in html files, which may allow remote attacker to gain unauthorized access and execute arbitrary code.

Note: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks. Customers are advised to configure this rule with allowed IP addresses, from which the VBScript ShellExecute command is allowed to run in Microsoft Internet Explorer.

name: Identified Too Many Suspicious Asterisk Response

This is a heuristic based rule, which counts response of Asterisk server. These response follow SIP protocol, rule detects such responses having status code 420 and 422 with status-line "Option Disabled" and "Session Interval Too Small" respectively.

Note: Configuration options are provided to customize the number of SIP responses (with specific status line) to be monitored and the duration.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0036)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: VLC Media Player FLV And M2V File Handling Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
description: VLC Media Player is prone to multiple remote memory corruption vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Windows TrueType Font Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0059)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when the Windows kernel-mode driver improperly handles TrueType fonts. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: Identified Superfish Adware Network Communication
description: Superfish adware installed on some Lenovo PCs install a non-unique trusted root certification authority (CA) certificate, allowing an attacker to spoof HTTPS traffic. This DPI rule detects the presence of infection by detecting the communication of the client with the Server.

name: Microsoft Network Policy Server RADIUS Implementation Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0015)
description: A malicious Access-Request during Radius authentication can cause invalid LDAP queries to be performed against the Domain Controller which will fail and ultimately cause Denial of service.

name: Microsoft Office CGM Image Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into opening an Office document containing a specially crafted Computer Graphics Metafile (CGM) image.

name: Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0085)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that affected Microsoft Office software parses specially crafted files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Adobe Font Driver Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0093)
description: Adobe Font Driver is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0542)
description: Adobe Flash Player does not properly restrict discovery of memory addresses, which allows attackers to bypass the ASLR protection mechanism via unspecified vectors.

name: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Task Scheduler for Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a .job file containing long parameters over HTTP.

name: Adobe Font Driver Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0087)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Adobe Font Driver tries to read or display certain fonts. An attacker could use the vulnerability to gain information about the system that could be combined with other attacks to compromise the system.

name: HP Network Node Manager ovopi.dll Command Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors. This rule monitors PMD component traffic of Network Node Manager and identifies the message having certain command identifier.

name: HP Network Node Manager PMD Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in HP Network Node Manager I (NNMi). These vulnerabilities are caused by copying user supplied data into stack-based buffers without sufficient validation in ovopi.dll.

name: Network Time Protocol configure() and ctl_putdata() Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow flaw exists in ntpd's configure() function. A remote attacker could use this flaw to send a specially crafted request packet that could crash ntpd or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the ntp user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1623)

name: Identified Samba RPC Netlogon NetrServerPasswordSet Request
description: The Netlogon server implementation in smbd in Samba performs a free operation on an uninitialized stack pointer, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code. This DPI rule detects the rpc netlogon NetServerPasswordSet request.

name: Multiple Browser libjpeg/libjpeg-turbo Library Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: The get_sos function in jdmarker.c in (1) libjpeg 6b and (2) libjpeg-turbo does not check for certain duplications of component data during the reading of segments that follow Start Of Scan (SOS) JPEG markers, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from uninitialized memory locations via a crafted JPEG image.

name: Openssl DTLS 'dtls1_buffer_record' Memory Exhaustion Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0206)

A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a large number of crafted packets to a vulnerable server. Successful exploitation will result in high memory consumption and lead to a denial of service condition.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the alert frequency for DTLS requests.

name: Microsoft Windows Plug And Play Registry Key Access Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Plug and Play service. The vulnerability is the result of several functions failing to perform proper boundary checks when creating registry paths. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service, or inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the system account.

name: Microsoft Windows Plug And Play Service Buffer Overflow
description:
There exists a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Plug and Play service. The vulnerability is the result of a failure to perform proper boundary checking when processing messages. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service, or inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the
System account.

name: Microsoft Windows HTTP.sys Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1635)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the HTTP protocol stack (HTTP.sys) that is caused when HTTP.sys improperly parses specially crafted HTTP requests. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the System account.
