description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to remote code execution vulnerabilities. This could allow an attacker to possibly take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Null Pointer Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: A null pointer vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Samba MS-RPC Remote Shell Command Execution Vulnerability
description: The MS-RPC functionality in smbd in Samba allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters involving the (1) SamrChangePassword function, when the 'username map script' smb.conf option is enabled, and allows remote authenticated users to execute commands via shell metacharacters involving other MS-RPC functions in the (2) remote printer and (3) file share management.

name: OpenType Font Parsing Vulnerabilities
description: Information disclosure vulnerabilities exist in the way that affected components handle a specially crafted OpenType font file. An attacker could use these vulnerabilities to gain information about the system that could be combined with other attacks to compromise the system.

name: Adobe Flash Player Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0320)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer ASLR Bypass Using MemoryProtection Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to bypass the ASLR protection mechanism via a crafted web site.

name: Elasticsearch Groovy Search Sandbox Bypass Vulnerability
description: The Groovy scripting engine in Elasticsearch allows remote attackers to bypass the sandbox protection mechanism and execute arbitrary shell commands via a crafted script.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Type Confusion Using Isolated Heap Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a type confusion vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

name: Identified LDAP BindRequest Using NTLM Authentication Mechanism
description:
This rule will identify if client machines are using NTLM authentication mechanism for LDAP BindRequest operation.

Note: This rule is intended to be used on Microsoft Windows machines which are members of an Active Directory domain where by default all LDAP BindRequest must be done using Kerberos. If NTLM is detected it may be an indication of the domain members being under attack or the security protocols used are weak. All events of this rule should be further investigated to confirm the attack. Configuration options are available to exclude clients that may want to use NTLM purposely.

name: Microsoft Office Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1759)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office that is caused when the Office improperly handles objects in memory while parsing specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-3043)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0310)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0330)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Office Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1760)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software that is caused when the Office software improperly handles objects in memory while parsing specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0574)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8438)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a use-after-free vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Security Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2014-4671)
description: Adobe Flash Player does not properly restrict the SWF file format, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks against JSONP endpoints, and obtain sensitive information, via a crafted OBJECT element with SWF content satisfying the character-set requirements of a callback API.

name: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability - 1
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Task Scheduler for Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a .job file containing long parameters over SMB.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1752)
description: Remote code execution vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory. This vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: CA Product AV Engine CAB Header Parsing Stack Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Anti-Virus engine before content update 30.6 in multiple CA (formerly Computer Associates) products allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large invalid value of the coffFiles field in a .CAB file.

name: Microsoft Antivirus Engine PDF File Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Antivirus engine because of the way that it parses Portable Document Format (PDF) files. Microsoft products that use Microsoft Anti-malware technology which makes use of the æmpengine.dllÆ shared library can be made to under allocate a heap buffer and subsequently overrun it resulting in an attacker running the code in the context of the process that is scanning a malicious PDF file.

name: Microsoft DirectX WAV File Parsing Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in DirectShow when parsing WAV files which can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on a user's system by tricking a user into opening a specially crafted file or visiting a malicious web page.

name: Microsoft Help Workshop HPJ File Handling Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Microsoft Help Workshop 4.03.0002 allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a help project (.HPJ) file with a long HLP field in the OPTIONS section.

name: Microsoft vCard URL Handling Vulnerability
description: The URL handling in Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, with Windows Internet Explorer 7 installed, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary programs via invalid "%" sequences in a mailto: or other URI handler

name: Microsoft Visio Version Validation Remote Code Execution
description: An input validation error in the handling of the version number field in a Visio (.VSD, .VSS, or .VST) file can be exploited to corrupt memory via a specially crafted Visio file.

name: Microsoft Visual Studio Crystal Reports RPT Processing Buffer Overflow
description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Business Objects Crystal Reports XI Professional has unknown impact and user-assisted attack vectors related to a crafted .RPT file. The vulnerability also exists in Microsoft Visual Studio Crystal Reports.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player Remote Code Execution
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Media Player 7.1, 9, 10, and 11 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a skin file (WMZ or WMD) with crafted header information that is not properly handled during decompression.

name: Microsoft Windows Vista Feed Headlines Gadget Code Execution
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Windows Vista Feed Headlines Gadget (aka Sidebar RSS Feeds Gadget) in Windows Vista allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an RSS feed with crafted HTML attributes, which are not properly removed and are rendered in the local zone.

name: Adobe Acrobat JavaScript getIcon Method Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation in the getIcon() method of a Collab object, while processing a crafted PDF file. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open malicious PDF files.

name: Adobe Acrobat PDF Javascript getCosObj Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat and earlier allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document that (1) performs unspecified actions on a Collab object that trigger memory corruption, related to a GetCosObj method; or (2) contains a malformed PDF object that triggers memory corruption during parsing.

name: Apple QuickTime Embedded Pascal Style Remote Integer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in Apple QuickTime before 7.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MOV file that causes a sign extension of the length element in a Pascal style string.

name: Apple QuickTime Image Descriptor (IDSC) Atom Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Vulnerability in Apple QuickTime before 7.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application termination) and execute arbitrary code via a movie file with Image Descriptor (IDSC) atoms containing an invalid atom size, which triggers memory corruption.

name: ClamAV CHM Processing Denial Of Service
description: A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in the ClamAV AntiVirus product. libclamav/chmunpack.c in the chm-parser in ClamAV before 0.94 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a malformed CHM file.

name: GNOME Project libxslt Library RC4 Key String Buffer Overflow
description: Multiple heap based buffer overflows in the rc4 encryption and decryption (aka exsltCryptoRc4EncryptFunction and exsltCryptoRc4DecryptFunction respectively) functions in crypto.c in libexslt in libxslt  allow context dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via an XML file containing a long string as an argument in the XSL input.

name: Microsoft Agent Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: There is a remote code execution vulnerability in the way that Microsoft Agent handles specially crafted .ACF files. A remote attacker can craft an HTML page that will load the MS Agent ActiveX control (agentmpx.dll) in Internet Explorer and also load AgentSvr.exe to process an attacker supplied .ACF file (Agent Character File û HTTP Format). This can be used to overrun a heap buffer in AgentSvr.exe and run code of the attacker's choice in the context of the currently logged on user.

name: Microsoft GDI+ EMF 'GpFont.SetData()' Buffer Overflow
description: Microsoft GDI+ is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that occurs when an application that uses the library tries to process a specially crafted EMF (Enhanced Metafile) image file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

name: Microsoft OLE Dialog Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the OLE Dialog component provided with Microsoft Windows. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability when a user interacts with a malformed embedded OLE object within a Rich Text Format (RTF) file.

name: Microsoft SQL Server Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Integer underflow in Microsoft SQL Server 7.0 SP4, 2000 SP4, 2005 SP2, Microsoft Data Engine (MSDE) 1.0 SP4, SQL Server 2000 Desktop Engine (MSDE 2000) SP4, and 2005 Express Edition SP2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via an on-disk file with a crafted record size value, which triggers a buffer overflow, aka "SQL Server Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

name: Microsoft Visual Studio "dbp/sln" File Handling Buffer Overflow
description:
The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within the handling of a ".dbp" file (.sln files are also affected) that contains an overly long string in the "DataProject" field. This can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow and allows arbitrary code execution when a malicious ".dbp" file is opened.
A specially crafted project file can overwrite a stack based buffer allowing for fully EIP register control and code execution and compromise user's system.

name: Microsoft Windows ANI File Remote Code Execution
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that cursor, animated cursor and icon formats are handled in Microsoft Windows.
ANI is a graphics file format defined by Microsoft for simple animated icons and cursors. A buffer overflow bug exists in the way that ANI file is parsed when handling ANI headers. An attacker could try to exploit the vulnerability by constructing a malicious cursor or icon file that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visits a malicious Web site or opens a malicious email message.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ BMP Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ handles integer calculations. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted BMP image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ EMF Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI handles filename parameters in EMF files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted EMF image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ ICO File DoS
description: Microsoft Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI+, GdiPlus.dll) allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via an ICO file with an InfoHeader containing a Height of zero, which triggers a divide-by-zero error.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ WMF Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ allocates memory for WMF image files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted WMF image file or browses to a Web site that contains specially crafted content. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows Graphics Rendering Engine Image Handling Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Graphics Rendering Engine (GDI) on Microsoft Windows 2000 SP4, XP SP2, and Server 2003 SP1 could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted metafile (image) that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: Microsoft Windows Metafile Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer because of the way that it handles Windows Metafile (WMF) images. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted WMF image that could potentially allow remote code execution if a user visited a malicious Web site, opened or previewed an e-mail message, or opened a specially crafted attachment in e-mail. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows Saved Search Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when saving a specially crafted search file within Windows Explorer. This operation causes Windows Explorer to exit and restart in an exploitable manner.

name: Microsoft Windows URI Handler Registration Vulnerability
description: An argument injection vulnerability exists in Windows on systems with Mozilla Firefox or Internet Explorer 7 installed. An attacker who successfully exploits this could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MJPEG Decompression Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft DirectShow handles supported format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted MJPEG file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: RealNetworks Multiple Products SMIL Wallclock Stack Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in multiple multimedia products by RealNetworks, due to the way RealPlayer and Helix Player products parse a specific time format in Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language (SMIL) data. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by convincing the target user to visit a malicious website or open a crafted file. Successful exploitation can allow execution of arbitrary code in the context of the logged in user.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer Invalid Chunk Size Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: There exists a vulnerability in RealNetworks RealPlayer. The vulnerability is created by the failure of the affected application to properly validate chunked content messages received from an HTTP server. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted RealMedia file or to click on a malicious link in a web browser, resulting in the injection and execution of arbitrary code.

name: SAMI Format Parsing Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way DirectX handles supported format files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted file.

name: Sun Java Web Start Charset Encoding Stack Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Web Start. The vulnerability is due to improper bounds checking while handling XML based JNLP files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted JNLP file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

name: Sun Java Web Start JNLP java-vm-args Heap Buffer Overflow
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Sun Java Web Start. The vulnerability is due to improper bound checking while handling XML based JNLP files. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted JNLP file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

name: Sun Java Web Start JNLP vm args Stack Overflow
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Sun Java Web Start. The vulnerability is due to improper bound checking while handling XML based JNLP files. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted JNLP file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

name: VideoLAN VLC Media Player WAV Processing Integer Overflow
description: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is due to an integer overflow during the calculation of the size of a heap buffer. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted Wave/WAV file. Successful exploitation would cause a heap buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.

name: VideoLAN VLC real.c ReadRealIndex Real Demuxer Integer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in the ReadRealIndex function in real.c in the Real demuxer plugin in VideoLAN VLC media player allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed RealMedia (.rm) file that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: Windows Saved Search Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when saving a specially crafted search file within Windows Explorer. This operation causes Windows Explorer to exit and restart in an exploitable manner.

name: Windows Search Parsing Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Explorer that allows an attacker to construct a malicious web page that includes a call to the search-ms protocol handler. The protocol handler in turn passes untrusted data to Windows Explorer.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader CFF Encodings Handling Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A heap-based overflow vulnerability exists in Adobe Reader which might allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader JpxDecode Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat on Windows, might allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, related to a "memory corruption vulnerability."

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader U3D CLODMeshContinuation Code Execution
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Reader and Acrobat might allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Photoshop Remote Code Execution
description: Critical vulnerabilities have been identified in Photoshop CS4 for Windows that could allow an attacker who successfully exploits these vulnerabilities to take control of the affected system.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat U3D TIFF Resource Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2011-2432)
description: Buffer overflow in the U3D TIFF Resource in Adobe Reader and Acrobat allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Reader Doc.printSeps() Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Adobe Shockwave Director PAMI Chunk Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: The implementation of pami RIFF chunk parsing in Adobe Shockwave Player does not validate a certain value from a file before using it in file-pointer calculations, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted .dir (aka Director) file.

name: Adobe Shockwave Director tSAC Chunk Memory Corruption
description: Adobe Shockwave Player does not properly validate values associated with buffer-size calculation for a 0xFFFFFFF8 record in a (1) .dir or (2) .dcr Director movie, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted movie.

name: Adobe Shockwave Director tSAC Chunk Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Integer signedness error in the DIRAPI module in Adobe Shockwave Player allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or execute arbitrary code via a count value associated with an "undocumented structure" and the tSAC chunk in a Director movie.

name: Adobe Shockwave Player 'dirapi.dll' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in Adobe Shockwave Player. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of certain values in DIR file. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing target users to open a malicious file using a vulnerable version of the product.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability would result in arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user. In the case of an unsuccessful attack, the affected application may terminate abnormally.

name: Adobe Shockwave Player 'dirapi.dll' Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in Adobe Shockwave Player. The vulnerability is due to a stack buffer overflow when processing maliciously crafted DIR files containing Lnam Chunks. A remote attacker can exploit
this vulnerability by enticing a target user to visit a maliciously crafted web site. 

Successful exploitation could result in execution of arbitrary code within the security context of the currently logged on user. An unsuccessful exploit attempt may terminate the affected application abnormally.

name: Adobe Shockwave Player 3D Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description:
Adobe Shockwave Player does not properly parse 3D objects in .dir (aka Director) files, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) via a modified field in a 0xFFFFFF49 record.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Adobe Shockwave Player Director File Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Adobe Shockwave Player while attempting to load a specially crafted Adobe Director File allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations.

This vulnerability was shared with Third Brigade in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative
(http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Adobe Shockwave Player Memory Corruption (CVE-2011-2111)
description: IML32.dll in Adobe Shockwave Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors.

name: Apple QuickTime FlashPix Sector Size Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Apple QuickTime is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability, which could be exploited by remote attackers to take complete control of an affected system. The issue is caused due to a heap overflow error when processing malformed FlashPix files, which could allow attackers to crash an affected application or execute arbitrary code.

This vulnerability was shared in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Apple QuickTime Movie File Clipping Region Handling Heap Buffer Overflow
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. A boundary error exists in the handling of Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types in a movie file. This can be exploited to cause a heap-based buffer overflow when a specially crafted movie file is opened.

name: Apple QuickTime PICT Image paintPoly Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow
description: Integer underflow in QuickDraw Manager in Apple Mac OS X and Apple QuickTime, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a PICT image with a crafted Poly tag and a crafted length field, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: Apple QuickTime Targa Image Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Apple QuickTime Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted Targa image.

name: BitDefender Internet Security Script Code Execution
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BitDefender Internet Security 2009 allows user-assisted remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the filename of a virus-infected file.

name: Cinepak Codec Decompression Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way the Cinepak codec handles supported format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted media file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Cisco WebEx Player ATAS32.DLL linesProcessed Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the ATAS32 processing functionality in the Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player T26 and T27 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WRF file.

name: ClamAV 'get_unicode_name()' Off-By-One Heap Based Buffer Overflow
description: ClamAV is prone to an off-by-one heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: DirectShow Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft DirectShow parses AVI media files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted AVI file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Flash Movie Player File Magic Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Flash Movie Player is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability that arises when the application is loaded with malicious swf file. Successful exploits will allow attackers to crash the flash movie player, denying service to legitimate users.

name: GDI+ Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0041)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI+). An attacker may take complete control of an affected system if a victim opens a specifically crafted EMF image file.

name: GDI+ PNG Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ allocates memory. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted PNG image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: GDI+ TIFF Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ allocates memory. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted TIFF file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Google Apps 'googleapps.url.mailto' Handler Command Injection Vulnerability
description:
Google Apps is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers inject commands through a protocol handler. This issue occurs because the application fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.

Exploiting this issue would permit remote attackers to inject and execute commands with the privileges of a user running the application. An attacker can launch arbitrary applications from the local computer or an accessible network share.

name: Google Chrome Invalid FTP Server Response Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability Helper
description: Helper filter for "Google Chrome Invalid FTP Server Response Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability"

name: Libpng Memory Corruption And Memory Leak Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in libpng, as used in progressive applications, might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PNG image that triggers an additional data row.

name: libsndfile PAF File Processing Integer Overflow
description: Integer overflow in libsndfile allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted PARIS Audio Format (PAF) file that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

name: LibTIFF 'td_stripbytecount' NULL Pointer Dereference Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: LibTIFF does not properly handle an invalid td_stripbytecount field, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted TIFF file.

name: Malformed AVI Header Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Windows handles specially crafted AVI format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted AVI file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Media Decompression Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows handles media files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted media file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Media Player Classic DoS Vulnerability
description: A Denial Of Service vulnerability exists in Media Player Classic when processing a crafted m3u file.

name: Microsoft DirectX Crafted MJPEG Stream Handling Code Execution
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Microsoft DirectX application framework. The vulnerability is due to the way DirectX handles specially crafted MJPEG streams. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a specially crafted ASF or AVI file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged in user.

name: Microsoft DirectX DirectShow QuickTime Video Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Microsoft DirectX is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because the DirectShow component fails to properly handle QuickTime media files. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application that uses DirectX. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft GDI+ Record Type Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0165)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI+ handles validation of specially crafted EMF images. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted EMF image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft Windows '.ani' File 'tagBITMAPINFOHEADER' Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability when processing '.ani' files. Successful exploits will cause the vulnerable applications that use the affected APIs to crash or become unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users.

name: Microsoft Windows 'CreateSizedDIBSECTION()' Thumbnail View Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability in the Windows Graphics Rendering Engine because the software fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a malicious '.MIC' or office file.

name: Microsoft Windows Fax Cover Page Editor Memory Corruption
description: Microsoft Windows Fax Cover Page Editor is prone to a double-free memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Fax Cover Page file. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Windows Fax Cover Page Editor Remote Code Execution
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. The issue affects the Windows Fax Cover Page Editor component. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into opening a specially crafted Fax Cover Page file. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Windows Media Player MP4 File Stack Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Windows Media Player & 3ivx MPEG-4 due to improper handling of MP4 files by the MPEG-4 plugin. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open crafted MP4 file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the currently logged in user.

name: MJPEG Media Decompression Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows handles media files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Movie Maker Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Windows Movie Maker handles specially crafted project files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MPEG Layer-3 Audio Decoder Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft DirectShow MP3 filter handles supported format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted audio file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MPEG Layer-3 Audio Decoder Stack Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft MPEG Layer-3 codecs handle AVI media files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted AVI file containing an MPEG Layer-3 audio stream. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: MPEG-4 Codec Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the MPEG-4 codec handles supported format files. This vulnerability could allow code execution if a user opened a specially crafted media file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Msvcrt.dll Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2012-0150)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the msvcrt DLL calculates the size of a buffer in memory, allowing data to be copied into memory that has not been properly allocated. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted media file.

name: Multiple Products libxml2 XML File Processing Long Entity Name Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the xmlParseAttValueComplex function in parser.c in libxml2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a long XML entity name.

name: OpenOffice Word Document Table Parsing Heap Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in OpenOffice.org might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified records in a crafted Word document, related to "table parsing."

name: OpenOffice.org Microsoft Word File sprmTSetBrc Processing Buffer Overflow
description: filter/ww8/ww8par2.cxx in OpenOffice.org (OOo) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted sprmTSetBrc table property modifier in a Word document, related to a "boundary error flaw".

name: OpenType Font File CFF table Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the OpenType Font (OTF) driver improperly parses specially crafted OpenType fonts. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: OpenType Font File CMAP Table Paring Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the OpenType Font (OTF) driver improperly parses specially crafted OpenType fonts. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: OpenType Font Parsing Vulnerability
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows Adobe Type Manager library for OpenType Font parsing. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of a value inside Name record. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing target users to open a malicious OTF font file, result in kernel code execution or system crash with BSoD.

name: Oracle Java 'Applet2ClassLoader' Class Unsigned Applet Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Deployment component in Java Runtime Environment (JRE) in Oracle Java SE and Java for Business allows remote untrusted Java Web Start applications and untrusted Java applets to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.

name: Oracle Java SE Deployment Component Unspecified Remote Code Execution
description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE and JavaFX allows remote untrusted Java Web Start applications and untrusted Java applets to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to deployment.

name: Real Networks RealPlayer '.AVI' File Parsing Buffer Overflow
description: Real Networks RealPlayer is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: RealNetwork RealPlayer MPG Width Integer Underflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: RealNetwork RealPlayer is prone to an integer underflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted width value in an MPG file.

name: RealNetworks RealPlayer Multiple Products RA File Processing Heap Overflow
description: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in RealNetworks multiple products due to boundary errors when processing RealAudio (RA) files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted RA file. Successful exploitation would cause a heap overflow that may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

name: RealNetworks Realplayer QCP Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in qcpfformat.dll in RealNetworks RealPlayer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted QCP file.

name: TIFF Image Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office parses specially crafted TIFF image files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens an Office document containing a specially crafted TIFF image. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: TIFF Image Converter Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Office parses specially crafted TIFF image files. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens an Office document containing a specially crafted TIFF image. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: VLC Media Player 'smb://' URI Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in VLC Media Player, which can be exploited by malicious people to compromise a user's system. The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within the 'Win32AddConnection()' function in modules/access/smb.c. while processing  a playlist file having an overly long smb:// URI.

name: WebDAV Mini-Redirector Remote Code Execution
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the WEBDAV Mini-Redirector in the way that it handles long pathname checksum values.  The vulnerability may result in memory corruption, which could lead blue screen (best scenario) or remote code execution

name: Win32k EOT Parsing Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows kernel-mode drivers due to the improper parsing of font code when building a table of directory entries. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: Win32k TTF Parsing Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows kernel-mode drivers due to the improper parsing of font code when building a table of directory entries. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: Winamp AMF File Handling Overflow
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Nullsoft Winamp. This vulnerability is due to a heap buffer overflow while handling crafted .amf files. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open specially crafted files.

name: Winamp Midi File Handling Overflow
description: A code execution vulnerability exists in Nullsoft Winamp. This vulnerability is due to a heap buffer overflow while handling crafted MIDI files. Remote attackers  can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open specially crafted files.

name: Windows Media Playback Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows handles MP3 media files. This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opened a specially crafted file. If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Windows Media Runtime Voice Sample Rate Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Media Player due to the improper processing of specially crafted Advanced Systems Format (ASF) files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted audio file that could allow remote code execution when played using an affected version of Windows Media Player. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Xpdf Splash DrawImage Integer Overflow
description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in Xpdf. The vulnerability is due to lack of input validation when handling images within PDF documents. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a specially crafted PDF file with the affected application. Successful exploitation would allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the currently logged in user. In such a case, the behaviour of the target is dependent on the intention of the malicious code. In the case where code execution is not successful, the application could terminate abnormally.

name: Adobe TIFF File Vulnerability - 3
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: GDI Integer Overflow Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that GDI handles integer calculations. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted WMF image file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system.

name: Microsoft DirectX Parsing SAMI File Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in DirectShow when processing Synchronized Accessible Media Interchange (SAMI) file parameters, which could be exploited by attackers to execute arbitrary code by tricking a user into opening a specially crafted file or visiting a malicious web page

name: Microsoft DirectX RLE Compressed Targa Image Processing Buffer Overflow
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Microsoft DirectX SDK (February 2006) and probably earlier, including 9.0c End User Runtimes, allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Targa file with an encoding that produces more data than expected when decoding.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader PDF File Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. Events raised by this rule should be considered suspicious and investigated.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat U3D 'CLODMeshDeclaration' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the applications fail to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Adobe Multiple Products BMP Image Header Handling Buffer Overflow
description: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way multiple Adobe products parse BMP files. The vulnerability is due to boundary errors while handling BMP files Image Header. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious BMP file. Successful exploitation might lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user.

name: OpenSSL Client SSL/TLS Man In The Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
description: OpenSSL client is prone to security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

name: Adobe Flash Player Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0508)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Adobe Flash Player that could allow an attacker to read the contents of the system via unspecified vector.

name: Adobe Flash Player JPEG Parsing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player and Adobe AIR 1.5.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted dimensions of JPEG data in an SWF file.

Note: This vulnerability was shared with Trend Micro in advance of public disclosure by TippingPoint through its Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).

name: Google Chrome SpeechRecognitionClient Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1251)
description: Use after free vulnerability in the SpeechRecognitionClient implementation in the Speech subsystem in Google Chrome allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted document.

name: Adobe Flash Player Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0309)
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

name: Java SE Remote Security Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0459)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE and OpenJDK allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

name: WordPress Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2014-9034)
description:
WordPress is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial of service condition.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the alert frequency for WordPress login requests.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has been deleted which could lead to crash or remote code execution.  When Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted, memory may be corrupted in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0312)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Flash Player Out Of Bound Write Vulnerability (CVE-2015-3105)
description: Out of bound write in Adobe Flash Player allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. Successful exploitation could result in denial of service within the security context of the currently logged on user.

name: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-0586)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified remote code execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: SSL RSA Downgrade Vulnerability
description: Multiple client products allows remote SSL servers to conduct RSA-to-EXPORT_RSA downgrade attacks and facilitate brute-force decryption by offering a weak ephemeral RSA key in a noncompliant role.

name: Identified Suspicious User Agent In Outgoing HTTP Request
description:
This is a heuristic based rule which identifies the suspicious user-agent header in outgoing HTTP request used for connecting to command and control server.

Note: Configuration options are provided to configure additional user agents and the alert frequency of the events.

name: Adobe Reader And Acrobat Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8461)
description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: OpenSSL ASN_TYPE_cmp Segmentation Fault Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0286)
description: The ASN1_TYPE_cmp function in crypto/asn1/a_type.c in OpenSSL does not properly perform boolean-type comparisons, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read operation and application crash) via a crafted X.509 certificate to an endpoint that uses the certificate-verification feature.

name: Jetty Httpd HttpParser Memory Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2015-2080)
description: Jetty Web server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability due to improper parsing of HTTP requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending HTTP requests containing illegal characters within multiple fields to the vulnerable server. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

description: A stack buffer overrun vulnerability exists in versions of Microsoft Publisher 2007 and earlier.  Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can lead to arbitrary code being run in the security context of the logged in user. name: Identified Oracle MySQL Database Operation
description:
This DPI rule will restrict MySQL database access for the users those are configured in the configuration list and will block/detect Database SQL query functions such as delete, update, drop for all users.

Note: By default, this rule will not block any login attempt to MySQL Database or usage of any Database SQL query functions. Administrators are advised to configure this rule with users and Database SQL query functions.

name: OpenSSL Malformed ECParameters Infinite Loop Denial Of Service Vulnerability
description: The BN_GF2m_mod_inv function in crypto/bn/bn_gf2m.c in OpenSSL does not properly handle ECParameters structures in which the curve is over a malformed binary polynomial field, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a session that uses an Elliptic Curve algorithm.

name: Mozilla Firefox XrayWrapper Privileged Javascript Injection Vulnerability (CVE-2014-8636)
description: The XrayWrapper implementation in Mozilla Firefox does not properly interact with a DOM object that has a named getter, which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privilege via unspecified vectors.

name: CUPS Print Service Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

An attacker could submit a malicious print job that exploits this flaw to dismantle ACLs protecting privileged operations, allowing a replacement configuration file to be uploaded, which in turn allowed the attacker to run arbitrary code on the CUPS server.

name: Novell ZENworks Preboot Service Dynamic Port Decoder
description: The Novell ZENworks Preboot Policy service is used by the PXE devices to check if there are any imaging bundles that are assigned to the device. The service listens on port 13331/UDP for the service open requests and further requests will be communicated over a dynamic UDP port. This rule decode the respective dynamic port and sends to the dependent DPI rule for analyzing the network traffic.

name: Identified Python Werkzeug Debugger Remote Code Execution
description:
One of the most popular WSGI utility frameworks for Python is Werkzeug. It simplifies the handling of HTTP connections within your Python application but also provides a powerful debugger that permits one to execute code from within the browser. This debugger "must never be used on production machines", but sometimes it slips passed testing, exposing the debugger console to the attackers. 

This DPI rule is to detect remote code execution when the Werkzeug debugger is enabled in Python based web applications.

name: Identified DNS Response With Low TTL Value
description:
This rule detects the DNS response having low TTL value. This may be attempt to cause use after free vulnerability on Recursive DNS server.

Note: This rule is meant to be applied on Recursive DNS servers only. It should not be applied on any client machine. Configuration options are provide to customize the Time to live (TTL) value for DNS response. Trigger from this DPI rule should be investigated further to confirm attack.

name: OpenSSL Certificate Missing PSS Parameter Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-3194)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in OpenSSL. The vulnerability is due to a NULL pointer dereference when an OpenSSL application receives and processes a crafted certificate containing an invalid RSA PSS parameter. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted client certificate to a vulnerable server application that requests it. Successful exploitation will cause the server application to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Identified MD5 Hash Algorithm In TLS Server Key Exchange Traffic - Client
description:
This DPI rule detects the usage of MD5 Signature Hash Algorithm in TLS traffic. The MD5 hash algorithm is used to generate signature in vulnerable TLS protocol, allows attacker to launch a man-in-the middle attack on a TLS server-client connection.

Note: MD5 Signature Hash Algorithm in TLS protocol are also used for legitimate purpose due to server limitations. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack. Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events.

name: Identified MD5 Hash Algorithm In TLS Server Key Exchange Traffic - Server
description:
This DPI rule detects the usage of MD5 Signature Hash Algorithm in TLS traffic. The MD5 hash algorithm is used to generate signature in vulnerable TLS protocol, allows attacker to launch a man-in-the middle attack on a TLS server-client connection.

Note: MD5 Signature Hash Algorithm in TLS protocol are also used for legitimate purpose due to server limitations. Hence, every trigger of this rule should be investigated further to confirm an attack. Configuration options are provided to customize the alert frequency of the events.

description: The multisite feature in Drupal Core allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP Host header, related to determining which configuration file to use.

name: Microsoft Windows Network Policy Server RADIUS Implementation DOS Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0050)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when a Network Policy Server (NPS) improperly handles a Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) authentication request. An unauthenticated attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could send specially crafted username strings to a Network Policy Server (NPS) causing a denial of service condition for RADIUS authentication on the NPS.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1896)
description: A stack based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Mount. The vulnerability is due to improper bounds checking by the FastBackMount process. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests. Successful exploitation can result in arbitrary code execution within the security context of the system user.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server Opcode 1332 Buffer Overflow (CVE-2015-1925)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checking on parameters in requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests. Successful exploitation results in arbitrary code execution within the context of system user.

name: Identified Suspicious Usage Of Shellcode

Note:GDL option has been provided to configure request count

name: Oracle Reports OS Command Injection Attempt
description:
Oracle Reports is prone to a remote command injection flaw. An attacker who is able to upload a specially crafted reports executable to the application server, is able to run any OS command or read and write text files on the application server. This DPI rule blocks access to such reports executable. 

Note: Considering the nature of the attack, the rule might trigger on benign traffic as well. Hence any trigger from this rule needs to be investigated further to confirm attack.

name: Unix Samba Server Port Mapper Decoder
description: Remote Procedure Call (RPC) is an interprocess communication (IPC) mechanism that enables data exchange and invocation of functionality residing in a different process. A client will call the endpoint mapper (EPM) at the server to ask for a "well known" service. The server will answer the client at which port this service is available. This rule decodes the port shared by the Server using DCE/RPC Endpoint Mapper (EPM) Protocol, and help other rules for monitoring traffic on the dynamically opened port.

name: Microsoft Windows DLL Loading Vulnerabilities Over WebDAV (CVE-2016-0160 and CVE-2016-0148)
description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities exist when Windows fails to validate the authenticity of a module before loading it in run-time. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Unix Samba Client Port Mapper Decoder
description: Remote Procedure Call (RPC) is an interprocess communication (IPC) mechanism that enables data exchange and invocation of functionality residing in a different process. A client will call the endpoint mapper (EPM) at the server to ask for a "well known" service. The server will answer the client at which port this service is available. This rule decodes the port shared by the Server using DCE/RPC Endpoint Mapper (EPM) Protocol, and help other rules for monitoring traffic on the dynamically opened port.

name: Identified SAMBA DCERPC AUTH LEVEL CONNECT Password Validate Request
description: This is a heuristic based rule, which detects if the AUTH LEVEL CONNECT is used as a DCERPC level authentication protection for Password Validate request. AUTH LEVEL CONNECT is not secure, an attacker having MITM situation could tamper the traffic and discover other domain passwords.

name: SAMBA RPC Authentication Level Downgrade Vulnerability
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the Security Account Manager (SAM) and Local Security Authority (Domain Policy) (LSAD) remote protocols when they accept authentication levels that do not protect the RPC channel adequately. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain access to the SAM database.

name: SAMBA RPC Authentication Level Downgrade Vulnerability - 1

An attacker can use this to create a use-after-free scenario that could lead to remote code execution.

name: Oracle WebLogic Server Java Deserialization Objects Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: There is an unknown deserialization vulnerability in third-party Java libraries that could be used to remotely exploit Oracle WebLogic Server installations. Serialization is a process in which an object is converted to a stream of bytes in order to store or transmit that object to memory or a file. The process in which serialized data is extracted is called deserialization and it can lead to major security issues if not handled properly.

name: Identified Download Of Suspicious SCT File Over HTTP
description:
Microsoft enables scripts that are embedded in an HTML document or in a Windows Scripting Host file to access COM+ objects. An attacker can create COM+ objects in script code stored in an Extensible Markup Language (XML) files, such files are called 'scriptlets' to execute command on the remote host. This is a heuristic based rule which identifies the download of such 'scriptlets' files over HTTP.

Notes: The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attacks.

name: Microsoft Windows Graphics Component Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3216)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when the Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI32.dll) fails to properly handle objects in memory, allowing an attacker to retrieve information that could lead to an Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) bypass. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause an information disclosure that could that be used to bypass the ASLR security feature, which protects users from a broad class of vulnerabilities.

name: Microsoft Edge Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3198)

name: CitectSCADA ODBC Server Remote Stack Buffer Overflow
description: CitectSCADA is prone to a remote stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data which could allow to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable systems to gain complete control of the software.

name: Adobe BlazeDS XML Injection And XML External Entity Injection Vulnerabilities
description:
Unspecified vulnerability in BlazeDS, as used in LiveCycle, LiveCycle Data Services, Flex Data Services and ColdFusion, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via vectors that are associated with a request, and related to injected tags and external entity references in XML documents.

Note: Port 8400 need to be added to app types if BlazeDS was deployed with embedded Tomcat.

name: Microsoft Windows OLE Memory Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0092)

name: Oracle JRE Java Platform SE And Java Deployment Toolkit Plugins Code Execution Vulnerabilities

name: Identified WPAD NBNS Response From Suspicious Host
description:
NetBIOS Name Service (NBNS) is a broadcast UDP protocol for name resolution commonly used in Windows environment. WPAD protocol falls back to NBNS when it can't resolve the IP of WPAD server with DHCP and DNS. An attacker can spoof the WPAD NBNS response with malicious IP. This rule protects client from receiving WPAD NBNS responses from untrusted host.

Note: By default, this rule blocks all WPAD NBNS responses with public IP. Administrators are advised to configure this rule with IP(s) of trusted host(s) to accept in responses.

name: Identified Too Many NBNS Response
description:
NetBIOS Name Service (NBNS) is a broadcast UDP protocol for name resolution commonly used in Windows environments.This is a heuristic based rule which detects too many NBNS responses with type 'NB' (NetBIOS general Name Service Resource Record).

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the alert frequency for NBNS responses with type 'NB'.

name: Trend Micro OfficeScan Directory Traversal Vulnerability
description:
In some older versions of Trend Micro OfficeScan Agent, the UpdateAgent function had a directory traversal vulnerability. A successful exploit of this vulnerability could allow attackers to read arbitrary files on the computer.
Caution: If you changed the OfficeScan agents listening port number when installing the OfficeScan server, then you must configure the Office Scan NT Listener application type to match those non-default port numbers. Otherwise this rule would not be able to detect and block the attack.

name: Allow HTTP (Including WebDAV) Methods
description: This DPI rule restricts the usage of HTTP methods (including WebDAV) while accessing a web server. It can be configured to allow specific HTTP methods. Exceptions can also be specified for certain resources. In default configuration, it blocks all HTTP methods (including WebDAV).

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer And Edge Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3326)

name: Adobe Flash Player Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4226)

description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Oracle Database Server LT.ROLLBACKWORKSPACE SQL Injection
description: A SQL injection vulnerability in the Oracle Workspace Manager component. Input passed to the ROLLBACKWORKSPACE procedure within the LT PL/SQL package of the Oracle Workspace Manager component is not properly sanitised before being used. This can be exploited to manipulate SQL queries by injecting arbitrary SQL code.

name: Microsoft Windows OLE Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0153)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows OLE when Microsoft Word improperly handles specially crafted word document. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause arbitrary code to execute in the context of the current user.

name: WPS Office SpreadSheet Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in WPS Office software that is caused when the Office software improperly handles objects in memory while parsing specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: WPS Office Writer Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in WPS Office software that is caused when the Office software improperly handles objects in memory while parsing specially crafted Office files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft PDF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3319)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows PDF. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause arbitrary code to execute in the context of the current user.

name: Oracle Database Client System Analyzer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Oracle Database and Enterprise Manager Grid Control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework XAML Browser Applications Stack Corruption (CVE-2010-3958)
description: Microsoft .NET framework is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework And Silverlight Array Offset Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0664)
description: Microsoft .NET framework and Silverlight are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: FFmpeg vmd_read_header Integer Overflow
description: A vulnerability has been reported in FFmpeg that could allow remote attackers to compromise a vulnerable target. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious VMD file.

name: Fortinet FortiGate Cookie Parser Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-6909)
description:
Fortinet FortiGate is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

Note: This rule detects exploit attempts from a Deep Security protected host. It indicates that the host is compromised and being used to carry out the attacks in the network.

name: Identified Reflected File Download Attack
description:
Reflected File Download (RFD) is a web attack vector that enables attackers to gain complete control over a user system. In an RFD attack, the user follows a malicious link to a trusted domain resulting in a file download from that domain.

Note: Configuration option is provided to add the executable file extensions to block the RFD attack for the file extensions. Administrators are suggested to add executable file extensions to block the RFD attack according to their Web Application file extension support. The triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm their domain are being used to carry out RFD attack.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3357)

description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exist when the Windows Kernel API improperly allows a user to access sensitive registry information. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain access to user account information not intended for the user.

name: GNU Wget Arbitrary Commands Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4971)
description: An arbitrary file overwrite vulnerability exist in the GNU Wget. The vulnerability is due to Wget trusting the filename provided by an FTP server when the original request is redirected from an HTTP server. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to request a file over HTTP and sending an HTTP redirect to an FTP location hosting a malicious file intended to overwrite a user file such as .bashrc or .wgetrc. Upon successful exploitation, the commands contained in the downloaded file will be executed.

Note: This DPI rule should be preferably applied at in-line proxies. Configuration options are provided to block different attack vectors of HTTP Request Smuggling.

name: ISC BIND Response Handler Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-8000)

The vulnerability is due to improper parsing of incoming responses, allowing malformed records to be accepted by BIND when they should not be accepted. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability against DNS servers that perform recursive queries by crafting responses with an improper class attribute. Successful exploitation could lead to denial-of service.

Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the web server. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

A successful exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to execution of arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges on Windows platforms or root privileges on Unix-like systems.

Note: This vulnerability is a design flaw. As such, it is not feasible to differentiate attack traffic from legitimate traffic. Hence triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attack.
