description: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: iPlanet Parameter Value Length Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: Buffer overflow in the search component for iPlanet Web Server and Sun ONE Web Server allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the NS-rel-doc-name parameter.

name: Microsoft Edge Web Browser
description: This is a heuristics based rule to detect the presence of Microsoft Edge web browser. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this rule.

name: Microsoft Edge Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0002)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft Edge does not properly enforce cross-domain policies, which could allow an attacker to access information from one domain and inject it into another domain. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could elevate privileges in affected versions of Microsoft Edge.

name: Ares Galaxy
description: This rule detects Ares Galaxy p2p traffic based on heuristics.

name: Baidu IME
description:
This is a heuristic based DPI rule intended to detect and prevent the communication from Baidu Input Method Editor (IME) to Baidu cloud servers. Baidu IME is a Japanese language input software which transmits all characters entered via the program to Baidu cloud servers.

Note: Configuration options are provided to set the port and event frequency of this DPI rule.

name: Incredimail
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Incredimail email client. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

Note: This rule only detects the application traffic and does not block it

name: JDownloader
description:
This filter detects Jdownloader download management tool traffic based on heuristics. It also provides configuration options to set the event frequency of the filter.

Note: This filter only detects Jdownloader Client traffic and does not block it.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Browser
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Microsoft Internet Explorer browser. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Soulseek

name: Symantec Norton pcAnywhere
description: This is a heuristics based filter which detects Symantec pcAnywhere traffic and blocks connection to any remote host. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Thunderbird
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Thunderbird email client. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Xunlei
description:
This filter prevents Xunlei file sharing client traffic based on heuristics. It also provides configuration options to set the event frequency of the filter.

Note: This rule will stop only Thunder protocol traffic used by Xunlei client.

name: Emule
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect Emule Client login attempts. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

Note: This filter detects traffic and does not block it completely.

name: Gadu Gadu
description: This is a heuristics based filter which detects Gadu Gadu Instant Messenger login attempts. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Gnutella
description:
This filter detects Gnutella client traffic based on heuristics.
Note: This filter only detects Gnutella client traffic and does not block it.

name: Google Earth
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect the usage of Google Earth. 
Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Gvod
description: This filter detects Gvod client traffic based on heuristics. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Kazaa
description: This filter detects Kazaa client traffic based on heuristics. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: LimeWire
description:
LimeWire is a free peer-to-peer file sharing (P2P) client program that runs on Windows and non-Windows systems. This filter detect LimeWire P2P Client traffic based on heuristics. It also provides configuration options to set the event frequency of the filter.

Note: This filter detects and blocks file downloads.

name: Piolet
description:
This filter detects  Piolet Music P2P client traffic based on heuristics. It also provides configuration options to set the event frequency of the filter.

Note: This filter detects and blocks file downloads.

name: Shoutcast
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect Shoutcast media streams. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

NOTE: This filter will only detect Shoutcast media streams.

name: SIP
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) which is used to initiate VoIP connections. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

This filter detects BitTorrent client traffic based on heuristics. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

Note: This filter only detects traffic and does not block it.

name: Eudora
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Qualcomm Eudora email client. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Google Chrome Web Browser
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Google Chrome web browser. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Manolito
description:
This filter detects P2P traffic of clients like Blubster, Piolet etc. based on Manolito protocol 
Note: This filter only detects Manolito traffic and does not block it completely.

name: Mozilla Firefox Web Browser
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Mozilla Firefox web browser. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Netscape Navigator web browser. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Outlook
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Microsoft Outlook email client traffic when SSL is not used. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Pegasus
description:
This is a heuristics based filter to detect the presence of Pegasus email client. 
Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

description: This filter detects POP3 client traffic based on heuristics. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: RTSP
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect streaming media which is controlled using Real Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP).

name: Share NT5
description:
This filter detects Share NT5 client traffic based on heuristics.
Note: This filter only detects Share NT5 client traffic and does not block it completely.

name: TFTP Client
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect TFTP client traffic. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: WinMX
description: This filter detects WinMX Music P2P client traffic based on heuristics. It also provides configuration options to set the event frequency of the filter.

name: Internet Relay Chat (IRC)
description: This is a heuristics based filter which detects IRC client traffic. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: GnuTLS Libtasn1 ASN.1 DER Infinite Loop Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4008) - Server
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in Libtasn1, a component of GnuTLS. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability in GnuTLS by sending a crafted ASN.1 certificate to a target application. Successful exploitation may result in a denial-of-service condition.

name: ImageMagick Out Of Bounds Array Indexing Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7799)
description: An out-of-bound array indexing vulnerability exists in ImageMagick. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of certain objects in memory. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by uploading a maliciously crafted file to a vulnerable web service. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution under the security context of the service using ImageMagick.

name: ImageMagick SGI Coder Out Of Bounds Read Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7101)
description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in ImageMagick's SGI coder when software fails to parse the crafted image file properly.

name: ISC BIND Assertion Failure Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2848)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing a specially crafted query to the vulnerable server. Successful exploitation could lead to a denial-of-service condition.

name: ISC BIND Long Name Query DOS Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2775)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND's lwresd daemon. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing large query name to the lightweight resolver.

name: ISC BIND rndc Control Channel Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-1285)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND9. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of packets sent to rndc control channel interface. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerabilities by sending a maliciously crafted packet to the rndc control channel interface of a target BIND server. Successful exploitation could lead to denial-of-service conditions.

name: Nginx DNS UDP Packet Handler Crash Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0742)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in NGINX. The vulnerability is due to nginx dereferencing an invalid pointer while processing certain DNS packets. Successful exploitation attempt may result in denial-of-service condition.

name: PowerDNS Authoritative Server Long Qname Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5426)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in PowerDNS Authoritative Server. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted DNS packet to the target application. A successful attack could lead to excessive resources being consumed, resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: NTP Daemon CRYPTO_NAK Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4957)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the Network Time Protocol daemon (NTPD). The vulnerability is due to a null pointer dereference when handling crypto-NAK packets. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending an unsolicited crypto-NAK packet to the target service. Successful exploitation may result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: Microsoft Windows Graphics Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7272)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability was discovered in Microsoft Windows Graphics component. A successful exploitation of this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the remote system.

name: Winny
description:
This filter detects Winny P2P client traffic based on heuristics. 
Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7264)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office when Microsoft Office fails to properly handle office files. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform code execution in the context of the current user.

name: Identified Malicious Adobe SWF File
description: Adobe Flash Player allows remote attackers to cause a buffer overflow and possibly execute arbitrary code via a malformed SWF File.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2015-1924)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checking on parameters in requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to server. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution within the security context of System.

name: IBM Domino LDAP Server Remote Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0117)
description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exist in IBM Domino's LDAP Server. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a buffer overflow. Successful exploitation will result in the execution of arbitrary code with system privileges. An unsuccessful attack could result in a denial of service condition of the affected service.

name: WordPress Font Plugin Path Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2015-7683)
description: There is an absolute path traversal vulnerability in WordPress which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a full path name in the URL parameter.

name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server Buffer Overflow (CVE-2015-1929)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack Server. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checking on parameters in requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to server. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution within the security context of System.

name: NTP Long Control Packet Message Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-7855)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the Network Time Protocol daemon (NTPD). An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted NTP request to the vulnerable service. Successful exploitation can cause the NTP  process to terminate with an assertion failure, leading to a denial-of-service condition.

name: NTP Configuration Directive File Overwrite Vulnerability (CVE-2015-7703)
description:
An arbitrary file overwrite vulnerability exists in the Network Time Protocol daemon (NTPD). The vulnerability is due to NTPD allowing remote clients to change the pidfile and driftfile configuration options to any arbitrary file. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability by an authenticated attacker can cause the NTP process to write the drift value or the pid to an arbitrary file leading to data corruption or denial-of-service on the target system.

Note: This rule blocks request to the pidfile and driftfile. Rule may trigger on legit traffic and every trigger should be investigated.

name: Oracle Secure Backup exec_qr() Command Injection Vulnerability
description: Oracle Secure Backup comes with a PHP based front end which is vulnerable to a variable poisoning attack.

name: VMware vCenter Java JMX Server Insecure Configuration Java Code Execution Vulnerability
description: VMware vCenter Server contains a remotely accessible JMX RMI service that is not securely configured. An unauthenticated remote attacker that is able to connect to the service may be able use it to execute arbitrary code on the vCenter server. By exploiting known methods, it is possible to remotely load an MLet file from an attacker controlled web server that points at a jar file.

name: Identified Microsoft SQL Server Resolution Service Distributed Denial Of Service Attack
description:
Microsoft SQL Server Resolution (MC-SQLR) protocol provides a database instance enumeration service. The service is vulnerable to reflection-based distributed denial of service (DDoS) attack, successful attempt will cause denial of service condition as large response messages could cause the service to consume server resources.

Note: Configuration options are provided to edit the number of MS SQL Server Resolution Protocol responses and the time duration.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-01) - 1
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple security related vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service states.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7289)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform remote code execution in the security context of the current user.

name: Linux Kernel Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7117)
description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving a system call that is mishandled during error processing.

name: Identified DNS Reflected Denial Of Service
description:
DNS can be tricked to send responses to a spoofed IP address which can result in heavy network traffic coming to an arbitrary server on an arbitrary port. By doing this, the attacker can achieve a reflected DDoS attack on the victim server. This DPI rule is intended to detect such rouge DNS responses from an arbitrary DNS server.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the frequency of DNS responses to be monitored.

name: Identified NTP Reflected Denial Of Service
description:
NTP can be tricked to send responses to a spoofed IP address which can result in heavy network traffic coming to an arbitrary server on an arbitrary port. By doing this, the attacker can achieve a reflected DDoS attack on the victim server. This DPI rule is intended to detect such rouge NTP responses from an arbitrary NTP server.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the frequency of NTP responses to be monitored.
Administrators are suggested to configure the UDP Timeout option to 0 seconds in the Network Engine tab of System Settings.

name: Identified SNMP Reflected Denial Of Service
description:
SNMP server can be tricked to send responses to a spoofed IP address which can result in heavy network traffic coming to an arbitrary server on an arbitrary port. By doing this, the attacker can achieve a reflected DDoS attack on the victim server.
This DPI rule is intended to detect such rouge SNMP responses from an arbitrary SNMP server.

Note: Configuration options are provided to update the frequency of SNMP GETBULK responses. It's suggested to update the configuration according to SNMP usage and bandwidth.

name: Restrict Maximum Packet (Transport Data Length) Size
description:
This DPI rule restricts maximum packet transport data length (application payload data). In case of fragmented packets, the rule looks for total length of reassembled packet but not the length of the individual fragments.

Note: Configuration option has been provided to configure maximum packet size. By default, this rule allows all packets. The configuration must be modified to enable this rule.

name: Oracle Application Server Web Cache HTTP Request Method Heap Overrun Vulnerability
description: Heap based buffer overflow in Oracle 9i Application Server Web Cache allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long HTTP request method header to the Web Cache listener.

name: Apache Jetspeed Portal Site Manager ZIP File Upload Directory Traversal (CVE-2016-0709)
description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in Apache Jetspeed Portal. The vulnerability is due to missing file path validation on user uploaded ZIP archives. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by uploading a crafted ZIP archive. Successful exploitation allows the attacker to execute arbitrary code under the security context of the user.

name: HP Data Protector Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2005)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been found in the HP Data Protector. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending malformed requests to the HP Data Protector. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution under the security context of SYSTEM.

name: HP Data Protector Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities have been found in HP Data Protector. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending malformed requests to an HP Data Protector service. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution under the context of System.

name: HP Data Protector Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2007)
description: HP Data Protector is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

name: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Ovalarmsrv Service Buffer Overflow (CVE-2008-1852)
description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Network Node Manager Ovalarmsrv Service. The flaw is due to a boundary error when processing user requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker can send a crafted request to the target host to exploit this vulnerability. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code being injected and executed with the privileges of the affected service, which is normally System on Windows platforms.

name: ISC BIND ANY Query Assertion Failure Vulnerability (CVE-2016-9131)
description: An assertion failure vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing a specially crafted response to the vulnerable server. Successful exploitation could lead to denial-of-service condition.

name: ISC BIND DNAME Resource Records Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-1286)
description: ISC BIND is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability against DNS servers that perform recursive queries by providing responses with a crafted DNAME resource record signature (RRSIG) records answer.

name: NTP Oversized UDP Packet Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-9312)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the Windows port of Network Time Foundation's NTP Daemon. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a large UDP packet to the target server. Successful exploitation results in denial of service conditions on the target server.

name: Samba Active Directory Server Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2015-3223)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in the Samba LDAP server. The vulnerability is due to a error in processing certain LDAP requests by the libldb library used by the Samba daemon. A remote, authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending malicious packets to cause the samba daemon to become unresponsive. Successful exploitation could lead to a denial-of-service and exhaustion of CPU resources.

name: Squid Proxy ESI Response Handler Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4054)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Edge Side Includes (ESI) component of the Squid proxy. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted ESI response data to the target system. Successful exploitation allows the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target under context of the service. Unsuccessful attack attempts could cause denial of service conditions.

name: Microsoft Windows RPC Network Data Representation Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0178)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability was discovered in Microsoft Windows RPC Network Data Representation Engine. A successful exploitation of this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the remote system.

name: Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0027)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office when Microsoft Office fails to properly handle malformed office files. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to information disclosure.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0019)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform remote code execution in the security context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0020)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform remote code execution in the security context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0049)
description: An arbitrary pointer dereference vulnerability was discovered in Microsoft Internet Explorer. Successful exploitation of this issue can lead to information disclosure.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0015)
description: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0018)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0011)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exist when Microsoft Edge improperly handles the referrer policy. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could gain information about the request context or browsing history of a user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer And Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0009)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0030 and CVE-2016-0031)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform remote code execution in the security context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0040)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Oracle Java Runtime Environment Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5568)
description: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over multiple protocols. This issue affects the 'AWT' sub-component. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected process.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0047)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Microsoft Edge Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0017)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Edge improperly handles the referrer policy. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could gain information about the request context or browsing history of a user.

name: Ransomware HTTP Request
description: This DPI rule detects HTTP communication between a few ransomware and it's Command and Control Servers.

name: Microsoft Windows DLL Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2017-0039)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exist when Windows fails to validate the authenticity of a module before loading it in run-time. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0035)
description: Microsoft Edge scripting engine is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Identified Apache Struts Incorrect Default 'excludeParams' Security Bypass Vulnerability
description:
Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer.

Note: This vulnerability is a design flaw. As such, it is not feasible to differentiate attack traffic from legitimate traffic. Hence triggers of this rule have to be investigated further to confirm attack.

name: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-04)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities which could allow attacker to exploit them by potentially leading to code corruption, control-flow hijack, or information leak attack.

name: MIT Kerberos 'kadmin' DB Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3119)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the MIT Kerberos 5 kadmind service. The vulnerability is due to a NULL pointer dereference. A remote, authenticated user can exploit this vulnerability by sending a maliciously crafted modify_principal command with an empty DB argument. Successful exploitation can potentially lead to a denial of service.

name: Oracle GlassFish Server Username And Password Brute Force Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0807)
description: Oracle Sun GlassFish/Java System Application Server is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the HTTP protocol. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass authentication and perform unauthorized actions.

name: phpMyAdmin RegEx Pattern Modifier Code Injection Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5734)
description: phpMyAdmin is prone to a remote PHP code-injection vulnerability. An authenticated user can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary PHP malicious code in the context of the web server process.

name: Microsoft Windows File Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7212)
description: Remote Code Execution vulnerability exists when Windows image file loading functionality does not properly handle malformed image files, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

name: Mozilla Firefox SVG Animation Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2016-9079)
description: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a use-after-free vulnerability in SVG Animation. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Mozilla Firefox Arbitrary JavaScript Code Execution
description: Mozilla Firefox might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privileges via certain content navigation that leverages the reachability of a privileged window or by leveraging the ability to bypass the same origin policy.

name: Mozilla Firefox Arbitrary JavaScript Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0802)
description: Mozilla Firefox might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privileges via certain content navigation that leverages the reachability of a privileged window with an unintended persistence of access to restricted internal methods.

name: IBM WebSphere Application Server SIP Processing DoS Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2960)
description: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability due to improper validation of SIP messages. Successful exploitation of this attack could lead to a denial of service condition on the target server.

name: ImageMagick ImageFile MagickCore Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-8677) - 1
description: The AcquireQuantumPixels function in ImageMagick is vulnerable to a buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service condition.

name: WordPress Ajax Load More Plugin File Upload Vulnerability
description: Ajax Load More plugin for WordPress is prone to a remote file-upload vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer. This can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7288)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-01) - 2
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple security related vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service states.

name: Microsoft Windows Secondary Logon Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0135)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows when the Windows Secondary Logon Service fails to properly manage requests in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code as an administrator.

name: Microsoft Windows CSRSS Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0151)
description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows when the Client-Server Run-time Subsystem (CSRSS) fails to properly manage process tokens in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code as an administrator.

name: Microsoft Windows Kernel Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0180)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows when the Windows kernel fails to properly handle parsing of certain symbolic links. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could potentially access privileged registry keys and thereby elevate permissions.

name: Microsoft Win32k Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3219)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows improperly handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run processes in an elevated context.

name: Microsoft Windows DLL Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2016-0100)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft Office fails to validate the authenticity of a dll file before loading it when opening a PPSX file. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Identified Suspicious Jar File
description: This is a generic rule to prevent the download of malicious Jar files over the web. Attackers may use crafted Jar files to cause remote code execution.

name: Share EX2 P2P
description:
This filter detects Share EX2 client traffic based on heuristics.
Note: This filter only detects Share EX2 client traffic and does not block it completely.

name: Sun JDK JPG/BMP Parser Multiple Vulnerabilities (CVE-2007-2788)
description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in Sun JDK image parser. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target host, in the context of the currently logged in user. Unsuccessful attempts can lead to a denial of service condition.

name: IBM WebSphere Application Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5983)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability has been reported in IBM WebSphere. The vulnerability is due to an untrusted deserialization of data when the WASPostParam cookie is present in the request. A remote, authenticated attacker can successfully exploit this causing a denial of service and potentially execute arbitrary code on the affected system.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0067)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0141)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0140)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerabilty (CVE-2017-0133)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0034)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0006)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the Office software fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0052)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the Office software fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Edge Out Of Bounds Read Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0131)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft Edge improperly accesses objects in memory. The vulnerability could corrupt memory in a way that enables an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0053)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the Office software fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0105)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office when Microsoft Office fails to properly handle malformed office files. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to information disclosure.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ Information Disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2017-0062)
description: Multiple information disclosure vulnerabilities exists in the way that the Windows Graphics Device Interface handles objects in memory, allowing an attacker to retrieve information from a targeted system. By itself, the information disclosure does not allow arbitrary code execution; however, it could allow arbitrary code to be run if the attacker uses it in combination with another vulnerability.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0149)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ Information Disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2017-0073)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exist when the Windows GDI component improperly discloses the contents of its memory. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the system.

name: Microsoft Windows COM Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0100)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Windows when the Windows COM session moniker fails to properly enforce RunAs permissions when registering DCOM objects. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in another user session. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: Microsoft Windows Uniscribe Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities (MS17-011)
description: Multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in Windows due to the way Windows Uniscribe handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the user's system.

name: Microsoft Edge Spoofing Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0069)
description: Spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Edge when it fails to properly parse HTTP responses. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could trick a user by redirecting him to a specially crafted website.

name: WordPress REST API Unauthenticated Content Injection Vulnerability
description: WordPress is vulnerable for content injection (privilege escalation) vulnerability affecting the REST API. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to modify the content of any page within a WordPress site using crafted HTTP request.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0154)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer does not properly enforce cross-domain policies, which could allow an attacker to access information from one domain and inject it into another domain.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerabilities (MS17-018)
description: Multiple elevation of privilege vulnerabilities exist in Windows when the Windows kernel-mode driver fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could run arbitrary code in kernel mode. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: Microsoft Windows DirectShow Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0042)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability was discovered in Microsoft Windows DirectShow which allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive system information via crafted XML content.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0008)
description: A file and directory information disclosure vulnerability was discovered in Microsoft Internet Explorer. Successful exploitation of this issue can lead to information disclosure.

name: Apple QuickTime 'QuickTimeStreaming.qtx' Remote Stack Buffer Overflow
description: Apple QuickTime is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: ISC BIND Inconsistent DS Record Assertion Failure Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-9444)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing a specially crafted query to the vulnerable server.

name: ISC BIND RRSIG Record Response Assertion Failure Denial Of Service (CVE-2016-9147)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability has been reported in ISC BIND. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing a specially crafted query to the vulnerable server. Successful exploitation could lead to a denial-of-service condition.

name: Jetty Path Sanitization Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4800)
description: Jetty is prone to path sanitization vulnerability. This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable system. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

name: Joomla Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3242)
description: Joomla does not properly handle an object obtained by some method, which allows remote authenticated users to conduct PHP object injection attacks and cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

name: NTP Crypto-NAK Packets Symmetric Association Authentication Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2015-7871)
description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the Network Time Protocol daemon (NTPD). A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted crypto-NAK NTP packet to the vulnerable service. Successful exploitation will let the attacker change the time on the target system, resulting in a policy bypass and potentially other security vulnerabilities.

name: PHP Exif Null Pointer Dereference Vulnerability (CVE-2016-6292)
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in PHP. The vulnerability is due to a null pointer dereference when multi-byte string support is enabled in PHP. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause the PHP interpreter to crash, leading to a denial of service condition.

name: PHP GC Use After Free Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5771)
description: A use after free vulnerability exists in PHP application. The vulnerability gets exploited in a way that PHP improperly interacts with the unserialize implementation and garbage collection, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via crafted serialized data.

name: PHP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2017-5340)
description: PHP is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted serialized data to an affected PHP application. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution under the context of the target application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: PHP Unserialize() ZVAL Reference Counter Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2007-1286)
description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in PHP. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string to the unserialize function.

name: phpMyAdmin Authenticated Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2013-3238)
description: phpMyAdmin is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An authenticated user can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary PHP malicious code in the context of the web server process.

name: PHP cURL Lib NULL Byte Injection Vulnerability
description: This rule detects file:// schema URL followed by a null character and further followed by an http:// or https:// schema URL. Such payload can by pass common URL validation and can force CURL library to read local file.

name: Adobe ColdFusion OOXML XXE Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2016-4264)
description:
An XML external entity (XXE) processing vulnerability has been reported in the Office Open XML (OOXML) parsing component of Adobe ColdFusion. The vulnerability is due to a lack of validation on user-supplied input when
parsing OOXML documents. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by uploading a maliciously crafted OOXML document to the target server. Successful exploitation could allow the attacker to read arbitrary files from the target server.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0071)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-07)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities which could allow attackers to exploit, potentially leading to code corruption, control-flow hijack, or information leak attack.

name: WordPress RSS Feed Generator self_link HTTP_HOST Cross-Site Scripting
description: There exists a cross-site script insertion vulnerability in WordPress. The vulnerability is due to lack of sanitization for data supplied in the HTTP Host header. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the users browser sessions in the context of the vulnerable web site.

name: Microsoft Windows Uniscribe Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0085)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Windows due to the way Windows Uniscribe handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the users system.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerabilities (MS16-039)
description: Elevation of privilege vulnerabilities exist when the Windows kernel-mode driver fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerabilities could run arbitrary code in kernel mode. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (MS16-090)
description: Multiple elevation of privilege vulnerabilities exist in Windows when the Windows kernel fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in kernel mode.

name: Microsoft Windows Uniscribe Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-7274)
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability was discovered in the Windows Graphics Device Interface. Successful exploitation of this issue can lead to both remote code execution as well information disclosure on applications that use this library.

name: ImageMagick IsPixelGray Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-9773) - 1
description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the IsPixelGray function in ImageMagick allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image file.

name: Microsoft Windows Secondary Logon Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0099)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows if the Windows Secondary Logon Service fails to properly manage request handles in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code as an administrator. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (MS16-062)
description: This DPI rule covers multiple vulnerabilities causing privilege escalation or information disclosure if exploited successfully.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0010)
description: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerabilities (MS16-098)
description: Multiple elevation of privilege vulnerabilities exist when the Windows kernel-mode driver fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could run arbitrary code in kernel mode. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

name: PHP phar_parse_pharfile Integer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-10159)
description: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

name: Microsoft Windows WebDAV Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0051)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning (WebDAV) client when WebDAV improperly validates input. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions.

name: Microsoft Color Management Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0061)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the Microsoft Windows color management module handles objects in the memory. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve information to bypass usermode ASLR on a targeted system.

name: Microsoft Color Management Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0063)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the Microsoft Windows color management module handles objects in the memory. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve information to bypass usermode ASLR on a targeted system.

name: Microsoft Windows GDI+ Information Disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2017-0060)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that the Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) handles objects in memory, allowing an attacker to retrieve information from a targeted system. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use the retrieved information to circumvent Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) in Windows, which helps guard against a broad class of vulnerabilities.

name: Microsoft Windows Registry Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0103)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows Kernel API improperly allows a user to access sensitive registry information. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain access to user account information that is not intended for the user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0059)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer improperly handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could obtain information to further compromise the system.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer And Edge Spoofing Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0033)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to a spoofing vulnerability. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could trick a user by redirecting them to a specially crafted website. The specially crafted website could spoof content or be used as a pivot to chain an attack with other vulnerabilities in web services.

name: Ransomware Network Traffic - 2
description:
This DPI rule detects HTTP communication between ransomware and it's Command and Control Server.

Note: This DPI rule was named "Ransomware Crilock" earlier. Now it is renamed as it is covering multiple ransomwares.

name: YouTube
description: This is a heuristics based filter to detect the YouTube website. Configuration options are provided to set the event frequency of this filter.

name: Heuristic Detection Of Malicious PDF Documents - 2
description:
This is a heuristic based DPI rule intended to block known malicious PDF documents which are used in attacks in the wild.

Note: In some network environment this rule could generate many alerts, hence every trigger should be investigated further to confirm the attack.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2016-3222)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Identified Suspicious Microsoft PowerPoint Document
description:
This filter is to detect Suspicious Microsoft PowerPoint Documents.

Note: This rule is always recommended when any version of Microsoft PowerPoint is installed on the system.

description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows PDF Library. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to a remote code execution on the target system.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0094)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Windows Uniscribe Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities (MS17-011) - 2
description: Multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in Windows due to the way Windows Uniscribe handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the user's system.

name: Microsoft Windows Graphics Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0014)
description: Remote code execution code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the local user.

name: Microsoft Windows Uniscribe Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities (MS17-011) - 1
description: Multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities exist in Windows due to the way Windows Uniscribe handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the user's system.

name: ProFTPD Remote Command Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2015-3306)
description: The mod_copy module in ProFTPD allows remote attackers to read and write to arbitrary files via the SITE CPFR and SITE CPTO commands.

name: GNU Bash Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: GNU Bash is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when it incorrectly processes trailing strings after certain malformed function definitions in the values of environment variables, which allows remote attackers to write to files or possibly have unknown other impact via a crafted request.

name: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0194)
description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could use a specially crafted file to perform remote code execution in the security context of the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0158)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer scripting engine is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0202)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0205)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Windows ATMFD.dll Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0192)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when the ATMFD component improperly discloses the contents of its memory. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could obtain information to further compromise the user's system.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0200)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Windows NDISAPI Driver Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2011-1974)
description: Microsoft Windows is prone to an elevation of privilege vulnerability by not properly validate user-mode input, which allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application.

name: Microsoft Office DLL Loading Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2017-0197)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Office improperly validates input before loading dynamic link library (DLL) files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0201)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer scripting engine is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Apache Struts2 Multiple Vulnerabilities
description: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer.

name: Apache Subversion mod_authz_svn Module Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2168)
description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in Apache Subversion's mod_authz_svn module. The vulnerability can occur in a COPY or MOVE request with a specially crafted header value. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted SVN COPY or MOVE requests. Successful exploitation would cause the server process to terminate, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

name: Novell Service Desk clientImportUploadForm Directory Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2016-1593)
description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in Novell Service Desk due to an input validation error when accepting user uploaded files. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted HTTP requests to the target server. Successful exploitation could allow execution of arbitrary code under the security context of SYSTEM.

name: Oracle Java SE Remote Security Vulnerability (CVE-2017-3241)
description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to deserialization of Java Object.

name: PHP exif_convert_any_to_int Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-10158)
description: exif.c in the Exif extension in PHP performs an incorrect cast, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via rafted EXIF data that triggers an attempt to divide the minimum representable negative integer by -1.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0210)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Internet Explorer does not properly enforce cross-domain policies, which could allow an attacker to access information from one domain and inject it into another domain.

name: Adobe Reader DC XObject stream Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-6938)
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a use after free vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service condition.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader FlateDecode Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability (APSB16-26) - 1
description: Adobe Flash Player allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via unspecified vectors.

name: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-10)
description: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities which could allow attackers to exploit, potentially leading to code corruption, control-flow hijack, or information leak attack.

name: Adobe Acrobat And Reader Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (APSB17-11) - 1
description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple security related vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service states.

name: Microsoft Edge Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0066)
description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Microsoft Edge when it fails to correctly apply Same Origin Policy for HTML elements present in other browser windows. An attacker could trick a user into loading a page with malicious content.

name: Adobe Acrobat DLL Loading Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability Over WebDAV (CVE-2017-3013)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Adobe Acrobat and Reader improperly validates input before loading dynamic link library (DLL) files. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft IIS WebDAV service. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to server. Successful exploitation could result in arbitrary code execution within the security context of system.

name: Sendmail SMTP Header And Command Buffer Overflow
description: Sendmail contains a heap-based buffer overrun in code responsible for parsing header and command values that can contain lists of email addresses (e.g. To:, From:, CC:, Mail From:). The problem arises because Sendmail's crackaddr() function fails to properly handle the "<" and ">"characters. Remote attackers may exploit the flaw to gain root privileges by sending a specially crafted command or email message to a vulnerable server.

name: Sun Solaris RPC Service PortMapper Decoder
description: When a client wishes to make an RPC call to an RPC application, it will first contact portmapper service on the server machine to determine the port number where RPC packets should be sent.This filter decodes the Unix port mapper traffic on port 111 to find out the ports those services are running on and configures firewall/IPS rules to use those ports.

name: Apache mod_dav svn Remote Denial Of Service
description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the Apache HTTP Server module mod_dav. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the target server. Successful exploitation would terminate the Apache HTTP server, resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: Apache Tomcat Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2013-4322)
description: Apache Tomcat processes chunked transfer encoding without properly handling large amount of chunked data, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service by streaming data.

name: Microsoft Windows Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0058)
description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Windows due to the way Windows handles objects in memory. An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could obtain information to further compromise the users system.

name: HP Data Protector EXEC_SETUP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0922)
description: The client in HP Data Protector allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary programs via an EXEC_SETUP command that references a UNC share pathname.

name: ImageMagick 'coders/rle.c' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-10049)
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in ImageMagick. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions.

name: ImageMagick ImageFile MagickCore Buffer Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-8677)
description: The AcquireQuantumPixels function in ImageMagick is vulnerable to a buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service condition.

name: Joomla Media Manager Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CVE-2013-5576)
description: Joomla Media Manager is prone to a privilege escalation vulnerability, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions and upload files with dangerous extensions. The issue occurs because the application fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Microsoft LDAP Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0166)
description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when LDAP request buffer lengths are improperly calculated. In a remote attack scenario, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability by running a specially crafted application to send malicious traffic to a Domain Controller. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run processes in an elevated context.

name: Oracle Application Testing Suite Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
description: Multiple security vulnerabilities exists in the Oracle Application Testing Suite. An attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request to the target server. Successful exploitation allows the attacker to either bypass authentication requirements on the target or arbitrary code execution under the security context of system.

name: Oracle Application Testing Suite UploadFileAction Servlet Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-0491)
description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in Oracle Application Testing Suite. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the target server. Successful exploitation allows the attacker to either bypass authentication requirements on the target or arbitrary code execution under the security context of system.

name: PowerDNS Authoritative Server Dot Character Denial Of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2016-5427)
description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in PowerDNS Authoritative Server. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted DNS packet to the target application. A successful attack could lead to excessive resources being consumed, resulting in a denial of service condition.

name: WordPress UserPro Plugin Remote File Upload Vulnerability
description: WordPress UserPro plugin is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers upload arbitrary files. The issue occurs because the application fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

name: Ruby On Rails Action Pack Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2098)
description: Ruby on Rails Action Pack is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker could use the request parameters to execute arbitrary ruby code.

name: Microsoft Windows Multiple Security Vulnerabilities (April-2017)
description: This DPI rule covers multiple vulnerabilities which exist in Microsoft Windows, successful exploitation of which can lead to information disclosure, remote code execution or elevation of privilege.

name: Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0243)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists that is caused when Microsoft Word improperly handles objects in memory while parsing specially crafted Office files. This could corrupt system memory in such a way as to allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0234)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.

name: Microsoft Edge Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0221)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Edge Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0266)
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Edge in the way scripting engine renders while handling objects in the memory. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user.

name: Microsoft Internet Explorer And Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0238)
description: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

name: Microsoft Edge Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability (CVE-2017-0236)
description: Microsoft Edge is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application.
